 2429:      * @access public
 2430:      * @since 1.0 Beta 3
 2431:      * @param string $data RSS or Atom data as a string.
 2432:      * @see SimplePie::set_feed_url()
 2433:      */
 2434:     public function set_raw_data($data)
 2435:     {
 2436:         $this->raw_data = $data;
 2437:     }
 2438: 
 2439:     /**
 2440:      * Allows you to override the default timeout for fetching remote feeds.
 2441:      *
 2442:      * This allows you to change the maximum time the feed's server to respond
 2443:      * and send the feed back.
 2444:      *
 2445:      * @access public
 2446:      * @since 1.0 Beta 3
 2447:      * @param int $timeout The maximum number of seconds to spend waiting to retrieve a feed.
 2448:      */
 2449:     public function set_timeout($timeout = 10)
 2450:     {
 2451:         $this->timeout = (int) $timeout;
 2452:     }
 2453: 
 2454:     /**
 2455:      * Forces SimplePie to use fsockopen() instead of the preferred cURL
 2456:      * functions.
 2457:      *
 2458:      * @access public
 2459:      * @since 1.0 Beta 3
 2460:      * @param bool $enable Force fsockopen() to be used
 2461:      */
 2462:     public function force_fsockopen($enable = false)
 2463:     {
 2464:         $this->force_fsockopen = (bool) $enable;
 2465:     }
 2466: 
 2467:     /**
 2468:      * Enables/disables caching in SimplePie.
 2469:      *
 2470:      * This option allows you to disable caching all-together in SimplePie.
 2471:      * However, disabling the cache can lead to longer load times.
 2472:      *
 2473:      * @access public
 2474:      * @since 1.0 Preview Release
 2475:      * @param bool $enable Enable caching
 2476:      */
 2477:     public function enable_cache($enable = true)
 2478:     {
 2479:         $this->cache = (bool) $enable;
 2480:     }
 2481: 
 2482:     /**
 2483:      * Set the length of time (in seconds) that the contents of a feed
 2484:      * will be cached.
 2485:      *
 2486:      * @access public
 2487:      * @param int $seconds The feed content cache duration.
 2488:      */
 2489:     public function set_cache_duration($seconds = 3600)
 2490:     {
 2491:         $this->cache_duration = (int) $seconds;
 2492:     }
 2493: 
 2494:     /**
 2495:      * Set the length of time (in seconds) that the autodiscovered feed
 2496:      * URL will be cached.
 2497:      *
 2498:      * @access public
 2499:      * @param int $seconds The autodiscovered feed URL cache duration.
 2500:      */
 2501:     public function set_autodiscovery_cache_duration($seconds = 604800)
 2502:     {
 2503:         $this->autodiscovery_cache_duration = (int) $seconds;
 2504:     }
 2505: 
 2506:     /**
 2507:      * Set the file system location where the cached files should be stored.
 2508:      *
 2509:      * @access public
 2510:      * @param string $location The file system location.
 2511:      */
 2512:     public function set_cache_location($location = './cache')
 2513:     {
 2514:         $this->cache_location = (string) $location;
 2515:     }
 2516: 
 2517:     /**
 2518:      * Determines whether feed items should be sorted into reverse chronological order.
 2519:      *
 2520:      * @access public
 2521:      * @param bool $enable Sort as reverse chronological order.
 2522:      */
 2523:     public function enable_order_by_date($enable = true)
 2524:     {
 2525:         $this->order_by_date = (bool) $enable;
 2526:     }
 2527: 
 2528:     /**
 2529:      * Allows you to override the character encoding reported by the feed.
 2530:      *
 2531:      * @access public
 2532:      * @param string $encoding Character encoding.
 2533:      */
 2534:     public function set_input_encoding($encoding = false)
 2535:     {
 2536:         if ($encoding)
 2537:         {
 2538:             $this->input_encoding = (string) $encoding;
 2539:         }
 2540:         else
 2541:         {
 2542:             $this->input_encoding = false;
 2543:         }
 2544:     }
 2545: 
 2546:     /**
 2547:      * Set how much feed autodiscovery to do
 2548:      *
 2549:      * @access public
 2550:      * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_NONE
 2551:      * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_AUTODISCOVERY
 2552:      * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_EXTENSION
 2553:      * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_BODY
 2554:      * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_EXTENSION
 2555:      * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_BODY
 2556:      * @see SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL
 2557:      * @param int $level Feed Autodiscovery Level (level can be a
 2558:      * combination of the above constants, see bitwise OR operator)
 2559:      */
 2560:     public function set_autodiscovery_level($level = SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL)
 2561:     {
 2562:         $this->autodiscovery = (int) $level;
 2563:     }
 2564: 
 2565:     /**
 2566:      * Get the class registry
 2567:      *
 2568:      * Use this to override SimplePie's default classes
 2569:      * @see SimplePie_Registry
 2570:      * @return SimplePie_Registry
 2571:      */
 2572:     public function &get_registry()
 2573:     {
 2574:         return $this->registry;
 2575:     }
 2576: 
 2577:     /**#@+
 2578:      * Useful when you are overloading or extending SimplePie's default classes.
 2579:      *
 2580:      * @deprecated Use {@see get_registry()} instead
 2581:      * @param string $class Name of custom class.
 2582:      * @link http://php.net/manual/en/language.oop5.basic.php#language.oop5.basic.extends PHP5 extends documentation
 2583:      */
 2584:     /**
 2585:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for caching.
 2586:      */
 2587:     public function set_cache_class($class = 'SimplePie_Cache')
 2588:     {
 2589:         return $this->registry->register('Cache', $class, true);
 2590:     }
 2591: 
 2592:     /**
 2593:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for auto-discovery.
 2594:      */
 2595:     public function set_locator_class($class = 'SimplePie_Locator')
 2596:     {
 2597:         return $this->registry->register('Locator', $class, true);
 2598:     }
 2599: 
 2600:     /**
 2601:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for XML parsing.
 2602:      */
 2603:     public function set_parser_class($class = 'SimplePie_Parser')
 2604:     {
 2605:         return $this->registry->register('Parser', $class, true);
 2606:     }
 2607: 
 2608:     /**
 2609:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for remote file fetching.
 2610:      */
 2611:     public function set_file_class($class = 'SimplePie_File')
 2612:     {
 2613:         return $this->registry->register('File', $class, true);
 2614:     }
 2615: 
 2616:     /**
 2617:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for data sanitization.
 2618:      */
 2619:     public function set_sanitize_class($class = 'SimplePie_Sanitize')
 2620:     {
 2621:         return $this->registry->register('Sanitize', $class, true);
 2622:     }
 2623: 
 2624:     /**
 2625:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for handling feed items.
 2626:      */
 2627:     public function set_item_class($class = 'SimplePie_Item')
 2628:     {
 2629:         return $this->registry->register('Item', $class, true);
 2630:     }
 2631: 
 2632:     /**
 2633:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for handling author data.
 2634:      */
 2635:     public function set_author_class($class = 'SimplePie_Author')
 2636:     {
 2637:         return $this->registry->register('Author', $class, true);
 2638:     }
 2639: 
 2640:     /**
 2641:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for handling category data.
 2642:      */
 2643:     public function set_category_class($class = 'SimplePie_Category')
 2644:     {
 2645:         return $this->registry->register('Category', $class, true);
 2646:     }
 2647: 
 2648:     /**
 2649:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for feed enclosures.
 2650:      */
 2651:     public function set_enclosure_class($class = 'SimplePie_Enclosure')
 2652:     {
 2653:         return $this->registry->register('Enclosure', $class, true);
 2654:     }
 2655: 
 2656:     /**
 2657:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for <media:text> captions
 2658:      */
 2659:     public function set_caption_class($class = 'SimplePie_Caption')
 2660:     {
 2661:         return $this->registry->register('Caption', $class, true);
 2662:     }
 2663: 
 2664:     /**
 2665:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for <media:copyright>
 2666:      */
 2667:     public function set_copyright_class($class = 'SimplePie_Copyright')
 2668:     {
 2669:         return $this->registry->register('Copyright', $class, true);
 2670:     }
 2671: 
 2672:     /**
 2673:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for <media:credit>
 2674:      */
 2675:     public function set_credit_class($class = 'SimplePie_Credit')
 2676:     {
 2677:         return $this->registry->register('Credit', $class, true);
 2678:     }
 2679: 
 2680:     /**
 2681:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for <media:rating>
 2682:      */
 2683:     public function set_rating_class($class = 'SimplePie_Rating')
 2684:     {
 2685:         return $this->registry->register('Rating', $class, true);
 2686:     }
 2687: 
 2688:     /**
 2689:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for <media:restriction>
 2690:      */
 2691:     public function set_restriction_class($class = 'SimplePie_Restriction')
 2692:     {
 2693:         return $this->registry->register('Restriction', $class, true);
 2694:     }
 2695: 
 2696:     /**
 2697:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses for content-type sniffing.
 2698:      */
 2699:     public function set_content_type_sniffer_class($class = 'SimplePie_Content_Type_Sniffer')
 2700:     {
 2701:         return $this->registry->register('Content_Type_Sniffer', $class, true);
 2702:     }
 2703: 
 2704:     /**
 2705:      * Allows you to change which class SimplePie uses item sources.
 2706:      */
 2707:     public function set_source_class($class = 'SimplePie_Source')
 2708:     {
 2709:         return $this->registry->register('Source', $class, true);
 2710:     }
 2711:     /**#@-*/
 2712: 
 2713:     /**
 2714:      * Allows you to override the default user agent string.
 2715:      *
 2716:      * @access public
 2717:      * @param string $ua New user agent string.
 2718:      */
 2719:     public function set_useragent($ua = SIMPLEPIE_USERAGENT)
 2720:     {
 2721:         $this->useragent = (string) $ua;
 2722:     }
 2723: 
 2724:     /**
 2725:      * Set callback function to create cache filename with
 2726:      *
 2727:      * @access public
 2728:      * @param mixed $function Callback function
 2729:      */
 2730:     public function set_cache_name_function($function = 'md5')
 2731:     {
 2732:         if (is_callable($function))
 2733:         {
 2734:             $this->cache_name_function = $function;
 2735:         }
 2736:     }
 2737: 
 2738:     /**
 2739:      * Set options to make SP as fast as possible.  Forgoes a
 2740:      * substantial amount of data sanitization in favor of speed.
 2741:      *
 2742:      * @access public
 2743:      * @param bool $set Whether to set them or not
 2744:      */
 2745:     public function set_stupidly_fast($set = false)
 2746:     {
 2747:         if ($set)
 2748:         {
 2749:             $this->enable_order_by_date(false);
 2750:             $this->remove_div(false);
 2751:             $this->strip_comments(false);
 2752:             $this->strip_htmltags(false);
 2753:             $this->strip_attributes(false);
 2754:             $this->set_image_handler(false);
 2755:         }
 2756:     }
 2757: 
 2758:     /**
 2759:      * Set maximum number of feeds to check with autodiscovery
 2760:      *
 2761:      * @access public
 2762:      * @param int $max Maximum number of feeds to check
 2763:      */
 2764:     public function set_max_checked_feeds($max = 10)
 2765:     {
 2766:         $this->max_checked_feeds = (int) $max;
 2767:     }
 2768: 
 2769:     public function remove_div($enable = true)
 2770:     {
 2771:         $this->sanitize->remove_div($enable);
 2772:     }
 2773: 
 2774:     public function strip_htmltags($tags = '', $encode = null)
 2775:     {
 2776:         if ($tags === '')
 2777:         {
 2778:             $tags = $this->strip_htmltags;
 2779:         }
 2780:         $this->sanitize->strip_htmltags($tags);
 2781:         if ($encode !== null)
 2782:         {
 2783:             $this->sanitize->encode_instead_of_strip($tags);
 2784:         }
 2785:     }
 2786: 
 2787:     public function encode_instead_of_strip($enable = true)
 2788:     {
 2789:         $this->sanitize->encode_instead_of_strip($enable);
 2790:     }
 2791: 
 2792:     public function strip_attributes($attribs = '')
 2793:     {
 2794:         if ($attribs === '')
 2795:         {
 2796:             $attribs = $this->strip_attributes;
 2797:         }
 2798:         $this->sanitize->strip_attributes($attribs);
 2799:     }
 2800: 
 2801:     public function set_output_encoding($encoding = 'UTF-8')
 2802:     {
 2803:         $this->sanitize->set_output_encoding($encoding);
 2804:     }
 2805: 
 2806:     public function strip_comments($strip = false)
 2807:     {
 2808:         $this->sanitize->strip_comments($strip);
 2809:     }
 2810: 
 2811:     /**
 2812:      * Set element/attribute key/value pairs of HTML attributes
 2813:      * containing URLs that need to be resolved relative to the feed
 2814:      *
 2815:      * @access public
 2816:      * @since 1.0
 2817:      * @param array $element_attribute Element/attribute key/value pairs
 2818:      */
 2819:     public function set_url_replacements($element_attribute = array('a' => 'href', 'area' => 'href', 'blockquote' => 'cite', 'del' => 'cite', 'form' => 'action', 'img' => array('longdesc', 'src'), 'input' => 'src', 'ins' => 'cite', 'q' => 'cite'))
 2820:     {
 2821:         $this->sanitize->set_url_replacements($element_attribute);
 2822:     }
 2823: 
 2824:     /**
 2825:      * Set the handler to enable the display of cached images.
 2826:      *
 2827:      * @access public
 2828:      * @param str $page Web-accessible path to the handler_image.php file.
 2829:      * @param str $qs The query string that the value should be passed to.
 2830:      */
 2831:     public function set_image_handler($page = false, $qs = 'i')
 2832:     {
 2833:         if ($page !== false)
 2834:         {
 2835:             $this->sanitize->set_image_handler($page . '?' . $qs . '=');
 2836:         }
 2837:         else
 2838:         {
 2839:             $this->image_handler = '';
 2840:         }
 2841:     }
 2842: 
 2843:     /**
 2844:      * Set the limit for items returned per-feed with multifeeds.
 2845:      *
 2846:      * @access public
 2847:      * @param integer $limit The maximum number of items to return.
 2848:      */
 2849:     public function set_item_limit($limit = 0)
 2850:     {
 2851:         $this->item_limit = (int) $limit;
 2852:     }
 2853: 
 2854:     public function init()
 2855:     {
 2856:         // Check absolute bare minimum requirements.
 2857:         if ((function_exists('version_compare') && version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.0', '<')) || !extension_loaded('xml') || !extension_loaded('pcre'))
 2858:         {
 2859:             return false;
 2860:         }
 2861:         // Then check the xml extension is sane (i.e., libxml 2.7.x issue on PHP < 5.2.9 and libxml 2.7.0 to 2.7.2 on any version) if we don't have xmlreader.
 2862:         elseif (!extension_loaded('xmlreader'))
 2863:         {
 2864:             static $xml_is_sane = null;
 2865:             if ($xml_is_sane === null)
 2866:             {
 2867:                 $parser_check = xml_parser_create();
 2868:                 xml_parse_into_struct($parser_check, '<foo>&amp;</foo>', $values);
 2869:                 xml_parser_free($parser_check);
 2870:                 $xml_is_sane = isset($values[0]['value']);
 2871:             }
 2872:             if (!$xml_is_sane)
 2873:             {
 2874:                 return false;
 2875:             }
 2876:         }
 2877: 
 2878:         if (method_exists($this->sanitize, 'set_registry'))
 2879:         {
 2880:             $this->sanitize->set_registry($this->registry);
 2881:         }
 2882: 
 2883:         // Pass whatever was set with config options over to the sanitizer.
 2884:         // Pass the classes in for legacy support; new classes should use the registry instead
 2885:         //$this->sanitize->pass_cache_data($this->cache, $this->cache_location, $this->cache_name_function, $this->registry->get_class('Cache'));
 2886:         $this->sanitize->pass_file_data($this->registry->get_class('File'), $this->timeout, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen);
 2887: 
 2888:         if (!empty($this->multifeed_url))
 2889:         {
 2890:             $i = 0;
 2891:             $success = 0;
 2892:             $this->multifeed_objects = array();
 2893:             foreach ($this->multifeed_url as $url)
 2894:             {
 2895:                 $this->multifeed_objects[$i] = clone $this;
 2896:                 $this->multifeed_objects[$i]->set_feed_url($url);
 2897:                 $success |= $this->multifeed_objects[$i]->init();
 2898:                 $i++;
 2899:             }
 2900:             return (bool) $success;
 2901:         }
 2902:         elseif ($this->feed_url === null && $this->raw_data === null)
 2903:         {
 2904:             return false;
 2905:         }
 2906: 
 2907:         $this->error = null;
 2908:         $this->data = array();
 2909:         $this->multifeed_objects = array();
 2910:         $cache = false;
 2911: 
 2912:         if ($this->feed_url !== null)
 2913:         {
 2914:             $parsed_feed_url = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'parse_url', array($this->feed_url));
 2915:             // Decide whether to enable caching
 2916:             if ($this->cache && $parsed_feed_url['scheme'] !== '')
 2917:             {
 2918:                 $cache = $this->registry->call('Cache', 'create', array($this->cache_location, call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $this->feed_url), 'spc'));
 2919:             }
 2920:             // If it's enabled and we don't want an XML dump, use the cache
 2921:             if ($cache && !$this->xml_dump)
 2922:             {
 2923:                 // Load the Cache
 2924:                 $this->data = $cache->load();
 2925:                 if (!empty($this->data))
 2926:                 {
 2927:                     // If the cache is for an outdated build of SimplePie
 2928:                     if (!isset($this->data['build']) || $this->data['build'] !== SIMPLEPIE_BUILD)
 2929:                     {
 2930:                         $cache->unlink();
 2931:                         $this->data = array();
 2932:                     }
 2933:                     // If we've hit a collision just rerun it with caching disabled
 2934:                     elseif (isset($this->data['url']) && $this->data['url'] !== $this->feed_url)
 2935:                     {
 2936:                         $cache = false;
 2937:                         $this->data = array();
 2938:                     }
 2939:                     // If we've got a non feed_url stored (if the page isn't actually a feed, or is a redirect) use that URL.
 2940:                     elseif (isset($this->data['feed_url']))
 2941:                     {
 2942:                         // If the autodiscovery cache is still valid use it.
 2943:                         if ($cache->mtime() + $this->autodiscovery_cache_duration > time())
 2944:                         {
 2945:                             // Do not need to do feed autodiscovery yet.
 2946:                             if ($this->data['feed_url'] !== $this->data['url']) {
 2947:                                 $this->set_feed_url($this->data['feed_url']);
 2948:                                 return $this->init();
 2949:                             }
 2950: 
 2951:                             $cache->unlink();
 2952:                             $this->data = array();
 2953:                         }
 2954:                     }
 2955:                     // Check if the cache has been updated
 2956:                     elseif ($cache->mtime() + $this->cache_duration < time())
 2957:                     {
 2958:                         // If we have last-modified and/or etag set
 2959:                         if (isset($this->data['headers']['last-modified']) || isset($this->data['headers']['etag']))
 2960:                         {
 2961:                             $headers = array(
 2962:                                 'Accept' => 'application/atom+xml, application/rss+xml, application/rdf+xml;q=0.9, application/xml;q=0.8, text/xml;q=0.8, text/html;q=0.7, unknown/unknown;q=0.1, application/unknown;q=0.1, */*;q=0.1',
 2963:                             );
 2964:                             if (isset($this->data['headers']['last-modified']))
 2965:                             {
 2966:                                 $headers['if-modified-since'] = $this->data['headers']['last-modified'];
 2967:                             }
 2968:                             if (isset($this->data['headers']['etag']))
 2969:                             {
 2970:                                 $headers['if-none-match'] = $this->data['headers']['etag'];
 2971:                             }
 2972: 
 2973:                             $file = $this->registry->create('File', array($this->feed_url, $this->timeout/10, 5, $headers, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen));
 2974: 
 2975:                             if ($file->success)
 2976:                             {
 2977:                                 if ($file->status_code === 304)
 2978:                                 {
 2979:                                     $cache->touch();
 2980:                                     return true;
 2981:                                 }
 2982: 
 2983:                                 $headers = $file->headers;
 2984:                             }
 2985:                             else
 2986:                             {
 2987:                                 unset($file);
 2988:                             }
 2989:                         }
 2990:                     }
 2991:                     // If the cache is still valid, just return true
 2992:                     else
 2993:                     {
 2994:                         $this->raw_data = false;
 2995:                         return true;
 2996:                     }
 2997:                 }
 2998:                 // If the cache is empty, delete it
 2999:                 else
 3000:                 {
 3001:                     $cache->unlink();
 3002:                     $this->data = array();
 3003:                 }
 3004:             }
 3005:             // If we don't already have the file (it'll only exist if we've opened it to check if the cache has been modified), open it.
 3006:             if (!isset($file))
 3007:             {
 3008:                 if ($this->file instanceof SimplePie_File && $this->file->url === $this->feed_url)
 3009:                 {
 3010:                     $file =& $this->file;
 3011:                 }
 3012:                 else
 3013:                 {
 3014:                     $headers = array(
 3015:                         'Accept' => 'application/atom+xml, application/rss+xml, application/rdf+xml;q=0.9, application/xml;q=0.8, text/xml;q=0.8, text/html;q=0.7, unknown/unknown;q=0.1, application/unknown;q=0.1, */*;q=0.1',
 3016:                     );
 3017:                     $file = $this->registry->create('File', array($this->feed_url, $this->timeout, 5, $headers, $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen));
 3018:                 }
 3019:             }
 3020:             // If the file connection has an error, set SimplePie::error to that and quit
 3021:             if (!$file->success && !($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($file->status_code === 200 || $file->status_code > 206 && $file->status_code < 300)))
 3022:             {
 3023:                 $this->error = $file->error;
 3024:                 return !empty($this->data);
 3025:             }
 3026: 
 3027:             if (!$this->force_feed)
 3028:             {
 3029:                 // Check if the supplied URL is a feed, if it isn't, look for it.
 3030:                 $locate = $this->registry->create('Locator', array(&$file, $this->timeout, $this->useragent, $this->max_checked_feeds));
 3031: 
 3032:                 if (!$locate->is_feed($file))
 3033:                 {
 3034:                     // We need to unset this so that if SimplePie::set_file() has been called that object is untouched
 3035:                     unset($file);
 3036:                     if (!($file = $locate->find($this->autodiscovery, $this->all_discovered_feeds)))
 3037:                     {
 3038:                         $this->error = "A feed could not be found at $this->feed_url. A feed with an invalid mime type may fall victim to this error, or " . SIMPLEPIE_NAME . " was unable to auto-discover it.. Use force_feed() if you are certain this URL is a real feed.";
 3039:                         $this->registry->call('Misc', 'error', array($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__));
 3040:                         return false;
 3041:                     }
 3042:                     if ($cache)
 3043:                     {
 3044:                         $this->data = array('url' => $this->feed_url, 'feed_url' => $file->url, 'build' => SIMPLEPIE_BUILD);
 3045:                         if (!$cache->save($this))
 3046:                         {
 3047:                             trigger_error("$this->cache_location is not writeable. Make sure you've set the correct relative or absolute path, and that the location is server-writable.", E_USER_WARNING);
 3048:                         }
 3049:                         $cache = $this->registry->call('Cache', 'create', array($this->cache_location, call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $file->url), 'spc'));
 3050:                     }
 3051:                     $this->feed_url = $file->url;
 3052:                 }
 3053:                 $locate = null;
 3054:             }
 3055: 
 3056:             $headers = $file->headers;
 3057:             $data = $file->body;
 3058:             $sniffer = $this->registry->create('Content_Type_Sniffer', array(&$file));
 3059:             $sniffed = $sniffer->get_type();
 3060:         }
 3061:         else
 3062:         {
 3063:             $data = $this->raw_data;
 3064:         }
 3065: 
 3066:         // This is exposed via get_raw_data()
 3067:         $this->raw_data = $data;
 3068: 
 3069:         // Set up array of possible encodings
 3070:         $encodings = array();
 3071: 
 3072:         // First check to see if input has been overridden.
 3073:         if ($this->input_encoding !== false)
 3074:         {
 3075:             $encodings[] = $this->input_encoding;
 3076:         }
 3077: 
 3078:         $application_types = array('application/xml', 'application/xml-dtd', 'application/xml-external-parsed-entity');
 3079:         $text_types = array('text/xml', 'text/xml-external-parsed-entity');
 3080: 
 3081:         // RFC 3023 (only applies to sniffed content)
 3082:         if (isset($sniffed))
 3083:         {
 3084:             if (in_array($sniffed, $application_types) || substr($sniffed, 0, 12) === 'application/' && substr($sniffed, -4) === '+xml')
 3085:             {
 3086:                 if (isset($headers['content-type']) && preg_match('/;\x20?charset=([^;]*)/i', $headers['content-type'], $charset))
 3087:                 {
 3088:                     $encodings[] = strtoupper($charset[1]);
 3089:                 }
 3090:                 $encodings = array_merge($encodings, $this->registry->call('Misc', 'xml_encoding', array($data, &$this->registry)));
 3091:                 $encodings[] = 'UTF-8';
 3092:             }
 3093:             elseif (in_array($sniffed, $text_types) || substr($sniffed, 0, 5) === 'text/' && substr($sniffed, -4) === '+xml')
 3094:             {
 3095:                 if (isset($headers['content-type']) && preg_match('/;\x20?charset=([^;]*)/i', $headers['content-type'], $charset))
 3096:                 {
 3097:                     $encodings[] = $charset[1];
 3098:                 }
 3099:                 $encodings[] = 'US-ASCII';
 3100:             }
 3101:             // Text MIME-type default
 3102:             elseif (substr($sniffed, 0, 5) === 'text/')
 3103:             {
 3104:                 $encodings[] = 'US-ASCII';
 3105:             }
 3106:         }
 3107: 
 3108:         // Fallback to XML 1.0 Appendix F.1/UTF-8/ISO-8859-1
 3109:         $encodings = array_merge($encodings, $this->registry->call('Misc', 'xml_encoding', array($data, &$this->registry)));
 3110:         $encodings[] = 'UTF-8';
 3111:         $encodings[] = 'ISO-8859-1';
 3112: 
 3113:         // There's no point in trying an encoding twice
 3114:         $encodings = array_unique($encodings);
 3115: 
 3116:         // If we want the XML, just output that with the most likely encoding and quit
 3117:         if ($this->xml_dump)
 3118:         {
 3119:             header('Content-type: text/xml; charset=' . $encodings[0]);
 3120:             echo $data;
 3121:             exit;
 3122:         }
 3123: 
 3124:         // Loop through each possible encoding, till we return something, or run out of possibilities
 3125:         foreach ($encodings as $encoding)
 3126:         {
 3127:             // Change the encoding to UTF-8 (as we always use UTF-8 internally)
 3128:             if ($utf8_data = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'change_encoding', array($data, $encoding, 'UTF-8')))
 3129:             {
 3130:                 // Create new parser
 3131:                 $parser = $this->registry->create('Parser');
 3132: 
 3133:                 // If it's parsed fine
 3134:                 if ($parser->parse($utf8_data, 'UTF-8'))
 3135:                 {
 3136:                     $this->data = $parser->get_data();
 3137:                     if (!($this->get_type() & ~SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_NONE))
 3138:                     {
 3139:                         $this->error = "A feed could not be found at $this->feed_url. This does not appear to be a valid RSS or Atom feed.";
 3140:                         $this->registry->call('Misc', 'error', array($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__));
 3141:                         return false;
 3142:                     }
 3143: 
 3144:                     if (isset($headers))
 3145:                     {
 3146:                         $this->data['headers'] = $headers;
 3147:                     }
 3148:                     $this->data['build'] = SIMPLEPIE_BUILD;
 3149: 
 3150:                     // Cache the file if caching is enabled
 3151:                     if ($cache && !$cache->save($this))
 3152:                     {
 3153:                         trigger_error("$this->cache_location is not writeable. Make sure you've set the correct relative or absolute path, and that the location is server-writable.", E_USER_WARNING);
 3154:                     }
 3155:                     return true;
 3156:                 }
 3157:             }
 3158:         }
 3159: 
 3160:         if (isset($parser))
 3161:         {
 3162:             // We have an error, just set SimplePie_Misc::error to it and quit
 3163:             $this->error = sprintf('This XML document is invalid, likely due to invalid characters. XML error: %s at line %d, column %d', $parser->get_error_string(), $parser->get_current_line(), $parser->get_current_column());
 3164:         }
 3165:         else
 3166:         {
 3167:             $this->error = 'The data could not be converted to UTF-8. You MUST have either the iconv or mbstring extension installed. Upgrading to PHP 5.x (which includes iconv) is highly recommended.';
 3168:         }
 3169: 
 3170:         $this->registry->call('Misc', 'error', array($this->error, E_USER_NOTICE, __FILE__, __LINE__));
 3171: 
 3172:         return false;
 3173:     }
 3174: 
 3175:     /**
 3176:      * Return the error message for the occured error
 3177:      *
 3178:      * @access public
 3179:      * @return string Error message
 3180:      */
 3181:     public function error()
 3182:     {
 3183:         return $this->error;
 3184:     }
 3185: 
 3186:     /**
 3187:      * Return the raw XML
 3188:      *
 3189:      * This is the same as setting `$xml_dump = true;`, but returns
 3190:      * the data instead of printing it.
 3191:      *
 3192:      * @return string|boolean Raw XML data, false if the cache is used
 3193:      */
 3194:     public function get_raw_data()
 3195:     {
 3196:         return $this->raw_data;
 3197:     }
 3198: 
 3199:     public function get_encoding()
 3200:     {
 3201:         return $this->sanitize->output_encoding;
 3202:     }
 3203: 
 3204:     public function handle_content_type($mime = 'text/html')
 3205:     {
 3206:         if (!headers_sent())
 3207:         {
 3208:             $header = "Content-type: $mime;";
 3209:             if ($this->get_encoding())
 3210:             {
 3211:                 $header .= ' charset=' . $this->get_encoding();
 3212:             }
 3213:             else
 3214:             {
 3215:                 $header .= ' charset=UTF-8';
 3216:             }
 3217:             header($header);
 3218:         }
 3219:     }
 3220: 
 3221:     public function get_type()
 3222:     {
 3223:         if (!isset($this->data['type']))
 3224:         {
 3225:             $this->data['type'] = SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ALL;
 3226:             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed']))
 3227:             {
 3228:                 $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_10;
 3229:             }
 3230:             elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed']))
 3231:             {
 3232:                 $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_03;
 3233:             }
 3234:             elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF']))
 3235:             {
 3236:                 if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['channel'])
 3237:                 || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['image'])
 3238:                 || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['item'])
 3239:                 || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10]['textinput']))
 3240:                 {
 3241:                     $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10;
 3242:                 }
 3243:                 if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['channel'])
 3244:                 || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['image'])
 3245:                 || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['item'])
 3246:                 || isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090]['textinput']))
 3247:                 {
 3248:                     $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090;
 3249:                 }
 3250:             }
 3251:             elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss']))
 3252:             {
 3253:                 $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_ALL;
 3254:                 if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['attribs']['']['version']))
 3255:                 {
 3256:                     switch (trim($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['attribs']['']['version']))
 3257:                     {
 3258:                         case '0.91':
 3259:                             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091;
 3260:                             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['skiphours']['hour'][0]['data']))
 3261:                             {
 3262:                                 switch (trim($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['skiphours']['hour'][0]['data']))
 3263:                                 {
 3264:                                     case '0':
 3265:                                         $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_NETSCAPE;
 3266:                                         break;
 3267: 
 3268:                                     case '24':
 3269:                                         $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_091_USERLAND;
 3270:                                         break;
 3271:                                 }
 3272:                             }
 3273:                             break;
 3274: 
 3275:                         case '0.92':
 3276:                             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_092;
 3277:                             break;
 3278: 
 3279:                         case '0.93':
 3280:                             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_093;
 3281:                             break;
 3282: 
 3283:                         case '0.94':
 3284:                             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_094;
 3285:                             break;
 3286: 
 3287:                         case '2.0':
 3288:                             $this->data['type'] &= SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_20;
 3289:                             break;
 3290:                     }
 3291:                 }
 3292:             }
 3293:             else
 3294:             {
 3295:                 $this->data['type'] = SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_NONE;
 3296:             }
 3297:         }
 3298:         return $this->data['type'];
 3299:     }
 3300: 
 3301:     /**
 3302:      * @todo If we have a perm redirect we should return the new URL
 3303:      * @todo When we make the above change, let's support <itunes:new-feed-url> as well
 3304:      * @todo Also, |atom:link|@rel=self
 3305:      */
 3306:     public function subscribe_url()
 3307:     {
 3308:         if ($this->feed_url !== null)
 3309:         {
 3310:             return $this->sanitize($this->feed_url, SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 3311:         }
 3312:         else
 3313:         {
 3314:             return null;
 3315:         }
 3316:     }
 3317: 
 3318:     public function get_feed_tags($namespace, $tag)
 3319:     {
 3320:         $type = $this->get_type();
 3321:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_10)
 3322:         {
 3323:             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3324:             {
 3325:                 return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3326:             }
 3327:         }
 3328:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_03)
 3329:         {
 3330:             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3331:             {
 3332:                 return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3333:             }
 3334:         }
 3335:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_RDF)
 3336:         {
 3337:             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3338:             {
 3339:                 return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3340:             }
 3341:         }
 3342:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
 3343:         {
 3344:             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3345:             {
 3346:                 return $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20]['rss'][0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3347:             }
 3348:         }
 3349:         return null;
 3350:     }
 3351: 
 3352:     public function get_channel_tags($namespace, $tag)
 3353:     {
 3354:         $type = $this->get_type();
 3355:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_ATOM_ALL)
 3356:         {
 3357:             if ($return = $this->get_feed_tags($namespace, $tag))
 3358:             {
 3359:                 return $return;
 3360:             }
 3361:         }
 3362:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10)
 3363:         {
 3364:             if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'channel'))
 3365:             {
 3366:                 if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3367:                 {
 3368:                     return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3369:                 }
 3370:             }
 3371:         }
 3372:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090)
 3373:         {
 3374:             if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'channel'))
 3375:             {
 3376:                 if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3377:                 {
 3378:                     return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3379:                 }
 3380:             }
 3381:         }
 3382:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
 3383:         {
 3384:             if ($channel = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'channel'))
 3385:             {
 3386:                 if (isset($channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3387:                 {
 3388:                     return $channel[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3389:                 }
 3390:             }
 3391:         }
 3392:         return null;
 3393:     }
 3394: 
 3395:     public function get_image_tags($namespace, $tag)
 3396:     {
 3397:         $type = $this->get_type();
 3398:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_10)
 3399:         {
 3400:             if ($image = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'image'))
 3401:             {
 3402:                 if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3403:                 {
 3404:                     return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3405:                 }
 3406:             }
 3407:         }
 3408:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_090)
 3409:         {
 3410:             if ($image = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'image'))
 3411:             {
 3412:                 if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3413:                 {
 3414:                     return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3415:                 }
 3416:             }
 3417:         }
 3418:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION)
 3419:         {
 3420:             if ($image = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'image'))
 3421:             {
 3422:                 if (isset($image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 3423:                 {
 3424:                     return $image[0]['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 3425:                 }
 3426:             }
 3427:         }
 3428:         return null;
 3429:     }
 3430: 
 3431:     public function get_base($element = array())
 3432:     {
 3433:         if (!($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION) && !empty($element['xml_base_explicit']) && isset($element['xml_base']))
 3434:         {
 3435:             return $element['xml_base'];
 3436:         }
 3437:         elseif ($this->get_link() !== null)
 3438:         {
 3439:             return $this->get_link();
 3440:         }
 3441:         else
 3442:         {
 3443:             return $this->subscribe_url();
 3444:         }
 3445:     }
 3446: 
 3447:     public function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
 3448:     {
 3449:         return $this->sanitize->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
 3450:     }
 3451: 
 3452:     public function get_title()
 3453:     {
 3454:         if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
 3455:         {
 3456:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3457:         }
 3458:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
 3459:         {
 3460:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3461:         }
 3462:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
 3463:         {
 3464:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3465:         }
 3466:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
 3467:         {
 3468:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3469:         }
 3470:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
 3471:         {
 3472:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3473:         }
 3474:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
 3475:         {
 3476:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3477:         }
 3478:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
 3479:         {
 3480:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3481:         }
 3482:         else
 3483:         {
 3484:             return null;
 3485:         }
 3486:     }
 3487: 
 3488:     public function get_category($key = 0)
 3489:     {
 3490:         $categories = $this->get_categories();
 3491:         if (isset($categories[$key]))
 3492:         {
 3493:             return $categories[$key];
 3494:         }
 3495:         else
 3496:         {
 3497:             return null;
 3498:         }
 3499:     }
 3500: 
 3501:     public function get_categories()
 3502:     {
 3503:         $categories = array();
 3504: 
 3505:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
 3506:         {
 3507:             $term = null;
 3508:             $scheme = null;
 3509:             $label = null;
 3510:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
 3511:             {
 3512:                 $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3513:             }
 3514:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 3515:             {
 3516:                 $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3517:             }
 3518:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
 3519:             {
 3520:                 $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3521:             }
 3522:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 3523:         }
 3524:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
 3525:         {
 3526:             // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
 3527:             // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
 3528:             $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3529:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
 3530:             {
 3531:                 $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3532:             }
 3533:             else
 3534:             {
 3535:                 $scheme = null;
 3536:             }
 3537:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, null));
 3538:         }
 3539:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
 3540:         {
 3541:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 3542:         }
 3543:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
 3544:         {
 3545:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 3546:         }
 3547: 
 3548:         if (!empty($categories))
 3549:         {
 3550:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories));
 3551:         }
 3552:         else
 3553:         {
 3554:             return null;
 3555:         }
 3556:     }
 3557: 
 3558:     public function get_author($key = 0)
 3559:     {
 3560:         $authors = $this->get_authors();
 3561:         if (isset($authors[$key]))
 3562:         {
 3563:             return $authors[$key];
 3564:         }
 3565:         else
 3566:         {
 3567:             return null;
 3568:         }
 3569:     }
 3570: 
 3571:     public function get_authors()
 3572:     {
 3573:         $authors = array();
 3574:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
 3575:         {
 3576:             $name = null;
 3577:             $uri = null;
 3578:             $email = null;
 3579:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
 3580:             {
 3581:                 $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3582:             }
 3583:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
 3584:             {
 3585:                 $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
 3586:             }
 3587:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
 3588:             {
 3589:                 $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3590:             }
 3591:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
 3592:             {
 3593:                 $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $uri, $email));
 3594:             }
 3595:         }
 3596:         if ($author = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
 3597:         {
 3598:             $name = null;
 3599:             $url = null;
 3600:             $email = null;
 3601:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
 3602:             {
 3603:                 $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3604:             }
 3605:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
 3606:             {
 3607:                 $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
 3608:             }
 3609:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
 3610:             {
 3611:                 $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3612:             }
 3613:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
 3614:             {
 3615:                 $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $url, $email));
 3616:             }
 3617:         }
 3618:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
 3619:         {
 3620:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 3621:         }
 3622:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
 3623:         {
 3624:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 3625:         }
 3626:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
 3627:         {
 3628:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 3629:         }
 3630: 
 3631:         if (!empty($authors))
 3632:         {
 3633:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($authors));
 3634:         }
 3635:         else
 3636:         {
 3637:             return null;
 3638:         }
 3639:     }
 3640: 
 3641:     public function get_contributor($key = 0)
 3642:     {
 3643:         $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
 3644:         if (isset($contributors[$key]))
 3645:         {
 3646:             return $contributors[$key];
 3647:         }
 3648:         else
 3649:         {
 3650:             return null;
 3651:         }
 3652:     }
 3653: 
 3654:     public function get_contributors()
 3655:     {
 3656:         $contributors = array();
 3657:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
 3658:         {
 3659:             $name = null;
 3660:             $uri = null;
 3661:             $email = null;
 3662:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
 3663:             {
 3664:                 $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3665:             }
 3666:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
 3667:             {
 3668:                 $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
 3669:             }
 3670:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
 3671:             {
 3672:                 $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3673:             }
 3674:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
 3675:             {
 3676:                 $contributors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $uri, $email));
 3677:             }
 3678:         }
 3679:         foreach ((array) $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
 3680:         {
 3681:             $name = null;
 3682:             $url = null;
 3683:             $email = null;
 3684:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
 3685:             {
 3686:                 $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3687:             }
 3688:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
 3689:             {
 3690:                 $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
 3691:             }
 3692:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
 3693:             {
 3694:                 $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3695:             }
 3696:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
 3697:             {
 3698:                 $contributors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $url, $email));
 3699:             }
 3700:         }
 3701: 
 3702:         if (!empty($contributors))
 3703:         {
 3704:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($contributors));
 3705:         }
 3706:         else
 3707:         {
 3708:             return null;
 3709:         }
 3710:     }
 3711: 
 3712:     public function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
 3713:     {
 3714:         $links = $this->get_links($rel);
 3715:         if (isset($links[$key]))
 3716:         {
 3717:             return $links[$key];
 3718:         }
 3719:         else
 3720:         {
 3721:             return null;
 3722:         }
 3723:     }
 3724: 
 3725:     /**
 3726:      * Added for parity between the parent-level and the item/entry-level.
 3727:      */
 3728:     public function get_permalink()
 3729:     {
 3730:         return $this->get_link(0);
 3731:     }
 3732: 
 3733:     public function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
 3734:     {
 3735:         if (!isset($this->data['links']))
 3736:         {
 3737:             $this->data['links'] = array();
 3738:             if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link'))
 3739:             {
 3740:                 foreach ($links as $link)
 3741:                 {
 3742:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
 3743:                     {
 3744:                         $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
 3745:                         $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
 3746:                     }
 3747:                 }
 3748:             }
 3749:             if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link'))
 3750:             {
 3751:                 foreach ($links as $link)
 3752:                 {
 3753:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
 3754:                     {
 3755:                         $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
 3756:                         $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
 3757: 
 3758:                     }
 3759:                 }
 3760:             }
 3761:             if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
 3762:             {
 3763:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
 3764:             }
 3765:             if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
 3766:             {
 3767:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
 3768:             }
 3769:             if ($links = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
 3770:             {
 3771:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
 3772:             }
 3773: 
 3774:             $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
 3775:             foreach ($keys as $key)
 3776:             {
 3777:                 if ($this->registry->call('Misc', 'is_isegment_nz_nc', array($key)))
 3778:                 {
 3779:                     if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
 3780:                     {
 3781:                         $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
 3782:                         $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
 3783:                     }
 3784:                     else
 3785:                     {
 3786:                         $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
 3787:                     }
 3788:                 }
 3789:                 elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
 3790:                 {
 3791:                     $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
 3792:                 }
 3793:                 $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
 3794:             }
 3795:         }
 3796: 
 3797:         if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
 3798:         {
 3799:             return $this->data['links'][$rel];
 3800:         }
 3801:         else
 3802:         {
 3803:             return null;
 3804:         }
 3805:     }
 3806: 
 3807:     public function get_all_discovered_feeds()
 3808:     {
 3809:         return $this->all_discovered_feeds;
 3810:     }
 3811: 
 3812:     public function get_description()
 3813:     {
 3814:         if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'subtitle'))
 3815:         {
 3816:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3817:         }
 3818:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'tagline'))
 3819:         {
 3820:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3821:         }
 3822:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
 3823:         {
 3824:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3825:         }
 3826:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
 3827:         {
 3828:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3829:         }
 3830:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
 3831:         {
 3832:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3833:         }
 3834:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
 3835:         {
 3836:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3837:         }
 3838:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
 3839:         {
 3840:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3841:         }
 3842:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
 3843:         {
 3844:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3845:         }
 3846:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
 3847:         {
 3848:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3849:         }
 3850:         else
 3851:         {
 3852:             return null;
 3853:         }
 3854:     }
 3855: 
 3856:     public function get_copyright()
 3857:     {
 3858:         if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
 3859:         {
 3860:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3861:         }
 3862:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'copyright'))
 3863:         {
 3864:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3865:         }
 3866:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'copyright'))
 3867:         {
 3868:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3869:         }
 3870:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
 3871:         {
 3872:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3873:         }
 3874:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
 3875:         {
 3876:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3877:         }
 3878:         else
 3879:         {
 3880:             return null;
 3881:         }
 3882:     }
 3883: 
 3884:     public function get_language()
 3885:     {
 3886:         if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'language'))
 3887:         {
 3888:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3889:         }
 3890:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'language'))
 3891:         {
 3892:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3893:         }
 3894:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'language'))
 3895:         {
 3896:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3897:         }
 3898:         elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['xml_lang']))
 3899:         {
 3900:             return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['feed'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3901:         }
 3902:         elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['xml_lang']))
 3903:         {
 3904:             return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['feed'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3905:         }
 3906:         elseif (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['xml_lang']))
 3907:         {
 3908:             return $this->sanitize($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['RDF'][0]['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3909:         }
 3910:         elseif (isset($this->data['headers']['content-language']))
 3911:         {
 3912:             return $this->sanitize($this->data['headers']['content-language'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3913:         }
 3914:         else
 3915:         {
 3916:             return null;
 3917:         }
 3918:     }
 3919: 
 3920:     public function get_latitude()
 3921:     {
 3922: 
 3923:         if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
 3924:         {
 3925:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
 3926:         }
 3927:         elseif (($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
 3928:         {
 3929:             return (float) $match[1];
 3930:         }
 3931:         else
 3932:         {
 3933:             return null;
 3934:         }
 3935:     }
 3936: 
 3937:     public function get_longitude()
 3938:     {
 3939:         if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
 3940:         {
 3941:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
 3942:         }
 3943:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
 3944:         {
 3945:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
 3946:         }
 3947:         elseif (($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
 3948:         {
 3949:             return (float) $match[2];
 3950:         }
 3951:         else
 3952:         {
 3953:             return null;
 3954:         }
 3955:     }
 3956: 
 3957:     public function get_image_title()
 3958:     {
 3959:         if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
 3960:         {
 3961:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3962:         }
 3963:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
 3964:         {
 3965:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3966:         }
 3967:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
 3968:         {
 3969:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3970:         }
 3971:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
 3972:         {
 3973:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3974:         }
 3975:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
 3976:         {
 3977:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 3978:         }
 3979:         else
 3980:         {
 3981:             return null;
 3982:         }
 3983:     }
 3984: 
 3985:     public function get_image_url()
 3986:     {
 3987:         if ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'image'))
 3988:         {
 3989:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 3990:         }
 3991:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'logo'))
 3992:         {
 3993:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3994:         }
 3995:         elseif ($return = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
 3996:         {
 3997:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 3998:         }
 3999:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'url'))
 4000:         {
 4001:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 4002:         }
 4003:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'url'))
 4004:         {
 4005:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 4006:         }
 4007:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
 4008:         {
 4009:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 4010:         }
 4011:         else
 4012:         {
 4013:             return null;
 4014:         }
 4015:     }
 4016: 
 4017:     public function get_image_link()
 4018:     {
 4019:         if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
 4020:         {
 4021:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 4022:         }
 4023:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
 4024:         {
 4025:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 4026:         }
 4027:         elseif ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
 4028:         {
 4029:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 4030:         }
 4031:         else
 4032:         {
 4033:             return null;
 4034:         }
 4035:     }
 4036: 
 4037:     public function get_image_width()
 4038:     {
 4039:         if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'width'))
 4040:         {
 4041:             return round($return[0]['data']);
 4042:         }
 4043:         elseif ($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION && $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
 4044:         {
 4045:             return 88.0;
 4046:         }
 4047:         else
 4048:         {
 4049:             return null;
 4050:         }
 4051:     }
 4052: 
 4053:     public function get_image_height()
 4054:     {
 4055:         if ($return = $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'height'))
 4056:         {
 4057:             return round($return[0]['data']);
 4058:         }
 4059:         elseif ($this->get_type() & SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION && $this->get_image_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'url'))
 4060:         {
 4061:             return 31.0;
 4062:         }
 4063:         else
 4064:         {
 4065:             return null;
 4066:         }
 4067:     }
 4068: 
 4069:     public function get_item_quantity($max = 0)
 4070:     {
 4071:         $max = (int) $max;
 4072:         $qty = count($this->get_items());
 4073:         if ($max === 0)
 4074:         {
 4075:             return $qty;
 4076:         }
 4077:         else
 4078:         {
 4079:             return ($qty > $max) ? $max : $qty;
 4080:         }
 4081:     }
 4082: 
 4083:     public function get_item($key = 0)
 4084:     {
 4085:         $items = $this->get_items();
 4086:         if (isset($items[$key]))
 4087:         {
 4088:             return $items[$key];
 4089:         }
 4090:         else
 4091:         {
 4092:             return null;
 4093:         }
 4094:     }
 4095: 
 4096:     public function get_items($start = 0, $end = 0)
 4097:     {
 4098:         if (!isset($this->data['items']))
 4099:         {
 4100:             if (!empty($this->multifeed_objects))
 4101:             {
 4102:                 $this->data['items'] = SimplePie::merge_items($this->multifeed_objects, $start, $end, $this->item_limit);
 4103:             }
 4104:             else
 4105:             {
 4106:                 $this->data['items'] = array();
 4107:                 if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'entry'))
 4108:                 {
 4109:                     $keys = array_keys($items);
 4110:                     foreach ($keys as $key)
 4111:                     {
 4112:                         $this->data['items'][] = $this->registry->create('Item', array($this, $items[$key]));
 4113:                     }
 4114:                 }
 4115:                 if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'entry'))
 4116:                 {
 4117:                     $keys = array_keys($items);
 4118:                     foreach ($keys as $key)
 4119:                     {
 4120:                         $this->data['items'][] = $this->registry->create('Item', array($this, $items[$key]));
 4121:                     }
 4122:                 }
 4123:                 if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'item'))
 4124:                 {
 4125:                     $keys = array_keys($items);
 4126:                     foreach ($keys as $key)
 4127:                     {
 4128:                         $this->data['items'][] = $this->registry->create('Item', array($this, $items[$key]));
 4129:                     }
 4130:                 }
 4131:                 if ($items = $this->get_feed_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'item'))
 4132:                 {
 4133:                     $keys = array_keys($items);
 4134:                     foreach ($keys as $key)
 4135:                     {
 4136:                         $this->data['items'][] = $this->registry->create('Item', array($this, $items[$key]));
 4137:                     }
 4138:                 }
 4139:                 if ($items = $this->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'item'))
 4140:                 {
 4141:                     $keys = array_keys($items);
 4142:                     foreach ($keys as $key)
 4143:                     {
 4144:                         $this->data['items'][] = $this->registry->create('Item', array($this, $items[$key]));
 4145:                     }
 4146:                 }
 4147:             }
 4148:         }
 4149: 
 4150:         if (!empty($this->data['items']))
 4151:         {
 4152:             // If we want to order it by date, check if all items have a date, and then sort it
 4153:             if ($this->order_by_date && empty($this->multifeed_objects))
 4154:             {
 4155:                 if (!isset($this->data['ordered_items']))
 4156:                 {
 4157:                     $do_sort = true;
 4158:                     foreach ($this->data['items'] as $item)
 4159:                     {
 4160:                         if (!$item->get_date('U'))
 4161:                         {
 4162:                             $do_sort = false;
 4163:                             break;
 4164:                         }
 4165:                     }
 4166:                     $item = null;
 4167:                     $this->data['ordered_items'] = $this->data['items'];
 4168:                     if ($do_sort)
 4169:                     {
 4170:                         usort($this->data['ordered_items'], array(get_class($this), 'sort_items'));
 4171:                     }
 4172:                 }
 4173:                 $items = $this->data['ordered_items'];
 4174:             }
 4175:             else
 4176:             {
 4177:                 $items = $this->data['items'];
 4178:             }
 4179: 
 4180:             // Slice the data as desired
 4181:             if ($end === 0)
 4182:             {
 4183:                 return array_slice($items, $start);
 4184:             }
 4185:             else
 4186:             {
 4187:                 return array_slice($items, $start, $end);
 4188:             }
 4189:         }
 4190:         else
 4191:         {
 4192:             return array();
 4193:         }
 4194:     }
 4195: 
 4196:     public static function sort_items($a, $b)
 4197:     {
 4198:         return $a->get_date('U') <= $b->get_date('U');
 4199:     }
 4200: 
 4201:     public static function merge_items($urls, $start = 0, $end = 0, $limit = 0)
 4202:     {
 4203:         if (is_array($urls) && sizeof($urls) > 0)
 4204:         {
 4205:             $items = array();
 4206:             foreach ($urls as $arg)
 4207:             {
 4208:                 if ($arg instanceof SimplePie)
 4209:                 {
 4210:                     $items = array_merge($items, $arg->get_items(0, $limit));
 4211:                 }
 4212:                 else
 4213:                 {
