 4214:                     trigger_error('Arguments must be SimplePie objects', E_USER_WARNING);
 4215:                 }
 4216:             }
 4217: 
 4218:             $do_sort = true;
 4219:             foreach ($items as $item)
 4220:             {
 4221:                 if (!$item->get_date('U'))
 4222:                 {
 4223:                     $do_sort = false;
 4224:                     break;
 4225:                 }
 4226:             }
 4227:             $item = null;
 4228:             if ($do_sort)
 4229:             {
 4230:                 usort($items, array('SimplePie', 'sort_items'));
 4231:             }
 4232: 
 4233:             if ($end === 0)
 4234:             {
 4235:                 return array_slice($items, $start);
 4236:             }
 4237:             else
 4238:             {
 4239:                 return array_slice($items, $start, $end);
 4240:             }
 4241:         }
 4242:         else
 4243:         {
 4244:             trigger_error('Cannot merge zero SimplePie objects', E_USER_WARNING);
 4245:             return array();
 4246:         }
 4247:     }
 4248: }
 4249: 
 4250: /**
 4251:  * Handles `<media:credit>` as defined in Media RSS
 4252:  *
 4253:  * Used by {@see SimplePie_Enclosure::get_credit()} and {@see SimplePie_Enclosure::get_credits()}
 4254:  *
 4255:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_credit_class()}
 4256:  *
 4257:  * @package SimplePie
 4258:  */
 4259: class SimplePie_Credit
 4260: {
 4261:     /**
 4262:      * Credited role
 4263:      *
 4264:      * @var string
 4265:      * @see get_role()
 4266:      */
 4267:     var $role;
 4268: 
 4269:     /**
 4270:      * Organizational scheme
 4271:      *
 4272:      * @var string
 4273:      * @see get_scheme()
 4274:      */
 4275:     var $scheme;
 4276: 
 4277:     /**
 4278:      * Credited name
 4279:      *
 4280:      * @var string
 4281:      * @see get_name()
 4282:      */
 4283:     var $name;
 4284: 
 4285:     /**
 4286:      * Constructor, used to input the data
 4287:      *
 4288:      * For documentation on all the parameters, see the corresponding
 4289:      * properties and their accessors
 4290:      */
 4291:     public function __construct($role = null, $scheme = null, $name = null)
 4292:     {
 4293:         $this->role = $role;
 4294:         $this->scheme = $scheme;
 4295:         $this->name = $name;
 4296:     }
 4297: 
 4298:     /**
 4299:      * String-ified version
 4300:      *
 4301:      * @return string
 4302:      */
 4303:     public function __toString()
 4304:     {
 4305:         // There is no $this->data here
 4306:         return md5(serialize($this));
 4307:     }
 4308: 
 4309:     /**
 4310:      * Get the role of the person receiving credit
 4311:      *
 4312:      * @return string|null
 4313:      */
 4314:     public function get_role()
 4315:     {
 4316:         if ($this->role !== null)
 4317:         {
 4318:             return $this->role;
 4319:         }
 4320:         else
 4321:         {
 4322:             return null;
 4323:         }
 4324:     }
 4325: 
 4326:     /**
 4327:      * Get the organizational scheme
 4328:      *
 4329:      * @return string|null
 4330:      */
 4331:     public function get_scheme()
 4332:     {
 4333:         if ($this->scheme !== null)
 4334:         {
 4335:             return $this->scheme;
 4336:         }
 4337:         else
 4338:         {
 4339:             return null;
 4340:         }
 4341:     }
 4342: 
 4343:     /**
 4344:      * Get the credited person/entity's name
 4345:      *
 4346:      * @return string|null
 4347:      */
 4348:     public function get_name()
 4349:     {
 4350:         if ($this->name !== null)
 4351:         {
 4352:             return $this->name;
 4353:         }
 4354:         else
 4355:         {
 4356:             return null;
 4357:         }
 4358:     }
 4359: }
 4360: 
 4361: /**
 4362:  * Decode HTML Entities
 4363:  *
 4364:  * This implements HTML5 as of revision 967 (2007-06-28)
 4365:  *
 4366:  * @deprecated Use DOMDocument instead!
 4367:  * @package SimplePie
 4368:  */
 4369: class SimplePie_Decode_HTML_Entities
 4370: {
 4371:     /**
 4372:      * Data to be parsed
 4373:      *
 4374:      * @access private
 4375:      * @var string
 4376:      */
 4377:     var $data = '';
 4378: 
 4379:     /**
 4380:      * Currently consumed bytes
 4381:      *
 4382:      * @access private
 4383:      * @var string
 4384:      */
 4385:     var $consumed = '';
 4386: 
 4387:     /**
 4388:      * Position of the current byte being parsed
 4389:      *
 4390:      * @access private
 4391:      * @var int
 4392:      */
 4393:     var $position = 0;
 4394: 
 4395:     /**
 4396:      * Create an instance of the class with the input data
 4397:      *
 4398:      * @access public
 4399:      * @param string $data Input data
 4400:      */
 4401:     public function __construct($data)
 4402:     {
 4403:         $this->data = $data;
 4404:     }
 4405: 
 4406:     /**
 4407:      * Parse the input data
 4408:      *
 4409:      * @access public
 4410:      * @return string Output data
 4411:      */
 4412:     public function parse()
 4413:     {
 4414:         while (($this->position = strpos($this->data, '&', $this->position)) !== false)
 4415:         {
 4416:             $this->consume();
 4417:             $this->entity();
 4418:             $this->consumed = '';
 4419:         }
 4420:         return $this->data;
 4421:     }
 4422: 
 4423:     /**
 4424:      * Consume the next byte
 4425:      *
 4426:      * @access private
 4427:      * @return mixed The next byte, or false, if there is no more data
 4428:      */
 4429:     public function consume()
 4430:     {
 4431:         if (isset($this->data[$this->position]))
 4432:         {
 4433:             $this->consumed .= $this->data[$this->position];
 4434:             return $this->data[$this->position++];
 4435:         }
 4436:         else
 4437:         {
 4438:             return false;
 4439:         }
 4440:     }
 4441: 
 4442:     /**
 4443:      * Consume a range of characters
 4444:      *
 4445:      * @access private
 4446:      * @param string $chars Characters to consume
 4447:      * @return mixed A series of characters that match the range, or false
 4448:      */
 4449:     public function consume_range($chars)
 4450:     {
 4451:         if ($len = strspn($this->data, $chars, $this->position))
 4452:         {
 4453:             $data = substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
 4454:             $this->consumed .= $data;
 4455:             $this->position += $len;
 4456:             return $data;
 4457:         }
 4458:         else
 4459:         {
 4460:             return false;
 4461:         }
 4462:     }
 4463: 
 4464:     /**
 4465:      * Unconsume one byte
 4466:      *
 4467:      * @access private
 4468:      */
 4469:     public function unconsume()
 4470:     {
 4471:         $this->consumed = substr($this->consumed, 0, -1);
 4472:         $this->position--;
 4473:     }
 4474: 
 4475:     /**
 4476:      * Decode an entity
 4477:      *
 4478:      * @access private
 4479:      */
 4480:     public function entity()
 4481:     {
 4482:         switch ($this->consume())
 4483:         {
 4484:             case "\x09":
 4485:             case "\x0A":
 4486:             case "\x0B":
 4487:             case "\x0B":
 4488:             case "\x0C":
 4489:             case "\x20":
 4490:             case "\x3C":
 4491:             case "\x26":
 4492:             case false:
 4493:                 break;
 4494: 
 4495:             case "\x23":
 4496:                 switch ($this->consume())
 4497:                 {
 4498:                     case "\x78":
 4499:                     case "\x58":
 4500:                         $range = '0123456789ABCDEFabcdef';
 4501:                         $hex = true;
 4502:                         break;
 4503: 
 4504:                     default:
 4505:                         $range = '0123456789';
 4506:                         $hex = false;
 4507:                         $this->unconsume();
 4508:                         break;
 4509:                 }
 4510: 
 4511:                 if ($codepoint = $this->consume_range($range))
 4512:                 {
 4513:                     static $windows_1252_specials = array(0x0D => "\x0A", 0x80 => "\xE2\x82\xAC", 0x81 => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", 0x82 => "\xE2\x80\x9A", 0x83 => "\xC6\x92", 0x84 => "\xE2\x80\x9E", 0x85 => "\xE2\x80\xA6", 0x86 => "\xE2\x80\xA0", 0x87 => "\xE2\x80\xA1", 0x88 => "\xCB\x86", 0x89 => "\xE2\x80\xB0", 0x8A => "\xC5\xA0", 0x8B => "\xE2\x80\xB9", 0x8C => "\xC5\x92", 0x8D => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", 0x8E => "\xC5\xBD", 0x8F => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", 0x90 => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", 0x91 => "\xE2\x80\x98", 0x92 => "\xE2\x80\x99", 0x93 => "\xE2\x80\x9C", 0x94 => "\xE2\x80\x9D", 0x95 => "\xE2\x80\xA2", 0x96 => "\xE2\x80\x93", 0x97 => "\xE2\x80\x94", 0x98 => "\xCB\x9C", 0x99 => "\xE2\x84\xA2", 0x9A => "\xC5\xA1", 0x9B => "\xE2\x80\xBA", 0x9C => "\xC5\x93", 0x9D => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", 0x9E => "\xC5\xBE", 0x9F => "\xC5\xB8");
 4514: 
 4515:                     if ($hex)
 4516:                     {
 4517:                         $codepoint = hexdec($codepoint);
 4518:                     }
 4519:                     else
 4520:                     {
 4521:                         $codepoint = intval($codepoint);
 4522:                     }
 4523: 
 4524:                     if (isset($windows_1252_specials[$codepoint]))
 4525:                     {
 4526:                         $replacement = $windows_1252_specials[$codepoint];
 4527:                     }
 4528:                     else
 4529:                     {
 4530:                         $replacement = SimplePie_Misc::codepoint_to_utf8($codepoint);
 4531:                     }
 4532: 
 4533:                     if (!in_array($this->consume(), array(';', false), true))
 4534:                     {
 4535:                         $this->unconsume();
 4536:                     }
 4537: 
 4538:                     $consumed_length = strlen($this->consumed);
 4539:                     $this->data = substr_replace($this->data, $replacement, $this->position - $consumed_length, $consumed_length);
 4540:                     $this->position += strlen($replacement) - $consumed_length;
 4541:                 }
 4542:                 break;
 4543: 
 4544:             default:
 4545:                 static $entities = array('Aacute' => "\xC3\x81", 'aacute' => "\xC3\xA1", 'Aacute;' => "\xC3\x81", 'aacute;' => "\xC3\xA1", 'Acirc' => "\xC3\x82", 'acirc' => "\xC3\xA2", 'Acirc;' => "\xC3\x82", 'acirc;' => "\xC3\xA2", 'acute' => "\xC2\xB4", 'acute;' => "\xC2\xB4", 'AElig' => "\xC3\x86", 'aelig' => "\xC3\xA6", 'AElig;' => "\xC3\x86", 'aelig;' => "\xC3\xA6", 'Agrave' => "\xC3\x80", 'agrave' => "\xC3\xA0", 'Agrave;' => "\xC3\x80", 'agrave;' => "\xC3\xA0", 'alefsym;' => "\xE2\x84\xB5", 'Alpha;' => "\xCE\x91", 'alpha;' => "\xCE\xB1", 'AMP' => "\x26", 'amp' => "\x26", 'AMP;' => "\x26", 'amp;' => "\x26", 'and;' => "\xE2\x88\xA7", 'ang;' => "\xE2\x88\xA0", 'apos;' => "\x27", 'Aring' => "\xC3\x85", 'aring' => "\xC3\xA5", 'Aring;' => "\xC3\x85", 'aring;' => "\xC3\xA5", 'asymp;' => "\xE2\x89\x88", 'Atilde' => "\xC3\x83", 'atilde' => "\xC3\xA3", 'Atilde;' => "\xC3\x83", 'atilde;' => "\xC3\xA3", 'Auml' => "\xC3\x84", 'auml' => "\xC3\xA4", 'Auml;' => "\xC3\x84", 'auml;' => "\xC3\xA4", 'bdquo;' => "\xE2\x80\x9E", 'Beta;' => "\xCE\x92", 'beta;' => "\xCE\xB2", 'brvbar' => "\xC2\xA6", 'brvbar;' => "\xC2\xA6", 'bull;' => "\xE2\x80\xA2", 'cap;' => "\xE2\x88\xA9", 'Ccedil' => "\xC3\x87", 'ccedil' => "\xC3\xA7", 'Ccedil;' => "\xC3\x87", 'ccedil;' => "\xC3\xA7", 'cedil' => "\xC2\xB8", 'cedil;' => "\xC2\xB8", 'cent' => "\xC2\xA2", 'cent;' => "\xC2\xA2", 'Chi;' => "\xCE\xA7", 'chi;' => "\xCF\x87", 'circ;' => "\xCB\x86", 'clubs;' => "\xE2\x99\xA3", 'cong;' => "\xE2\x89\x85", 'COPY' => "\xC2\xA9", 'copy' => "\xC2\xA9", 'COPY;' => "\xC2\xA9", 'copy;' => "\xC2\xA9", 'crarr;' => "\xE2\x86\xB5", 'cup;' => "\xE2\x88\xAA", 'curren' => "\xC2\xA4", 'curren;' => "\xC2\xA4", 'Dagger;' => "\xE2\x80\xA1", 'dagger;' => "\xE2\x80\xA0", 'dArr;' => "\xE2\x87\x93", 'darr;' => "\xE2\x86\x93", 'deg' => "\xC2\xB0", 'deg;' => "\xC2\xB0", 'Delta;' => "\xCE\x94", 'delta;' => "\xCE\xB4", 'diams;' => "\xE2\x99\xA6", 'divide' => "\xC3\xB7", 'divide;' => "\xC3\xB7", 'Eacute' => "\xC3\x89", 'eacute' => "\xC3\xA9", 'Eacute;' => "\xC3\x89", 'eacute;' => "\xC3\xA9", 'Ecirc' => "\xC3\x8A", 'ecirc' => "\xC3\xAA", 'Ecirc;' => "\xC3\x8A", 'ecirc;' => "\xC3\xAA", 'Egrave' => "\xC3\x88", 'egrave' => "\xC3\xA8", 'Egrave;' => "\xC3\x88", 'egrave;' => "\xC3\xA8", 'empty;' => "\xE2\x88\x85", 'emsp;' => "\xE2\x80\x83", 'ensp;' => "\xE2\x80\x82", 'Epsilon;' => "\xCE\x95", 'epsilon;' => "\xCE\xB5", 'equiv;' => "\xE2\x89\xA1", 'Eta;' => "\xCE\x97", 'eta;' => "\xCE\xB7", 'ETH' => "\xC3\x90", 'eth' => "\xC3\xB0", 'ETH;' => "\xC3\x90", 'eth;' => "\xC3\xB0", 'Euml' => "\xC3\x8B", 'euml' => "\xC3\xAB", 'Euml;' => "\xC3\x8B", 'euml;' => "\xC3\xAB", 'euro;' => "\xE2\x82\xAC", 'exist;' => "\xE2\x88\x83", 'fnof;' => "\xC6\x92", 'forall;' => "\xE2\x88\x80", 'frac12' => "\xC2\xBD", 'frac12;' => "\xC2\xBD", 'frac14' => "\xC2\xBC", 'frac14;' => "\xC2\xBC", 'frac34' => "\xC2\xBE", 'frac34;' => "\xC2\xBE", 'frasl;' => "\xE2\x81\x84", 'Gamma;' => "\xCE\x93", 'gamma;' => "\xCE\xB3", 'ge;' => "\xE2\x89\xA5", 'GT' => "\x3E", 'gt' => "\x3E", 'GT;' => "\x3E", 'gt;' => "\x3E", 'hArr;' => "\xE2\x87\x94", 'harr;' => "\xE2\x86\x94", 'hearts;' => "\xE2\x99\xA5", 'hellip;' => "\xE2\x80\xA6", 'Iacute' => "\xC3\x8D", 'iacute' => "\xC3\xAD", 'Iacute;' => "\xC3\x8D", 'iacute;' => "\xC3\xAD", 'Icirc' => "\xC3\x8E", 'icirc' => "\xC3\xAE", 'Icirc;' => "\xC3\x8E", 'icirc;' => "\xC3\xAE", 'iexcl' => "\xC2\xA1", 'iexcl;' => "\xC2\xA1", 'Igrave' => "\xC3\x8C", 'igrave' => "\xC3\xAC", 'Igrave;' => "\xC3\x8C", 'igrave;' => "\xC3\xAC", 'image;' => "\xE2\x84\x91", 'infin;' => "\xE2\x88\x9E", 'int;' => "\xE2\x88\xAB", 'Iota;' => "\xCE\x99", 'iota;' => "\xCE\xB9", 'iquest' => "\xC2\xBF", 'iquest;' => "\xC2\xBF", 'isin;' => "\xE2\x88\x88", 'Iuml' => "\xC3\x8F", 'iuml' => "\xC3\xAF", 'Iuml;' => "\xC3\x8F", 'iuml;' => "\xC3\xAF", 'Kappa;' => "\xCE\x9A", 'kappa;' => "\xCE\xBA", 'Lambda;' => "\xCE\x9B", 'lambda;' => "\xCE\xBB", 'lang;' => "\xE3\x80\x88", 'laquo' => "\xC2\xAB", 'laquo;' => "\xC2\xAB", 'lArr;' => "\xE2\x87\x90", 'larr;' => "\xE2\x86\x90", 'lceil;' => "\xE2\x8C\x88", 'ldquo;' => "\xE2\x80\x9C", 'le;' => "\xE2\x89\xA4", 'lfloor;' => "\xE2\x8C\x8A", 'lowast;' => "\xE2\x88\x97", 'loz;' => "\xE2\x97\x8A", 'lrm;' => "\xE2\x80\x8E", 'lsaquo;' => "\xE2\x80\xB9", 'lsquo;' => "\xE2\x80\x98", 'LT' => "\x3C", 'lt' => "\x3C", 'LT;' => "\x3C", 'lt;' => "\x3C", 'macr' => "\xC2\xAF", 'macr;' => "\xC2\xAF", 'mdash;' => "\xE2\x80\x94", 'micro' => "\xC2\xB5", 'micro;' => "\xC2\xB5", 'middot' => "\xC2\xB7", 'middot;' => "\xC2\xB7", 'minus;' => "\xE2\x88\x92", 'Mu;' => "\xCE\x9C", 'mu;' => "\xCE\xBC", 'nabla;' => "\xE2\x88\x87", 'nbsp' => "\xC2\xA0", 'nbsp;' => "\xC2\xA0", 'ndash;' => "\xE2\x80\x93", 'ne;' => "\xE2\x89\xA0", 'ni;' => "\xE2\x88\x8B", 'not' => "\xC2\xAC", 'not;' => "\xC2\xAC", 'notin;' => "\xE2\x88\x89", 'nsub;' => "\xE2\x8A\x84", 'Ntilde' => "\xC3\x91", 'ntilde' => "\xC3\xB1", 'Ntilde;' => "\xC3\x91", 'ntilde;' => "\xC3\xB1", 'Nu;' => "\xCE\x9D", 'nu;' => "\xCE\xBD", 'Oacute' => "\xC3\x93", 'oacute' => "\xC3\xB3", 'Oacute;' => "\xC3\x93", 'oacute;' => "\xC3\xB3", 'Ocirc' => "\xC3\x94", 'ocirc' => "\xC3\xB4", 'Ocirc;' => "\xC3\x94", 'ocirc;' => "\xC3\xB4", 'OElig;' => "\xC5\x92", 'oelig;' => "\xC5\x93", 'Ograve' => "\xC3\x92", 'ograve' => "\xC3\xB2", 'Ograve;' => "\xC3\x92", 'ograve;' => "\xC3\xB2", 'oline;' => "\xE2\x80\xBE", 'Omega;' => "\xCE\xA9", 'omega;' => "\xCF\x89", 'Omicron;' => "\xCE\x9F", 'omicron;' => "\xCE\xBF", 'oplus;' => "\xE2\x8A\x95", 'or;' => "\xE2\x88\xA8", 'ordf' => "\xC2\xAA", 'ordf;' => "\xC2\xAA", 'ordm' => "\xC2\xBA", 'ordm;' => "\xC2\xBA", 'Oslash' => "\xC3\x98", 'oslash' => "\xC3\xB8", 'Oslash;' => "\xC3\x98", 'oslash;' => "\xC3\xB8", 'Otilde' => "\xC3\x95", 'otilde' => "\xC3\xB5", 'Otilde;' => "\xC3\x95", 'otilde;' => "\xC3\xB5", 'otimes;' => "\xE2\x8A\x97", 'Ouml' => "\xC3\x96", 'ouml' => "\xC3\xB6", 'Ouml;' => "\xC3\x96", 'ouml;' => "\xC3\xB6", 'para' => "\xC2\xB6", 'para;' => "\xC2\xB6", 'part;' => "\xE2\x88\x82", 'permil;' => "\xE2\x80\xB0", 'perp;' => "\xE2\x8A\xA5", 'Phi;' => "\xCE\xA6", 'phi;' => "\xCF\x86", 'Pi;' => "\xCE\xA0", 'pi;' => "\xCF\x80", 'piv;' => "\xCF\x96", 'plusmn' => "\xC2\xB1", 'plusmn;' => "\xC2\xB1", 'pound' => "\xC2\xA3", 'pound;' => "\xC2\xA3", 'Prime;' => "\xE2\x80\xB3", 'prime;' => "\xE2\x80\xB2", 'prod;' => "\xE2\x88\x8F", 'prop;' => "\xE2\x88\x9D", 'Psi;' => "\xCE\xA8", 'psi;' => "\xCF\x88", 'QUOT' => "\x22", 'quot' => "\x22", 'QUOT;' => "\x22", 'quot;' => "\x22", 'radic;' => "\xE2\x88\x9A", 'rang;' => "\xE3\x80\x89", 'raquo' => "\xC2\xBB", 'raquo;' => "\xC2\xBB", 'rArr;' => "\xE2\x87\x92", 'rarr;' => "\xE2\x86\x92", 'rceil;' => "\xE2\x8C\x89", 'rdquo;' => "\xE2\x80\x9D", 'real;' => "\xE2\x84\x9C", 'REG' => "\xC2\xAE", 'reg' => "\xC2\xAE", 'REG;' => "\xC2\xAE", 'reg;' => "\xC2\xAE", 'rfloor;' => "\xE2\x8C\x8B", 'Rho;' => "\xCE\xA1", 'rho;' => "\xCF\x81", 'rlm;' => "\xE2\x80\x8F", 'rsaquo;' => "\xE2\x80\xBA", 'rsquo;' => "\xE2\x80\x99", 'sbquo;' => "\xE2\x80\x9A", 'Scaron;' => "\xC5\xA0", 'scaron;' => "\xC5\xA1", 'sdot;' => "\xE2\x8B\x85", 'sect' => "\xC2\xA7", 'sect;' => "\xC2\xA7", 'shy' => "\xC2\xAD", 'shy;' => "\xC2\xAD", 'Sigma;' => "\xCE\xA3", 'sigma;' => "\xCF\x83", 'sigmaf;' => "\xCF\x82", 'sim;' => "\xE2\x88\xBC", 'spades;' => "\xE2\x99\xA0", 'sub;' => "\xE2\x8A\x82", 'sube;' => "\xE2\x8A\x86", 'sum;' => "\xE2\x88\x91", 'sup;' => "\xE2\x8A\x83", 'sup1' => "\xC2\xB9", 'sup1;' => "\xC2\xB9", 'sup2' => "\xC2\xB2", 'sup2;' => "\xC2\xB2", 'sup3' => "\xC2\xB3", 'sup3;' => "\xC2\xB3", 'supe;' => "\xE2\x8A\x87", 'szlig' => "\xC3\x9F", 'szlig;' => "\xC3\x9F", 'Tau;' => "\xCE\xA4", 'tau;' => "\xCF\x84", 'there4;' => "\xE2\x88\xB4", 'Theta;' => "\xCE\x98", 'theta;' => "\xCE\xB8", 'thetasym;' => "\xCF\x91", 'thinsp;' => "\xE2\x80\x89", 'THORN' => "\xC3\x9E", 'thorn' => "\xC3\xBE", 'THORN;' => "\xC3\x9E", 'thorn;' => "\xC3\xBE", 'tilde;' => "\xCB\x9C", 'times' => "\xC3\x97", 'times;' => "\xC3\x97", 'TRADE;' => "\xE2\x84\xA2", 'trade;' => "\xE2\x84\xA2", 'Uacute' => "\xC3\x9A", 'uacute' => "\xC3\xBA", 'Uacute;' => "\xC3\x9A", 'uacute;' => "\xC3\xBA", 'uArr;' => "\xE2\x87\x91", 'uarr;' => "\xE2\x86\x91", 'Ucirc' => "\xC3\x9B", 'ucirc' => "\xC3\xBB", 'Ucirc;' => "\xC3\x9B", 'ucirc;' => "\xC3\xBB", 'Ugrave' => "\xC3\x99", 'ugrave' => "\xC3\xB9", 'Ugrave;' => "\xC3\x99", 'ugrave;' => "\xC3\xB9", 'uml' => "\xC2\xA8", 'uml;' => "\xC2\xA8", 'upsih;' => "\xCF\x92", 'Upsilon;' => "\xCE\xA5", 'upsilon;' => "\xCF\x85", 'Uuml' => "\xC3\x9C", 'uuml' => "\xC3\xBC", 'Uuml;' => "\xC3\x9C", 'uuml;' => "\xC3\xBC", 'weierp;' => "\xE2\x84\x98", 'Xi;' => "\xCE\x9E", 'xi;' => "\xCE\xBE", 'Yacute' => "\xC3\x9D", 'yacute' => "\xC3\xBD", 'Yacute;' => "\xC3\x9D", 'yacute;' => "\xC3\xBD", 'yen' => "\xC2\xA5", 'yen;' => "\xC2\xA5", 'yuml' => "\xC3\xBF", 'Yuml;' => "\xC5\xB8", 'yuml;' => "\xC3\xBF", 'Zeta;' => "\xCE\x96", 'zeta;' => "\xCE\xB6", 'zwj;' => "\xE2\x80\x8D", 'zwnj;' => "\xE2\x80\x8C");
 4546: 
 4547:                 for ($i = 0, $match = null; $i < 9 && $this->consume() !== false; $i++)
 4548:                 {
 4549:                     $consumed = substr($this->consumed, 1);
 4550:                     if (isset($entities[$consumed]))
 4551:                     {
 4552:                         $match = $consumed;
 4553:                     }
 4554:                 }
 4555: 
 4556:                 if ($match !== null)
 4557:                 {
 4558:                     $this->data = substr_replace($this->data, $entities[$match], $this->position - strlen($consumed) - 1, strlen($match) + 1);
 4559:                     $this->position += strlen($entities[$match]) - strlen($consumed) - 1;
 4560:                 }
 4561:                 break;
 4562:         }
 4563:     }
 4564: }
 4565: 
 4566: /**
 4567:  * Handles everything related to enclosures (including Media RSS and iTunes RSS)
 4568:  *
 4569:  * Used by {@see SimplePie_Item::get_enclosure()} and {@see SimplePie_Item::get_enclosures()}
 4570:  *
 4571:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_enclosure_class()}
 4572:  *
 4573:  * @package SimplePie
 4574:  */
 4575: class SimplePie_Enclosure
 4576: {
 4577:     /**
 4578:      * @var string
 4579:      * @see get_bitrate()
 4580:      */
 4581:     var $bitrate;
 4582: 
 4583:     /**
 4584:      * @var array
 4585:      * @see get_captions()
 4586:      */
 4587:     var $captions;
 4588: 
 4589:     /**
 4590:      * @var array
 4591:      * @see get_categories()
 4592:      */
 4593:     var $categories;
 4594: 
 4595:     /**
 4596:      * @var int
 4597:      * @see get_channels()
 4598:      */
 4599:     var $channels;
 4600: 
 4601:     /**
 4602:      * @var SimplePie_Copyright
 4603:      * @see get_copyright()
 4604:      */
 4605:     var $copyright;
 4606: 
 4607:     /**
 4608:      * @var array
 4609:      * @see get_credits()
 4610:      */
 4611:     var $credits;
 4612: 
 4613:     /**
 4614:      * @var string
 4615:      * @see get_description()
 4616:      */
 4617:     var $description;
 4618: 
 4619:     /**
 4620:      * @var int
 4621:      * @see get_duration()
 4622:      */
 4623:     var $duration;
 4624: 
 4625:     /**
 4626:      * @var string
 4627:      * @see get_expression()
 4628:      */
 4629:     var $expression;
 4630: 
 4631:     /**
 4632:      * @var string
 4633:      * @see get_framerate()
 4634:      */
 4635:     var $framerate;
 4636: 
 4637:     /**
 4638:      * @var string
 4639:      * @see get_handler()
 4640:      */
 4641:     var $handler;
 4642: 
 4643:     /**
 4644:      * @var array
 4645:      * @see get_hashes()
 4646:      */
 4647:     var $hashes;
 4648: 
 4649:     /**
 4650:      * @var string
 4651:      * @see get_height()
 4652:      */
 4653:     var $height;
 4654: 
 4655:     /**
 4656:      * @deprecated
 4657:      * @var null
 4658:      */
 4659:     var $javascript;
 4660: 
 4661:     /**
 4662:      * @var array
 4663:      * @see get_keywords()
 4664:      */
 4665:     var $keywords;
 4666: 
 4667:     /**
 4668:      * @var string
 4669:      * @see get_language()
 4670:      */
 4671:     var $lang;
 4672: 
 4673:     /**
 4674:      * @var string
 4675:      * @see get_length()
 4676:      */
 4677:     var $length;
 4678: 
 4679:     /**
 4680:      * @var string
 4681:      * @see get_link()
 4682:      */
 4683:     var $link;
 4684: 
 4685:     /**
 4686:      * @var string
 4687:      * @see get_medium()
 4688:      */
 4689:     var $medium;
 4690: 
 4691:     /**
 4692:      * @var string
 4693:      * @see get_player()
 4694:      */
 4695:     var $player;
 4696: 
 4697:     /**
 4698:      * @var array
 4699:      * @see get_ratings()
 4700:      */
 4701:     var $ratings;
 4702: 
 4703:     /**
 4704:      * @var array
 4705:      * @see get_restrictions()
 4706:      */
 4707:     var $restrictions;
 4708: 
 4709:     /**
 4710:      * @var string
 4711:      * @see get_sampling_rate()
 4712:      */
 4713:     var $samplingrate;
 4714: 
 4715:     /**
 4716:      * @var array
 4717:      * @see get_thumbnails()
 4718:      */
 4719:     var $thumbnails;
 4720: 
 4721:     /**
 4722:      * @var string
 4723:      * @see get_title()
 4724:      */
 4725:     var $title;
 4726: 
 4727:     /**
 4728:      * @var string
 4729:      * @see get_type()
 4730:      */
 4731:     var $type;
 4732: 
 4733:     /**
 4734:      * @var string
 4735:      * @see get_width()
 4736:      */
 4737:     var $width;
 4738: 
 4739:     /**
 4740:      * Constructor, used to input the data
 4741:      *
 4742:      * For documentation on all the parameters, see the corresponding
 4743:      * properties and their accessors
 4744:      *
 4745:      * @uses idna_convert If available, this will convert an IDN
 4746:      */
 4747:     public function __construct($link = null, $type = null, $length = null, $javascript = null, $bitrate = null, $captions = null, $categories = null, $channels = null, $copyright = null, $credits = null, $description = null, $duration = null, $expression = null, $framerate = null, $hashes = null, $height = null, $keywords = null, $lang = null, $medium = null, $player = null, $ratings = null, $restrictions = null, $samplingrate = null, $thumbnails = null, $title = null, $width = null)
 4748:     {
 4749:         $this->bitrate = $bitrate;
 4750:         $this->captions = $captions;
 4751:         $this->categories = $categories;
 4752:         $this->channels = $channels;
 4753:         $this->copyright = $copyright;
 4754:         $this->credits = $credits;
 4755:         $this->description = $description;
 4756:         $this->duration = $duration;
 4757:         $this->expression = $expression;
 4758:         $this->framerate = $framerate;
 4759:         $this->hashes = $hashes;
 4760:         $this->height = $height;
 4761:         $this->keywords = $keywords;
 4762:         $this->lang = $lang;
 4763:         $this->length = $length;
 4764:         $this->link = $link;
 4765:         $this->medium = $medium;
 4766:         $this->player = $player;
 4767:         $this->ratings = $ratings;
 4768:         $this->restrictions = $restrictions;
 4769:         $this->samplingrate = $samplingrate;
 4770:         $this->thumbnails = $thumbnails;
 4771:         $this->title = $title;
 4772:         $this->type = $type;
 4773:         $this->width = $width;
 4774: 
 4775:         if (class_exists('idna_convert'))
 4776:         {
 4777:             $idn = new idna_convert();
 4778:             $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($link);
 4779:             $this->link = SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url($parsed['scheme'], $idn->encode($parsed['authority']), $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']);
 4780:         }
 4781:         $this->handler = $this->get_handler(); // Needs to load last
 4782:     }
 4783: 
 4784:     /**
 4785:      * String-ified version
 4786:      *
 4787:      * @return string
 4788:      */
 4789:     public function __toString()
 4790:     {
 4791:         // There is no $this->data here
 4792:         return md5(serialize($this));
 4793:     }
 4794: 
 4795:     /**
 4796:      * Get the bitrate
 4797:      *
 4798:      * @return string|null
 4799:      */
 4800:     public function get_bitrate()
 4801:     {
 4802:         if ($this->bitrate !== null)
 4803:         {
 4804:             return $this->bitrate;
 4805:         }
 4806:         else
 4807:         {
 4808:             return null;
 4809:         }
 4810:     }
 4811: 
 4812:     /**
 4813:      * Get a single caption
 4814:      *
 4815:      * @param int $key
 4816:      * @return SimplePie_Caption|null
 4817:      */
 4818:     public function get_caption($key = 0)
 4819:     {
 4820:         $captions = $this->get_captions();
 4821:         if (isset($captions[$key]))
 4822:         {
 4823:             return $captions[$key];
 4824:         }
 4825:         else
 4826:         {
 4827:             return null;
 4828:         }
 4829:     }
 4830: 
 4831:     /**
 4832:      * Get all captions
 4833:      *
 4834:      * @return array|null Array of {@see SimplePie_Caption} objects
 4835:      */
 4836:     public function get_captions()
 4837:     {
 4838:         if ($this->captions !== null)
 4839:         {
 4840:             return $this->captions;
 4841:         }
 4842:         else
 4843:         {
 4844:             return null;
 4845:         }
 4846:     }
 4847: 
 4848:     /**
 4849:      * Get a single category
 4850:      *
 4851:      * @param int $key
 4852:      * @return SimplePie_Category|null
 4853:      */
 4854:     public function get_category($key = 0)
 4855:     {
 4856:         $categories = $this->get_categories();
 4857:         if (isset($categories[$key]))
 4858:         {
 4859:             return $categories[$key];
 4860:         }
 4861:         else
 4862:         {
 4863:             return null;
 4864:         }
 4865:     }
 4866: 
 4867:     /**
 4868:      * Get all categories
 4869:      *
 4870:      * @return array|null Array of {@see SimplePie_Category} objects
 4871:      */
 4872:     public function get_categories()
 4873:     {
 4874:         if ($this->categories !== null)
 4875:         {
 4876:             return $this->categories;
 4877:         }
 4878:         else
 4879:         {
 4880:             return null;
 4881:         }
 4882:     }
 4883: 
 4884:     /**
 4885:      * Get the number of audio channels
 4886:      *
 4887:      * @return int|null
 4888:      */
 4889:     public function get_channels()
 4890:     {
 4891:         if ($this->channels !== null)
 4892:         {
 4893:             return $this->channels;
 4894:         }
 4895:         else
 4896:         {
 4897:             return null;
 4898:         }
 4899:     }
 4900: 
 4901:     /**
 4902:      * Get the copyright information
 4903:      *
 4904:      * @return SimplePie_Copyright|null
 4905:      */
 4906:     public function get_copyright()
 4907:     {
 4908:         if ($this->copyright !== null)
 4909:         {
 4910:             return $this->copyright;
 4911:         }
 4912:         else
 4913:         {
 4914:             return null;
 4915:         }
 4916:     }
 4917: 
 4918:     /**
 4919:      * Get a single credit
 4920:      *
 4921:      * @param int $key
 4922:      * @return SimplePie_Credit|null
 4923:      */
 4924:     public function get_credit($key = 0)
 4925:     {
 4926:         $credits = $this->get_credits();
 4927:         if (isset($credits[$key]))
 4928:         {
 4929:             return $credits[$key];
 4930:         }
 4931:         else
 4932:         {
 4933:             return null;
 4934:         }
 4935:     }
 4936: 
 4937:     /**
 4938:      * Get all credits
 4939:      *
 4940:      * @return array|null Array of {@see SimplePie_Credit} objects
 4941:      */
 4942:     public function get_credits()
 4943:     {
 4944:         if ($this->credits !== null)
 4945:         {
 4946:             return $this->credits;
 4947:         }
 4948:         else
 4949:         {
 4950:             return null;
 4951:         }
 4952:     }
 4953: 
 4954:     /**
 4955:      * Get the description of the enclosure
 4956:      *
 4957:      * @return string|null
 4958:      */
 4959:     public function get_description()
 4960:     {
 4961:         if ($this->description !== null)
 4962:         {
 4963:             return $this->description;
 4964:         }
 4965:         else
 4966:         {
 4967:             return null;
 4968:         }
 4969:     }
 4970: 
 4971:     /**
 4972:      * Get the duration of the enclosure
 4973:      *
 4974:      * @param string $convert Convert seconds into hh:mm:ss
 4975:      * @return string|int|null 'hh:mm:ss' string if `$convert` was specified, otherwise integer (or null if none found)
 4976:      */
 4977:     public function get_duration($convert = false)
 4978:     {
 4979:         if ($this->duration !== null)
 4980:         {
 4981:             if ($convert)
 4982:             {
 4983:                 $time = SimplePie_Misc::time_hms($this->duration);
 4984:                 return $time;
 4985:             }
 4986:             else
 4987:             {
 4988:                 return $this->duration;
 4989:             }
 4990:         }
 4991:         else
 4992:         {
 4993:             return null;
 4994:         }
 4995:     }
 4996: 
 4997:     /**
 4998:      * Get the expression
 4999:      *
 5000:      * @return string Probably one of 'sample', 'full', 'nonstop', 'clip'. Defaults to 'full'
 5001:      */
 5002:     public function get_expression()
 5003:     {
 5004:         if ($this->expression !== null)
 5005:         {
 5006:             return $this->expression;
 5007:         }
 5008:         else
 5009:         {
 5010:             return 'full';
 5011:         }
 5012:     }
 5013: 
 5014:     /**
 5015:      * Get the file extension
 5016:      *
 5017:      * @return string|null
 5018:      */
 5019:     public function get_extension()
 5020:     {
 5021:         if ($this->link !== null)
 5022:         {
 5023:             $url = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($this->link);
 5024:             if ($url['path'] !== '')
 5025:             {
 5026:                 return pathinfo($url['path'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION);
 5027:             }
 5028:         }
 5029:         return null;
 5030:     }
 5031: 
 5032:     /**
 5033:      * Get the framerate (in frames-per-second)
 5034:      *
 5035:      * @return string|null
 5036:      */
 5037:     public function get_framerate()
 5038:     {
 5039:         if ($this->framerate !== null)
 5040:         {
 5041:             return $this->framerate;
 5042:         }
 5043:         else
 5044:         {
 5045:             return null;
 5046:         }
 5047:     }
 5048: 
 5049:     /**
 5050:      * Get the preferred handler
 5051:      *
 5052:      * @return string|null One of 'flash', 'fmedia', 'quicktime', 'wmedia', 'mp3'
 5053:      */
 5054:     public function get_handler()
 5055:     {
 5056:         return $this->get_real_type(true);
 5057:     }
 5058: 
 5059:     /**
 5060:      * Get a single hash
 5061:      *
 5062:      * @link http://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-hash
 5063:      * @param int $key
 5064:      * @return string|null Hash as per `media:hash`, prefixed with "$algo:"
 5065:      */
 5066:     public function get_hash($key = 0)
 5067:     {
 5068:         $hashes = $this->get_hashes();
 5069:         if (isset($hashes[$key]))
 5070:         {
 5071:             return $hashes[$key];
 5072:         }
 5073:         else
 5074:         {
 5075:             return null;
 5076:         }
 5077:     }
 5078: 
 5079:     /**
 5080:      * Get all credits
 5081:      *
 5082:      * @return array|null Array of strings, see {@see get_hash()}
 5083:      */
 5084:     public function get_hashes()
 5085:     {
 5086:         if ($this->hashes !== null)
 5087:         {
 5088:             return $this->hashes;
 5089:         }
 5090:         else
 5091:         {
 5092:             return null;
 5093:         }
 5094:     }
 5095: 
 5096:     /**
 5097:      * Get the height
 5098:      *
 5099:      * @return string|null
 5100:      */
 5101:     public function get_height()
 5102:     {
 5103:         if ($this->height !== null)
 5104:         {
 5105:             return $this->height;
 5106:         }
 5107:         else
 5108:         {
 5109:             return null;
 5110:         }
 5111:     }
 5112: 
 5113:     /**
 5114:      * Get the language
 5115:      *
 5116:      * @link http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3066
 5117:      * @return string|null Language code as per RFC 3066
 5118:      */
 5119:     public function get_language()
 5120:     {
 5121:         if ($this->lang !== null)
 5122:         {
 5123:             return $this->lang;
 5124:         }
 5125:         else
 5126:         {
 5127:             return null;
 5128:         }
 5129:     }
 5130: 
 5131:     /**
 5132:      * Get a single keyword
 5133:      *
 5134:      * @param int $key
 5135:      * @return string|null
 5136:      */
 5137:     public function get_keyword($key = 0)
 5138:     {
 5139:         $keywords = $this->get_keywords();
 5140:         if (isset($keywords[$key]))
 5141:         {
 5142:             return $keywords[$key];
 5143:         }
 5144:         else
 5145:         {
 5146:             return null;
 5147:         }
 5148:     }
 5149: 
 5150:     /**
 5151:      * Get all keywords
 5152:      *
 5153:      * @return array|null Array of strings
 5154:      */
 5155:     public function get_keywords()
 5156:     {
 5157:         if ($this->keywords !== null)
 5158:         {
 5159:             return $this->keywords;
 5160:         }
 5161:         else
 5162:         {
 5163:             return null;
 5164:         }
 5165:     }
 5166: 
 5167:     /**
 5168:      * Get length
 5169:      *
 5170:      * @return float Length in bytes
 5171:      */
 5172:     public function get_length()
 5173:     {
 5174:         if ($this->length !== null)
 5175:         {
 5176:             return $this->length;
 5177:         }
 5178:         else
 5179:         {
 5180:             return null;
 5181:         }
 5182:     }
 5183: 
 5184:     /**
 5185:      * Get the URL
 5186:      *
 5187:      * @return string|null
 5188:      */
 5189:     public function get_link()
 5190:     {
 5191:         if ($this->link !== null)
 5192:         {
 5193:             return urldecode($this->link);
 5194:         }
 5195:         else
 5196:         {
 5197:             return null;
 5198:         }
 5199:     }
 5200: 
 5201:     /**
 5202:      * Get the medium
 5203:      *
 5204:      * @link http://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-content
 5205:      * @return string|null Should be one of 'image', 'audio', 'video', 'document', 'executable'
 5206:      */
 5207:     public function get_medium()
 5208:     {
 5209:         if ($this->medium !== null)
 5210:         {
 5211:             return $this->medium;
 5212:         }
 5213:         else
 5214:         {
 5215:             return null;
 5216:         }
 5217:     }
 5218: 
 5219:     /**
 5220:      * Get the player URL
 5221:      *
 5222:      * Typically the same as {@see get_permalink()}
 5223:      * @return string|null Player URL
 5224:      */
 5225:     public function get_player()
 5226:     {
 5227:         if ($this->player !== null)
 5228:         {
 5229:             return $this->player;
 5230:         }
 5231:         else
 5232:         {
 5233:             return null;
 5234:         }
 5235:     }
 5236: 
 5237:     /**
 5238:      * Get a single rating
 5239:      *
 5240:      * @param int $key
 5241:      * @return SimplePie_Rating|null
 5242:      */
 5243:     public function get_rating($key = 0)
 5244:     {
 5245:         $ratings = $this->get_ratings();
 5246:         if (isset($ratings[$key]))
 5247:         {
 5248:             return $ratings[$key];
 5249:         }
 5250:         else
 5251:         {
 5252:             return null;
 5253:         }
 5254:     }
 5255: 
 5256:     /**
 5257:      * Get all ratings
 5258:      *
 5259:      * @return array|null Array of {@see SimplePie_Rating} objects
 5260:      */
 5261:     public function get_ratings()
 5262:     {
 5263:         if ($this->ratings !== null)
 5264:         {
 5265:             return $this->ratings;
 5266:         }
 5267:         else
 5268:         {
 5269:             return null;
 5270:         }
 5271:     }
 5272: 
 5273:     /**
 5274:      * Get a single restriction
 5275:      *
 5276:      * @param int $key
 5277:      * @return SimplePie_Restriction|null
 5278:      */
 5279:     public function get_restriction($key = 0)
 5280:     {
 5281:         $restrictions = $this->get_restrictions();
 5282:         if (isset($restrictions[$key]))
 5283:         {
 5284:             return $restrictions[$key];
 5285:         }
 5286:         else
 5287:         {
 5288:             return null;
 5289:         }
 5290:     }
 5291: 
 5292:     /**
 5293:      * Get all restrictions
 5294:      *
 5295:      * @return array|null Array of {@see SimplePie_Restriction} objects
 5296:      */
 5297:     public function get_restrictions()
 5298:     {
 5299:         if ($this->restrictions !== null)
 5300:         {
 5301:             return $this->restrictions;
 5302:         }
 5303:         else
 5304:         {
 5305:             return null;
 5306:         }
 5307:     }
 5308: 
 5309:     /**
 5310:      * Get the sampling rate (in kHz)
 5311:      *
 5312:      * @return string|null
 5313:      */
 5314:     public function get_sampling_rate()
 5315:     {
 5316:         if ($this->samplingrate !== null)
 5317:         {
 5318:             return $this->samplingrate;
 5319:         }
 5320:         else
 5321:         {
 5322:             return null;
 5323:         }
 5324:     }
 5325: 
 5326:     /**
 5327:      * Get the file size (in MiB)
 5328:      *
 5329:      * @return float|null File size in mebibytes (1048 bytes)
 5330:      */
 5331:     public function get_size()
 5332:     {
 5333:         $length = $this->get_length();
 5334:         if ($length !== null)
 5335:         {
 5336:             return round($length/1048576, 2);
 5337:         }
 5338:         else
 5339:         {
 5340:             return null;
 5341:         }
 5342:     }
 5343: 
 5344:     /**
 5345:      * Get a single thumbnail
 5346:      *
 5347:      * @param int $key
 5348:      * @return string|null Thumbnail URL
 5349:      */
 5350:     public function get_thumbnail($key = 0)
 5351:     {
 5352:         $thumbnails = $this->get_thumbnails();
 5353:         if (isset($thumbnails[$key]))
 5354:         {
 5355:             return $thumbnails[$key];
 5356:         }
 5357:         else
 5358:         {
 5359:             return null;
 5360:         }
 5361:     }
 5362: 
 5363:     /**
 5364:      * Get all thumbnails
 5365:      *
 5366:      * @return array|null Array of thumbnail URLs
 5367:      */
 5368:     public function get_thumbnails()
 5369:     {
 5370:         if ($this->thumbnails !== null)
 5371:         {
 5372:             return $this->thumbnails;
 5373:         }
 5374:         else
 5375:         {
 5376:             return null;
 5377:         }
 5378:     }
 5379: 
 5380:     /**
 5381:      * Get the title
 5382:      *
 5383:      * @return string|null
 5384:      */
 5385:     public function get_title()
 5386:     {
 5387:         if ($this->title !== null)
 5388:         {
 5389:             return $this->title;
 5390:         }
 5391:         else
 5392:         {
 5393:             return null;
 5394:         }
 5395:     }
 5396: 
 5397:     /**
 5398:      * Get mimetype of the enclosure
 5399:      *
 5400:      * @see get_real_type()
 5401:      * @return string|null MIME type
 5402:      */
 5403:     public function get_type()
 5404:     {
 5405:         if ($this->type !== null)
 5406:         {
 5407:             return $this->type;
 5408:         }
 5409:         else
 5410:         {
 5411:             return null;
 5412:         }
 5413:     }
 5414: 
 5415:     /**
 5416:      * Get the width
 5417:      *
 5418:      * @return string|null
 5419:      */
 5420:     public function get_width()
 5421:     {
 5422:         if ($this->width !== null)
 5423:         {
 5424:             return $this->width;
 5425:         }
 5426:         else
 5427:         {
 5428:             return null;
 5429:         }
 5430:     }
 5431: 
 5432:     /**
 5433:      * Embed the enclosure using `<embed>`
 5434:      *
 5435:      * @deprecated Use the second parameter to {@see embed} instead
 5436:      *
 5437:      * @param array|string $options See first paramter to {@see embed}
 5438:      * @return string HTML string to output
 5439:      */
 5440:     public function native_embed($options='')
 5441:     {
 5442:         return $this->embed($options, true);
 5443:     }
 5444: 
 5445:     /**
 5446:      * Embed the enclosure using Javascript
 5447:      *
 5448:      * `$options` is an array or comma-separated key:value string, with the
 5449:      * following properties:
 5450:      *
 5451:      * - `alt` (string): Alternate content for when an end-user does not have
 5452:      *    the appropriate handler installed or when a file type is
 5453:      *    unsupported. Can be any text or HTML. Defaults to blank.
 5454:      * - `altclass` (string): If a file type is unsupported, the end-user will
 5455:      *    see the alt text (above) linked directly to the content. That link
 5456:      *    will have this value as its class name. Defaults to blank.
 5457:      * - `audio` (string): This is an image that should be used as a
 5458:      *    placeholder for audio files before they're loaded (QuickTime-only).
 5459:      *    Can be any relative or absolute URL. Defaults to blank.
 5460:      * - `bgcolor` (string): The background color for the media, if not
 5461:      *    already transparent. Defaults to `#ffffff`.
 5462:      * - `height` (integer): The height of the embedded media. Accepts any
 5463:      *    numeric pixel value (such as `360`) or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`,
 5464:      *    and it is recommended that you use this default.
 5465:      * - `loop` (boolean): Do you want the media to loop when its done?
 5466:      *    Defaults to `false`.
 5467:      * - `mediaplayer` (string): The location of the included
 5468:      *    `mediaplayer.swf` file. This allows for the playback of Flash Video
 5469:      *    (`.flv`) files, and is the default handler for non-Odeo MP3's.
 5470:      *    Defaults to blank.
 5471:      * - `video` (string): This is an image that should be used as a
 5472:      *    placeholder for video files before they're loaded (QuickTime-only).
 5473:      *    Can be any relative or absolute URL. Defaults to blank.
 5474:      * - `width` (integer): The width of the embedded media. Accepts any
 5475:      *    numeric pixel value (such as `480`) or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`,
 5476:      *    and it is recommended that you use this default.
 5477:      * - `widescreen` (boolean): Is the enclosure widescreen or standard?
 5478:      *    This applies only to video enclosures, and will automatically resize
 5479:      *    the content appropriately.  Defaults to `false`, implying 4:3 mode.
 5480:      *
 5481:      * Note: Non-widescreen (4:3) mode with `width` and `height` set to `auto`
 5482:      * will default to 480x360 video resolution.  Widescreen (16:9) mode with
 5483:      * `width` and `height` set to `auto` will default to 480x270 video resolution.
 5484:      *
 5485:      * @todo If the dimensions for media:content are defined, use them when width/height are set to 'auto'.
 5486:      * @param array|string $options Comma-separated key:value list, or array
 5487:      * @param bool $native Use `<embed>`
 5488:      * @return string HTML string to output
 5489:      */
 5490:     public function embed($options = '', $native = false)
 5491:     {
 5492:         // Set up defaults
 5493:         $audio = '';
 5494:         $video = '';
 5495:         $alt = '';
 5496:         $altclass = '';
 5497:         $loop = 'false';
 5498:         $width = 'auto';
 5499:         $height = 'auto';
 5500:         $bgcolor = '#ffffff';
 5501:         $mediaplayer = '';
 5502:         $widescreen = false;
 5503:         $handler = $this->get_handler();
 5504:         $type = $this->get_real_type();
 5505: 
 5506:         // Process options and reassign values as necessary
 5507:         if (is_array($options))
 5508:         {
 5509:             extract($options);
 5510:         }
 5511:         else
 5512:         {
 5513:             $options = explode(',', $options);
 5514:             foreach($options as $option)
 5515:             {
 5516:                 $opt = explode(':', $option, 2);
 5517:                 if (isset($opt[0], $opt[1]))
 5518:                 {
 5519:                     $opt[0] = trim($opt[0]);
 5520:                     $opt[1] = trim($opt[1]);
 5521:                     switch ($opt[0])
 5522:                     {
 5523:                         case 'audio':
 5524:                             $audio = $opt[1];
 5525:                             break;
 5526: 
 5527:                         case 'video':
 5528:                             $video = $opt[1];
 5529:                             break;
 5530: 
 5531:                         case 'alt':
 5532:                             $alt = $opt[1];
 5533:                             break;
 5534: 
 5535:                         case 'altclass':
 5536:                             $altclass = $opt[1];
 5537:                             break;
 5538: 
 5539:                         case 'loop':
 5540:                             $loop = $opt[1];
 5541:                             break;
 5542: 
 5543:                         case 'width':
 5544:                             $width = $opt[1];
 5545:                             break;
 5546: 
 5547:                         case 'height':
 5548:                             $height = $opt[1];
 5549:                             break;
 5550: 
 5551:                         case 'bgcolor':
 5552:                             $bgcolor = $opt[1];
 5553:                             break;
 5554: 
 5555:                         case 'mediaplayer':
 5556:                             $mediaplayer = $opt[1];
 5557:                             break;
 5558: 
 5559:                         case 'widescreen':
 5560:                             $widescreen = $opt[1];
 5561:                             break;
 5562:                     }
 5563:                 }
 5564:             }
 5565:         }
 5566: 
 5567:         $mime = explode('/', $type, 2);
 5568:         $mime = $mime[0];
 5569: 
 5570:         // Process values for 'auto'
 5571:         if ($width === 'auto')
 5572:         {
 5573:             if ($mime === 'video')
 5574:             {
 5575:                 if ($height === 'auto')
 5576:                 {
 5577:                     $width = 480;
 5578:                 }
 5579:                 elseif ($widescreen)
 5580:                 {
 5581:                     $width = round((intval($height)/9)*16);
 5582:                 }
 5583:                 else
 5584:                 {
 5585:                     $width = round((intval($height)/3)*4);
 5586:                 }
 5587:             }
 5588:             else
 5589:             {
 5590:                 $width = '100%';
 5591:             }
 5592:         }
 5593: 
 5594:         if ($height === 'auto')
 5595:         {
 5596:             if ($mime === 'audio')
 5597:             {
 5598:                 $height = 0;
 5599:             }
 5600:             elseif ($mime === 'video')
 5601:             {
 5602:                 if ($width === 'auto')
 5603:                 {
 5604:                     if ($widescreen)
 5605:                     {
 5606:                         $height = 270;
 5607:                     }
 5608:                     else
 5609:                     {
 5610:                         $height = 360;
 5611:                     }
 5612:                 }
 5613:                 elseif ($widescreen)
 5614:                 {
 5615:                     $height = round((intval($width)/16)*9);
 5616:                 }
 5617:                 else
 5618:                 {
 5619:                     $height = round((intval($width)/4)*3);
 5620:                 }
 5621:             }
 5622:             else
 5623:             {
 5624:                 $height = 376;
 5625:             }
 5626:         }
 5627:         elseif ($mime === 'audio')
 5628:         {
 5629:             $height = 0;
 5630:         }
 5631: 
 5632:         // Set proper placeholder value
 5633:         if ($mime === 'audio')
 5634:         {
 5635:             $placeholder = $audio;
 5636:         }
 5637:         elseif ($mime === 'video')
 5638:         {
 5639:             $placeholder = $video;
 5640:         }
 5641: 
 5642:         $embed = '';
 5643: 
 5644:         // Flash
 5645:         if ($handler === 'flash')
 5646:         {
 5647:             if ($native)
 5648:             {
 5649:                 $embed .= "<embed src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" pluginspage=\"http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer\" type=\"$type\" quality=\"high\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" loop=\"$loop\"></embed>";
 5650:             }
 5651:             else
 5652:             {
 5653:                 $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_flash('$bgcolor', '$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "', '$loop', '$type');</script>";
 5654:             }
 5655:         }
 5656: 
 5657:         // Flash Media Player file types.
 5658:         // Preferred handler for MP3 file types.
 5659:         elseif ($handler === 'fmedia' || ($handler === 'mp3' && $mediaplayer !== ''))
 5660:         {
 5661:             $height += 20;
 5662:             if ($native)
 5663:             {
 5664:                 $embed .= "<embed src=\"$mediaplayer\" pluginspage=\"http://adobe.com/go/getflashplayer\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" quality=\"high\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" wmode=\"transparent\" flashvars=\"file=" . rawurlencode($this->get_link().'?file_extension=.'.$this->get_extension()) . "&autostart=false&repeat=$loop&showdigits=true&showfsbutton=false\"></embed>";
 5665:             }
 5666:             else
 5667:             {
 5668:                 $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_flv('$width', '$height', '" . rawurlencode($this->get_link().'?file_extension=.'.$this->get_extension()) . "', '$placeholder', '$loop', '$mediaplayer');</script>";
 5669:             }
 5670:         }
 5671: 
 5672:         // QuickTime 7 file types.  Need to test with QuickTime 6.
 5673:         // Only handle MP3's if the Flash Media Player is not present.
 5674:         elseif ($handler === 'quicktime' || ($handler === 'mp3' && $mediaplayer === ''))
 5675:         {
 5676:             $height += 16;
 5677:             if ($native)
 5678:             {
 5679:                 if ($placeholder !== '')
 5680:                 {
 5681:                     $embed .= "<embed type=\"$type\" style=\"cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;\" href=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" src=\"$placeholder\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" autoplay=\"false\" target=\"myself\" controller=\"false\" loop=\"$loop\" scale=\"aspect\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" pluginspage=\"http://apple.com/quicktime/download/\"></embed>";
 5682:                 }
 5683:                 else
 5684:                 {
 5685:                     $embed .= "<embed type=\"$type\" style=\"cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;\" src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" autoplay=\"false\" target=\"myself\" controller=\"true\" loop=\"$loop\" scale=\"aspect\" bgcolor=\"$bgcolor\" pluginspage=\"http://apple.com/quicktime/download/\"></embed>";
 5686:                 }
 5687:             }
 5688:             else
 5689:             {
 5690:                 $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_quicktime('$type', '$bgcolor', '$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "', '$placeholder', '$loop');</script>";
 5691:             }
 5692:         }
 5693: 
 5694:         // Windows Media
 5695:         elseif ($handler === 'wmedia')
 5696:         {
 5697:             $height += 45;
 5698:             if ($native)
 5699:             {
 5700:                 $embed .= "<embed type=\"application/x-mplayer2\" src=\"" . $this->get_link() . "\" autosize=\"1\" width=\"$width\" height=\"$height\" showcontrols=\"1\" showstatusbar=\"0\" showdisplay=\"0\" autostart=\"0\"></embed>";
 5701:             }
 5702:             else
 5703:             {
 5704:                 $embed .= "<script type='text/javascript'>embed_wmedia('$width', '$height', '" . $this->get_link() . "');</script>";
 5705:             }
 5706:         }
 5707: 
 5708:         // Everything else
 5709:         else $embed .= '<a href="' . $this->get_link() . '" class="' . $altclass . '">' . $alt . '</a>';
 5710: 
 5711:         return $embed;
 5712:     }
 5713: 
 5714:     /**
 5715:      * Get the real media type
 5716:      *
 5717:      * Often, feeds lie to us, necessitating a bit of deeper inspection. This
 5718:      * converts types to their canonical representations based on the file
 5719:      * extension
 5720:      *
 5721:      * @see get_type()
 5722:      * @param bool $find_handler Internal use only, use {@see get_handler()} instead
 5723:      * @return string MIME type
 5724:      */
 5725:     public function get_real_type($find_handler = false)
 5726:     {
 5727:         // Mime-types by handler.
 5728:         $types_flash = array('application/x-shockwave-flash', 'application/futuresplash'); // Flash
 5729:         $types_fmedia = array('video/flv', 'video/x-flv','flv-application/octet-stream'); // Flash Media Player
 5730:         $types_quicktime = array('audio/3gpp', 'audio/3gpp2', 'audio/aac', 'audio/x-aac', 'audio/aiff', 'audio/x-aiff', 'audio/mid', 'audio/midi', 'audio/x-midi', 'audio/mp4', 'audio/m4a', 'audio/x-m4a', 'audio/wav', 'audio/x-wav', 'video/3gpp', 'video/3gpp2', 'video/m4v', 'video/x-m4v', 'video/mp4', 'video/mpeg', 'video/x-mpeg', 'video/quicktime', 'video/sd-video'); // QuickTime
 5731:         $types_wmedia = array('application/asx', 'application/x-mplayer2', 'audio/x-ms-wma', 'audio/x-ms-wax', 'video/x-ms-asf-plugin', 'video/x-ms-asf', 'video/x-ms-wm', 'video/x-ms-wmv', 'video/x-ms-wvx'); // Windows Media
 5732:         $types_mp3 = array('audio/mp3', 'audio/x-mp3', 'audio/mpeg', 'audio/x-mpeg'); // MP3
 5733: 
 5734:         if ($this->get_type() !== null)
 5735:         {
 5736:             $type = strtolower($this->type);
 5737:         }
 5738:         else
 5739:         {
 5740:             $type = null;
 5741:         }
 5742: 
 5743:         // If we encounter an unsupported mime-type, check the file extension and guess intelligently.
 5744:         if (!in_array($type, array_merge($types_flash, $types_fmedia, $types_quicktime, $types_wmedia, $types_mp3)))
 5745:         {
 5746:             switch (strtolower($this->get_extension()))
 5747:             {
 5748:                 // Audio mime-types
 5749:                 case 'aac':
 5750:                 case 'adts':
 5751:                     $type = 'audio/acc';
 5752:                     break;
 5753: 
 5754:                 case 'aif':
 5755:                 case 'aifc':
 5756:                 case 'aiff':
 5757:                 case 'cdda':
 5758:                     $type = 'audio/aiff';
 5759:                     break;
 5760: 
 5761:                 case 'bwf':
 5762:                     $type = 'audio/wav';
 5763:                     break;
 5764: 
 5765:                 case 'kar':
 5766:                 case 'mid':
 5767:                 case 'midi':
 5768:                 case 'smf':
 5769:                     $type = 'audio/midi';
 5770:                     break;
 5771: 
 5772:                 case 'm4a':
 5773:                     $type = 'audio/x-m4a';
 5774:                     break;
 5775: 
 5776:                 case 'mp3':
 5777:                 case 'swa':
 5778:                     $type = 'audio/mp3';
 5779:                     break;
 5780: 
 5781:                 case 'wav':
 5782:                     $type = 'audio/wav';
 5783:                     break;
 5784: 
 5785:                 case 'wax':
 5786:                     $type = 'audio/x-ms-wax';
 5787:                     break;
 5788: 
 5789:                 case 'wma':
 5790:                     $type = 'audio/x-ms-wma';
 5791:                     break;
 5792: 
 5793:                 // Video mime-types
 5794:                 case '3gp':
 5795:                 case '3gpp':
 5796:                     $type = 'video/3gpp';
 5797:                     break;
 5798: 
 5799:                 case '3g2':
 5800:                 case '3gp2':
 5801:                     $type = 'video/3gpp2';
 5802:                     break;
 5803: 
 5804:                 case 'asf':
 5805:                     $type = 'video/x-ms-asf';
 5806:                     break;
 5807: 
 5808:                 case 'flv':
 5809:                     $type = 'video/x-flv';
 5810:                     break;
 5811: 
 5812:                 case 'm1a':
 5813:                 case 'm1s':
 5814:                 case 'm1v':
 5815:                 case 'm15':
 5816:                 case 'm75':
 5817:                 case 'mp2':
 5818:                 case 'mpa':
 5819:                 case 'mpeg':
 5820:                 case 'mpg':
 5821:                 case 'mpm':
 5822:                 case 'mpv':
 5823:                     $type = 'video/mpeg';
 5824:                     break;
 5825: 
 5826:                 case 'm4v':
 5827:                     $type = 'video/x-m4v';
 5828:                     break;
 5829: 
 5830:                 case 'mov':
 5831:                 case 'qt':
 5832:                     $type = 'video/quicktime';
 5833:                     break;
 5834: 
 5835:                 case 'mp4':
 5836:                 case 'mpg4':
 5837:                     $type = 'video/mp4';
 5838:                     break;
 5839: 
 5840:                 case 'sdv':
 5841:                     $type = 'video/sd-video';
 5842:                     break;
 5843: 
 5844:                 case 'wm':
 5845:                     $type = 'video/x-ms-wm';
 5846:                     break;
 5847: 
 5848:                 case 'wmv':
 5849:                     $type = 'video/x-ms-wmv';
 5850:                     break;
 5851: 
 5852:                 case 'wvx':
 5853:                     $type = 'video/x-ms-wvx';
 5854:                     break;
 5855: 
 5856:                 // Flash mime-types
 5857:                 case 'spl':
 5858:                     $type = 'application/futuresplash';
 5859:                     break;
 5860: 
 5861:                 case 'swf':
 5862:                     $type = 'application/x-shockwave-flash';
 5863:                     break;
 5864:             }
 5865:         }
 5866: 
 5867:         if ($find_handler)
 5868:         {
 5869:             if (in_array($type, $types_flash))
 5870:             {
 5871:                 return 'flash';
 5872:             }
 5873:             elseif (in_array($type, $types_fmedia))
 5874:             {
 5875:                 return 'fmedia';
 5876:             }
 5877:             elseif (in_array($type, $types_quicktime))
 5878:             {
 5879:                 return 'quicktime';
 5880:             }
 5881:             elseif (in_array($type, $types_wmedia))
 5882:             {
 5883:                 return 'wmedia';
 5884:             }
 5885:             elseif (in_array($type, $types_mp3))
 5886:             {
 5887:                 return 'mp3';
 5888:             }
 5889:             else
 5890:             {
 5891:                 return null;
 5892:             }
 5893:         }
 5894:         else
 5895:         {
 5896:             return $type;
 5897:         }
 5898:     }
 5899: }
 5900: 
 5901: /**
 5902:  * Used for fetching remote files and reading local files
 5903:  *
 5904:  * Supports HTTP 1.0 via cURL or fsockopen, with spotty HTTP 1.1 support
 5905:  *
 5906:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_file_class()}
 5907:  *
 5908:  * @package SimplePie
 5909:  * @todo Move to properly supporting RFC2616 (HTTP/1.1)
 5910:  */
 5911: class SimplePie_File
 5912: {
 5913:     var $url;
 5914:     var $useragent;
 5915:     var $success = true;
 5916:     var $headers = array();
 5917:     var $body;
 5918:     var $status_code;
 5919:     var $redirects = 0;
 5920:     var $error;
 5921:     var $method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_NONE;
 5922: 
 5923:     public function __construct($url, $timeout = 10, $redirects = 5, $headers = null, $useragent = null, $force_fsockopen = false)
 5924:     {
 5925:         if (class_exists('idna_convert'))
 5926:         {
 5927:             $idn = new idna_convert();
 5928:             $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($url);
 5929:             $url = SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url($parsed['scheme'], $idn->encode($parsed['authority']), $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']);
 5930:         }
 5931:         $this->url = $url;
 5932:         $this->useragent = $useragent;
 5933:         if (preg_match('/^http(s)?:\/\//i', $url))
 5934:         {
 5935:             if ($useragent === null)
 5936:             {
 5937:                 $useragent = ini_get('user_agent');
 5938:                 $this->useragent = $useragent;
 5939:             }
 5940:             if (!is_array($headers))
 5941:             {
 5942:                 $headers = array();
 5943:             }
 5944:             if (!$force_fsockopen && function_exists('curl_exec'))
 5945:             {
 5946:                 $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_CURL;
 5947:                 $fp = curl_init();
 5948:                 $headers2 = array();
 5949:                 foreach ($headers as $key => $value)
 5950:                 {
 5951:                     $headers2[] = "$key: $value";
 5952:                 }
 5953:                 if (version_compare(SimplePie_Misc::get_curl_version(), '7.10.5', '>='))
 5954:                 {
 5955:                     curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_ENCODING, '');
 5956:                 }
 5957:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
 5958:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_HEADER, 1);
 5959:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
 5960:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout);
 5961:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $timeout);
 5962:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_REFERER, $url);
 5963:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $useragent);
 5964:                 curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers2);
 5965:                 if (!ini_get('open_basedir') && !ini_get('safe_mode') && version_compare(SimplePie_Misc::get_curl_version(), '7.15.2', '>='))
 5966:                 {
 5967:                     curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
 5968:                     curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, $redirects);
 5969:                 }
 5970: 
 5971:                 $this->headers = curl_exec($fp);
 5972:                 if (curl_errno($fp) === 23 || curl_errno($fp) === 61)
 5973:                 {
 5974:                     curl_setopt($fp, CURLOPT_ENCODING, 'none');
 5975:                     $this->headers = curl_exec($fp);
 5976:                 }
 5977:                 if (curl_errno($fp))
 5978:                 {
 5979:                     $this->error = 'cURL error ' . curl_errno($fp) . ': ' . curl_error($fp);
 5980:                     $this->success = false;
 5981:                 }
 5982:                 else
 5983:                 {
 5984:                     $info = curl_getinfo($fp);
 5985:                     curl_close($fp);
 5986:                     $this->headers = explode("\r\n\r\n", $this->headers, $info['redirect_count'] + 1);
 5987:                     $this->headers = array_pop($this->headers);
 5988:                     $parser = new SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($this->headers);
 5989:                     if ($parser->parse())
 5990:                     {
 5991:                         $this->headers = $parser->headers;
 5992:                         $this->body = $parser->body;
 5993:                         $this->status_code = $parser->status_code;
 5994:                         if ((in_array($this->status_code, array(300, 301, 302, 303, 307)) || $this->status_code > 307 && $this->status_code < 400) && isset($this->headers['location']) && $this->redirects < $redirects)
 5995:                         {
 5996:                             $this->redirects++;
 5997:                             $location = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url($this->headers['location'], $url);
 5998:                             return $this->__construct($location, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $useragent, $force_fsockopen);
 5999:                         }
 6000:                     }
 6001:                 }
 6002:             }
 6003:             else
 6004:             {
 6005:                 $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FSOCKOPEN;
 6006:                 $url_parts = parse_url($url);
 6007:                 $socket_host = $url_parts['host'];
 6008:                 if (isset($url_parts['scheme']) && strtolower($url_parts['scheme']) === 'https')
 6009:                 {
 6010:                     $socket_host = "ssl://$url_parts[host]";
 6011:                     $url_parts['port'] = 443;
 6012:                 }
 6013:                 if (!isset($url_parts['port']))
 6014:                 {
 6015:                     $url_parts['port'] = 80;
 6016:                 }
 6017:                 $fp = @fsockopen($socket_host, $url_parts['port'], $errno, $errstr, $timeout);
 6018:                 if (!$fp)
 6019:                 {
 6020:                     $this->error = 'fsockopen error: ' . $errstr;
 6021:                     $this->success = false;
 6022:                 }
 6023:                 else
 6024:                 {
 6025:                     stream_set_timeout($fp, $timeout);
 6026:                     if (isset($url_parts['path']))
 6027:                     {
 6028:                         if (isset($url_parts['query']))
 6029:                         {
 6030:                             $get = "$url_parts[path]?$url_parts[query]";
 6031:                         }
 6032:                         else
 6033:                         {
 6034:                             $get = $url_parts['path'];
 6035:                         }
 6036:                     }
 6037:                     else
 6038:                     {
 6039:                         $get = '/';
 6040:                     }
 6041:                     $out = "GET $get HTTP/1.1\r\n";
 6042:                     $out .= "Host: $url_parts[host]\r\n";
 6043:                     $out .= "User-Agent: $useragent\r\n";
 6044:                     if (extension_loaded('zlib'))
 6045:                     {
 6046:                         $out .= "Accept-Encoding: x-gzip,gzip,deflate\r\n";
 6047:                     }
 6048: 
 6049:                     if (isset($url_parts['user']) && isset($url_parts['pass']))
 6050:                     {
 6051:                         $out .= "Authorization: Basic " . base64_encode("$url_parts[user]:$url_parts[pass]") . "\r\n";
 6052:                     }
 6053:                     foreach ($headers as $key => $value)
 6054:                     {
 6055:                         $out .= "$key: $value\r\n";
 6056:                     }
 6057:                     $out .= "Connection: Close\r\n\r\n";
 6058:                     fwrite($fp, $out);
 6059: 
 6060:                     $info = stream_get_meta_data($fp);
 6061: 
 6062:                     $this->headers = '';
 6063:                     while (!$info['eof'] && !$info['timed_out'])
 6064:                     {
 6065:                         $this->headers .= fread($fp, 1160);
 6066:                         $info = stream_get_meta_data($fp);
 6067:                     }
 6068:                     if (!$info['timed_out'])
 6069:                     {
 6070:                         $parser = new SimplePie_HTTP_Parser($this->headers);
 6071:                         if ($parser->parse())
 6072:                         {
 6073:                             $this->headers = $parser->headers;
 6074:                             $this->body = $parser->body;
 6075:                             $this->status_code = $parser->status_code;
 6076:                             if ((in_array($this->status_code, array(300, 301, 302, 303, 307)) || $this->status_code > 307 && $this->status_code < 400) && isset($this->headers['location']) && $this->redirects < $redirects)
 6077:                             {
 6078:                                 $this->redirects++;
 6079:                                 $location = SimplePie_Misc::absolutize_url($this->headers['location'], $url);
 6080:                                 return $this->__construct($location, $timeout, $redirects, $headers, $useragent, $force_fsockopen);
 6081:                             }
 6082:                             if (isset($this->headers['content-encoding']))
 6083:                             {
 6084:                                 // Hey, we act dumb elsewhere, so let's do that here too
 6085:                                 switch (strtolower(trim($this->headers['content-encoding'], "\x09\x0A\x0D\x20")))
 6086:                                 {
 6087:                                     case 'gzip':
 6088:                                     case 'x-gzip':
 6089:                                         $decoder = new SimplePie_gzdecode($this->body);
 6090:                                         if (!$decoder->parse())
 6091:                                         {
 6092:                                             $this->error = 'Unable to decode HTTP "gzip" stream';
 6093:                                             $this->success = false;
 6094:                                         }
 6095:                                         else
 6096:                                         {
 6097:                                             $this->body = $decoder->data;
 6098:                                         }
 6099:                                         break;
 6100: 
 6101:                                     case 'deflate':
 6102:                                         if (($decompressed = gzinflate($this->body)) !== false)
 6103:                                         {
 6104:                                             $this->body = $decompressed;
 6105:                                         }
 6106:                                         else if (($decompressed = gzuncompress($this->body)) !== false)
 6107:                                         {
 6108:                                             $this->body = $decompressed;
 6109:                                         }
 6110:                                         else if (function_exists('gzdecode') && ($decompressed = gzdecode($this->body)) !== false)
 6111:                                         {
 6112:                                             $this->body = $decompressed;
 6113:                                         }
 6114:                                         else
 6115:                                         {
 6116:                                             $this->error = 'Unable to decode HTTP "deflate" stream';
 6117:                                             $this->success = false;
 6118:                                         }
 6119:                                         break;
 6120: 
 6121:                                     default:
 6122:                                         $this->error = 'Unknown content coding';
 6123:                                         $this->success = false;
 6124:                                 }
 6125:                             }
 6126:                         }
 6127:                     }
 6128:                     else
 6129:                     {
 6130:                         $this->error = 'fsocket timed out';
 6131:                         $this->success = false;
 6132:                     }
 6133:                     fclose($fp);
 6134:                 }
 6135:             }
 6136:         }
 6137:         else
 6138:         {
 6139:             $this->method = SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_LOCAL | SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_FILE_GET_CONTENTS;
 6140:             if (!$this->body = file_get_contents($url))
 6141:             {
 6142:                 $this->error = 'file_get_contents could not read the file';
 6143:                 $this->success = false;
 6144:             }
 6145:         }
 6146:     }
 6147: }
 6148: 
 6149: /**
 6150:  * Decode 'gzip' encoded HTTP data
 6151:  *
 6152:  * @package SimplePie
 6153:  * @link http://www.gzip.org/format.txt
 6154:  */
 6155: class SimplePie_gzdecode
 6156: {
 6157:     /**
 6158:      * Compressed data
 6159:      *
 6160:      * @access private
 6161:      * @var string
 6162:      * @see gzdecode::$data
 6163:      */
 6164:     var $compressed_data;
 6165: 
 6166:     /**
 6167:      * Size of compressed data
 6168:      *
 6169:      * @access private
 6170:      * @var int
 6171:      */
 6172:     var $compressed_size;
 6173: 
 6174:     /**
 6175:      * Minimum size of a valid gzip string
 6176:      *
 6177:      * @access private
 6178:      * @var int
 6179:      */
 6180:     var $min_compressed_size = 18;
 6181: 
 6182:     /**
 6183:      * Current position of pointer
 6184:      *
 6185:      * @access private
 6186:      * @var int
 6187:      */
 6188:     var $position = 0;
 6189: 
 6190:     /**
 6191:      * Flags (FLG)
 6192:      *
 6193:      * @access private
 6194:      * @var int
 6195:      */
 6196:     var $flags;
 6197: 
 6198:     /**
 6199:      * Uncompressed data
 6200:      *
 6201:      * @access public
 6202:      * @see gzdecode::$compressed_data
 6203:      * @var string
 6204:      */
 6205:     var $data;
 6206: 
 6207:     /**
 6208:      * Modified time
 6209:      *
 6210:      * @access public
 6211:      * @var int
 6212:      */
 6213:     var $MTIME;
 6214: 
 6215:     /**
 6216:      * Extra Flags
 6217:      *
 6218:      * @access public
 6219:      * @var int
 6220:      */
 6221:     var $XFL;
 6222: 
 6223:     /**
 6224:      * Operating System
 6225:      *
 6226:      * @access public
 6227:      * @var int
 6228:      */
 6229:     var $OS;
 6230: 
 6231:     /**
 6232:      * Subfield ID 1
 6233:      *
 6234:      * @access public
 6235:      * @see gzdecode::$extra_field
 6236:      * @see gzdecode::$SI2
 6237:      * @var string
 6238:      */
 6239:     var $SI1;
 6240: 
 6241:     /**
 6242:      * Subfield ID 2
 6243:      *
 6244:      * @access public
 6245:      * @see gzdecode::$extra_field
 6246:      * @see gzdecode::$SI1
 6247:      * @var string
 6248:      */
 6249:     var $SI2;
 6250: 
 6251:     /**
 6252:      * Extra field content
 6253:      *
 6254:      * @access public
 6255:      * @see gzdecode::$SI1
 6256:      * @see gzdecode::$SI2
 6257:      * @var string
 6258:      */
 6259:     var $extra_field;
 6260: 
 6261:     /**
 6262:      * Original filename
 6263:      *
 6264:      * @access public
 6265:      * @var string
 6266:      */
 6267:     var $filename;
 6268: 
 6269:     /**
 6270:      * Human readable comment
 6271:      *
 6272:      * @access public
 6273:      * @var string
 6274:      */
 6275:     var $comment;
 6276: 
 6277:     /**
 6278:      * Don't allow anything to be set
 6279:      *
 6280:      * @param string $name
 6281:      * @param mixed $value
 6282:      */
 6283:     public function __set($name, $value)
 6284:     {
 6285:         trigger_error("Cannot write property $name", E_USER_ERROR);
 6286:     }
 6287: 
 6288:     /**
 6289:      * Set the compressed string and related properties
 6290:      *
 6291:      * @param string $data
 6292:      */
 6293:     public function __construct($data)
 6294:     {
 6295:         $this->compressed_data = $data;
 6296:         $this->compressed_size = strlen($data);
 6297:     }
 6298: 
 6299:     /**
 6300:      * Decode the GZIP stream
 6301:      *
 6302:      * @return bool Successfulness
 6303:      */
 6304:     public function parse()
 6305:     {
 6306:         if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
 6307:         {
 6308:             // Check ID1, ID2, and CM
 6309:             if (substr($this->compressed_data, 0, 3) !== "\x1F\x8B\x08")
 6310:             {
 6311:                 return false;
 6312:             }
 6313: 
 6314:             // Get the FLG (FLaGs)
 6315:             $this->flags = ord($this->compressed_data[3]);
 6316: 
 6317:             // FLG bits above (1 << 4) are reserved
 6318:             if ($this->flags > 0x1F)
 6319:             {
 6320:                 return false;
 6321:             }
 6322: 
 6323:             // Advance the pointer after the above
 6324:             $this->position += 4;
 6325: 
 6326:             // MTIME
