 6327:             $mtime = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4);
 6328:             // Reverse the string if we're on a big-endian arch because l is the only signed long and is machine endianness
 6329:             if (current(unpack('S', "\x00\x01")) === 1)
 6330:             {
 6331:                 $mtime = strrev($mtime);
 6332:             }
 6333:             $this->MTIME = current(unpack('l', $mtime));
 6334:             $this->position += 4;
 6335: 
 6336:             // Get the XFL (eXtra FLags)
 6337:             $this->XFL = ord($this->compressed_data[$this->position++]);
 6338: 
 6339:             // Get the OS (Operating System)
 6340:             $this->OS = ord($this->compressed_data[$this->position++]);
 6341: 
 6342:             // Parse the FEXTRA
 6343:             if ($this->flags & 4)
 6344:             {
 6345:                 // Read subfield IDs
 6346:                 $this->SI1 = $this->compressed_data[$this->position++];
 6347:                 $this->SI2 = $this->compressed_data[$this->position++];
 6348: 
 6349:                 // SI2 set to zero is reserved for future use
 6350:                 if ($this->SI2 === "\x00")
 6351:                 {
 6352:                     return false;
 6353:                 }
 6354: 
 6355:                 // Get the length of the extra field
 6356:                 $len = current(unpack('v', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 2)));
 6357:                 $this->position += 2;
 6358: 
 6359:                 // Check the length of the string is still valid
 6360:                 $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 4;
 6361:                 if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
 6362:                 {
 6363:                     // Set the extra field to the given data
 6364:                     $this->extra_field = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
 6365:                     $this->position += $len;
 6366:                 }
 6367:                 else
 6368:                 {
 6369:                     return false;
 6370:                 }
 6371:             }
 6372: 
 6373:             // Parse the FNAME
 6374:             if ($this->flags & 8)
 6375:             {
 6376:                 // Get the length of the filename
 6377:                 $len = strcspn($this->compressed_data, "\x00", $this->position);
 6378: 
 6379:                 // Check the length of the string is still valid
 6380:                 $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 1;
 6381:                 if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
 6382:                 {
 6383:                     // Set the original filename to the given string
 6384:                     $this->filename = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
 6385:                     $this->position += $len + 1;
 6386:                 }
 6387:                 else
 6388:                 {
 6389:                     return false;
 6390:                 }
 6391:             }
 6392: 
 6393:             // Parse the FCOMMENT
 6394:             if ($this->flags & 16)
 6395:             {
 6396:                 // Get the length of the comment
 6397:                 $len = strcspn($this->compressed_data, "\x00", $this->position);
 6398: 
 6399:                 // Check the length of the string is still valid
 6400:                 $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 1;
 6401:                 if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
 6402:                 {
 6403:                     // Set the original comment to the given string
 6404:                     $this->comment = substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, $len);
 6405:                     $this->position += $len + 1;
 6406:                 }
 6407:                 else
 6408:                 {
 6409:                     return false;
 6410:                 }
 6411:             }
 6412: 
 6413:             // Parse the FHCRC
 6414:             if ($this->flags & 2)
 6415:             {
 6416:                 // Check the length of the string is still valid
 6417:                 $this->min_compressed_size += $len + 2;
 6418:                 if ($this->compressed_size >= $this->min_compressed_size)
 6419:                 {
 6420:                     // Read the CRC
 6421:                     $crc = current(unpack('v', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 2)));
 6422: 
 6423:                     // Check the CRC matches
 6424:                     if ((crc32(substr($this->compressed_data, 0, $this->position)) & 0xFFFF) === $crc)
 6425:                     {
 6426:                         $this->position += 2;
 6427:                     }
 6428:                     else
 6429:                     {
 6430:                         return false;
 6431:                     }
 6432:                 }
 6433:                 else
 6434:                 {
 6435:                     return false;
 6436:                 }
 6437:             }
 6438: 
 6439:             // Decompress the actual data
 6440:             if (($this->data = gzinflate(substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, -8))) === false)
 6441:             {
 6442:                 return false;
 6443:             }
 6444:             else
 6445:             {
 6446:                 $this->position = $this->compressed_size - 8;
 6447:             }
 6448: 
 6449:             // Check CRC of data
 6450:             $crc = current(unpack('V', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4)));
 6451:             $this->position += 4;
 6452:             /*if (extension_loaded('hash') && sprintf('%u', current(unpack('V', hash('crc32b', $this->data)))) !== sprintf('%u', $crc))
 6453:             {
 6454:                 return false;
 6455:             }*/
 6456: 
 6457:             // Check ISIZE of data
 6458:             $isize = current(unpack('V', substr($this->compressed_data, $this->position, 4)));
 6459:             $this->position += 4;
 6460:             if (sprintf('%u', strlen($this->data) & 0xFFFFFFFF) !== sprintf('%u', $isize))
 6461:             {
 6462:                 return false;
 6463:             }
 6464: 
 6465:             // Wow, against all odds, we've actually got a valid gzip string
 6466:             return true;
 6467:         }
 6468:         else
 6469:         {
 6470:             return false;
 6471:         }
 6472:     }
 6473: }
 6474: 
 6475: /**
 6476:  * HTTP Response Parser
 6477:  *
 6478:  * @package SimplePie
 6479:  */
 6480: class SimplePie_HTTP_Parser
 6481: {
 6482:     /**
 6483:      * HTTP Version
 6484:      *
 6485:      * @var float
 6486:      */
 6487:     public $http_version = 0.0;
 6488: 
 6489:     /**
 6490:      * Status code
 6491:      *
 6492:      * @var int
 6493:      */
 6494:     public $status_code = 0;
 6495: 
 6496:     /**
 6497:      * Reason phrase
 6498:      *
 6499:      * @var string
 6500:      */
 6501:     public $reason = '';
 6502: 
 6503:     /**
 6504:      * Key/value pairs of the headers
 6505:      *
 6506:      * @var array
 6507:      */
 6508:     public $headers = array();
 6509: 
 6510:     /**
 6511:      * Body of the response
 6512:      *
 6513:      * @var string
 6514:      */
 6515:     public $body = '';
 6516: 
 6517:     /**
 6518:      * Current state of the state machine
 6519:      *
 6520:      * @var string
 6521:      */
 6522:     protected $state = 'http_version';
 6523: 
 6524:     /**
 6525:      * Input data
 6526:      *
 6527:      * @var string
 6528:      */
 6529:     protected $data = '';
 6530: 
 6531:     /**
 6532:      * Input data length (to avoid calling strlen() everytime this is needed)
 6533:      *
 6534:      * @var int
 6535:      */
 6536:     protected $data_length = 0;
 6537: 
 6538:     /**
 6539:      * Current position of the pointer
 6540:      *
 6541:      * @var int
 6542:      */
 6543:     protected $position = 0;
 6544: 
 6545:     /**
 6546:      * Name of the hedaer currently being parsed
 6547:      *
 6548:      * @var string
 6549:      */
 6550:     protected $name = '';
 6551: 
 6552:     /**
 6553:      * Value of the hedaer currently being parsed
 6554:      *
 6555:      * @var string
 6556:      */
 6557:     protected $value = '';
 6558: 
 6559:     /**
 6560:      * Create an instance of the class with the input data
 6561:      *
 6562:      * @param string $data Input data
 6563:      */
 6564:     public function __construct($data)
 6565:     {
 6566:         $this->data = $data;
 6567:         $this->data_length = strlen($this->data);
 6568:     }
 6569: 
 6570:     /**
 6571:      * Parse the input data
 6572:      *
 6573:      * @return bool true on success, false on failure
 6574:      */
 6575:     public function parse()
 6576:     {
 6577:         while ($this->state && $this->state !== 'emit' && $this->has_data())
 6578:         {
 6579:             $state = $this->state;
 6580:             $this->$state();
 6581:         }
 6582:         $this->data = '';
 6583:         if ($this->state === 'emit' || $this->state === 'body')
 6584:         {
 6585:             return true;
 6586:         }
 6587:         else
 6588:         {
 6589:             $this->http_version = '';
 6590:             $this->status_code = '';
 6591:             $this->reason = '';
 6592:             $this->headers = array();
 6593:             $this->body = '';
 6594:             return false;
 6595:         }
 6596:     }
 6597: 
 6598:     /**
 6599:      * Check whether there is data beyond the pointer
 6600:      *
 6601:      * @return bool true if there is further data, false if not
 6602:      */
 6603:     protected function has_data()
 6604:     {
 6605:         return (bool) ($this->position < $this->data_length);
 6606:     }
 6607: 
 6608:     /**
 6609:      * See if the next character is LWS
 6610:      *
 6611:      * @return bool true if the next character is LWS, false if not
 6612:      */
 6613:     protected function is_linear_whitespace()
 6614:     {
 6615:         return (bool) ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x09"
 6616:             || $this->data[$this->position] === "\x20"
 6617:             || ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A"
 6618:                 && isset($this->data[$this->position + 1])
 6619:                 && ($this->data[$this->position + 1] === "\x09" || $this->data[$this->position + 1] === "\x20")));
 6620:     }
 6621: 
 6622:     /**
 6623:      * Parse the HTTP version
 6624:      */
 6625:     protected function http_version()
 6626:     {
 6627:         if (strpos($this->data, "\x0A") !== false && strtoupper(substr($this->data, 0, 5)) === 'HTTP/')
 6628:         {
 6629:             $len = strspn($this->data, '0123456789.', 5);
 6630:             $this->http_version = substr($this->data, 5, $len);
 6631:             $this->position += 5 + $len;
 6632:             if (substr_count($this->http_version, '.') <= 1)
 6633:             {
 6634:                 $this->http_version = (float) $this->http_version;
 6635:                 $this->position += strspn($this->data, "\x09\x20", $this->position);
 6636:                 $this->state = 'status';
 6637:             }
 6638:             else
 6639:             {
 6640:                 $this->state = false;
 6641:             }
 6642:         }
 6643:         else
 6644:         {
 6645:             $this->state = false;
 6646:         }
 6647:     }
 6648: 
 6649:     /**
 6650:      * Parse the status code
 6651:      */
 6652:     protected function status()
 6653:     {
 6654:         if ($len = strspn($this->data, '0123456789', $this->position))
 6655:         {
 6656:             $this->status_code = (int) substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
 6657:             $this->position += $len;
 6658:             $this->state = 'reason';
 6659:         }
 6660:         else
 6661:         {
 6662:             $this->state = false;
 6663:         }
 6664:     }
 6665: 
 6666:     /**
 6667:      * Parse the reason phrase
 6668:      */
 6669:     protected function reason()
 6670:     {
 6671:         $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x0A", $this->position);
 6672:         $this->reason = trim(substr($this->data, $this->position, $len), "\x09\x0D\x20");
 6673:         $this->position += $len + 1;
 6674:         $this->state = 'new_line';
 6675:     }
 6676: 
 6677:     /**
 6678:      * Deal with a new line, shifting data around as needed
 6679:      */
 6680:     protected function new_line()
 6681:     {
 6682:         $this->value = trim($this->value, "\x0D\x20");
 6683:         if ($this->name !== '' && $this->value !== '')
 6684:         {
 6685:             $this->name = strtolower($this->name);
 6686:             // We should only use the last Content-Type header. c.f. issue #1
 6687:             if (isset($this->headers[$this->name]) && $this->name !== 'content-type')
 6688:             {
 6689:                 $this->headers[$this->name] .= ', ' . $this->value;
 6690:             }
 6691:             else
 6692:             {
 6693:                 $this->headers[$this->name] = $this->value;
 6694:             }
 6695:         }
 6696:         $this->name = '';
 6697:         $this->value = '';
 6698:         if (substr($this->data[$this->position], 0, 2) === "\x0D\x0A")
 6699:         {
 6700:             $this->position += 2;
 6701:             $this->state = 'body';
 6702:         }
 6703:         elseif ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A")
 6704:         {
 6705:             $this->position++;
 6706:             $this->state = 'body';
 6707:         }
 6708:         else
 6709:         {
 6710:             $this->state = 'name';
 6711:         }
 6712:     }
 6713: 
 6714:     /**
 6715:      * Parse a header name
 6716:      */
 6717:     protected function name()
 6718:     {
 6719:         $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x0A:", $this->position);
 6720:         if (isset($this->data[$this->position + $len]))
 6721:         {
 6722:             if ($this->data[$this->position + $len] === "\x0A")
 6723:             {
 6724:                 $this->position += $len;
 6725:                 $this->state = 'new_line';
 6726:             }
 6727:             else
 6728:             {
 6729:                 $this->name = substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
 6730:                 $this->position += $len + 1;
 6731:                 $this->state = 'value';
 6732:             }
 6733:         }
 6734:         else
 6735:         {
 6736:             $this->state = false;
 6737:         }
 6738:     }
 6739: 
 6740:     /**
 6741:      * Parse LWS, replacing consecutive LWS characters with a single space
 6742:      */
 6743:     protected function linear_whitespace()
 6744:     {
 6745:         do
 6746:         {
 6747:             if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 2) === "\x0D\x0A")
 6748:             {
 6749:                 $this->position += 2;
 6750:             }
 6751:             elseif ($this->data[$this->position] === "\x0A")
 6752:             {
 6753:                 $this->position++;
 6754:             }
 6755:             $this->position += strspn($this->data, "\x09\x20", $this->position);
 6756:         } while ($this->has_data() && $this->is_linear_whitespace());
 6757:         $this->value .= "\x20";
 6758:     }
 6759: 
 6760:     /**
 6761:      * See what state to move to while within non-quoted header values
 6762:      */
 6763:     protected function value()
 6764:     {
 6765:         if ($this->is_linear_whitespace())
 6766:         {
 6767:             $this->linear_whitespace();
 6768:         }
 6769:         else
 6770:         {
 6771:             switch ($this->data[$this->position])
 6772:             {
 6773:                 case '"':
 6774:                     // Workaround for ETags: we have to include the quotes as
 6775:                     // part of the tag.
 6776:                     if (strtolower($this->name) === 'etag')
 6777:                     {
 6778:                         $this->value .= '"';
 6779:                         $this->position++;
 6780:                         $this->state = 'value_char';
 6781:                         break;
 6782:                     }
 6783:                     $this->position++;
 6784:                     $this->state = 'quote';
 6785:                     break;
 6786: 
 6787:                 case "\x0A":
 6788:                     $this->position++;
 6789:                     $this->state = 'new_line';
 6790:                     break;
 6791: 
 6792:                 default:
 6793:                     $this->state = 'value_char';
 6794:                     break;
 6795:             }
 6796:         }
 6797:     }
 6798: 
 6799:     /**
 6800:      * Parse a header value while outside quotes
 6801:      */
 6802:     protected function value_char()
 6803:     {
 6804:         $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x09\x20\x0A\"", $this->position);
 6805:         $this->value .= substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
 6806:         $this->position += $len;
 6807:         $this->state = 'value';
 6808:     }
 6809: 
 6810:     /**
 6811:      * See what state to move to while within quoted header values
 6812:      */
 6813:     protected function quote()
 6814:     {
 6815:         if ($this->is_linear_whitespace())
 6816:         {
 6817:             $this->linear_whitespace();
 6818:         }
 6819:         else
 6820:         {
 6821:             switch ($this->data[$this->position])
 6822:             {
 6823:                 case '"':
 6824:                     $this->position++;
 6825:                     $this->state = 'value';
 6826:                     break;
 6827: 
 6828:                 case "\x0A":
 6829:                     $this->position++;
 6830:                     $this->state = 'new_line';
 6831:                     break;
 6832: 
 6833:                 case '\\':
 6834:                     $this->position++;
 6835:                     $this->state = 'quote_escaped';
 6836:                     break;
 6837: 
 6838:                 default:
 6839:                     $this->state = 'quote_char';
 6840:                     break;
 6841:             }
 6842:         }
 6843:     }
 6844: 
 6845:     /**
 6846:      * Parse a header value while within quotes
 6847:      */
 6848:     protected function quote_char()
 6849:     {
 6850:         $len = strcspn($this->data, "\x09\x20\x0A\"\\", $this->position);
 6851:         $this->value .= substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
 6852:         $this->position += $len;
 6853:         $this->state = 'value';
 6854:     }
 6855: 
 6856:     /**
 6857:      * Parse an escaped character within quotes
 6858:      */
 6859:     protected function quote_escaped()
 6860:     {
 6861:         $this->value .= $this->data[$this->position];
 6862:         $this->position++;
 6863:         $this->state = 'quote';
 6864:     }
 6865: 
 6866:     /**
 6867:      * Parse the body
 6868:      */
 6869:     protected function body()
 6870:     {
 6871:         $this->body = substr($this->data, $this->position);
 6872:         if (!empty($this->headers['transfer-encoding']))
 6873:         {
 6874:             unset($this->headers['transfer-encoding']);
 6875:             $this->state = 'chunked';
 6876:         }
 6877:         else
 6878:         {
 6879:             $this->state = 'emit';
 6880:         }
 6881:     }
 6882: 
 6883:     /**
 6884:      * Parsed a "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" body
 6885:      */
 6886:     protected function chunked()
 6887:     {
 6888:         if (!preg_match('/^([0-9a-f]+)[^\r\n]*\r\n/i', trim($this->body)))
 6889:         {
 6890:             $this->state = 'emit';
 6891:             return;
 6892:         }
 6893: 
 6894:         $decoded = '';
 6895:         $encoded = $this->body;
 6896: 
 6897:         while (true)
 6898:         {
 6899:             $is_chunked = (bool) preg_match( '/^([0-9a-f]+)[^\r\n]*\r\n/i', $encoded, $matches );
 6900:             if (!$is_chunked)
 6901:             {
 6902:                 // Looks like it's not chunked after all
 6903:                 $this->state = 'emit';
 6904:                 return;
 6905:             }
 6906: 
 6907:             $length = hexdec(trim($matches[1]));
 6908:             if ($length === 0)
 6909:             {
 6910:                 // Ignore trailer headers
 6911:                 $this->state = 'emit';
 6912:                 $this->body = $decoded;
 6913:                 return;
 6914:             }
 6915: 
 6916:             $chunk_length = strlen($matches[0]);
 6917:             $decoded .= $part = substr($encoded, $chunk_length, $length);
 6918:             $encoded = substr($encoded, $chunk_length + $length + 2);
 6919: 
 6920:             if (trim($encoded) === '0' || empty($encoded))
 6921:             {
 6922:                 $this->state = 'emit';
 6923:                 $this->body = $decoded;
 6924:                 return;
 6925:             }
 6926:         }
 6927:     }
 6928: }
 6929: 
 6930: /**
 6931:  * IRI parser/serialiser
 6932:  *
 6933:  * @package SimplePie
 6934:  */
 6935: class SimplePie_IRI
 6936: {
 6937:     /**
 6938:      * Scheme
 6939:      *
 6940:      * @access private
 6941:      * @var string
 6942:      */
 6943:     var $scheme;
 6944: 
 6945:     /**
 6946:      * User Information
 6947:      *
 6948:      * @access private
 6949:      * @var string
 6950:      */
 6951:     var $userinfo;
 6952: 
 6953:     /**
 6954:      * Host
 6955:      *
 6956:      * @access private
 6957:      * @var string
 6958:      */
 6959:     var $host;
 6960: 
 6961:     /**
 6962:      * Port
 6963:      *
 6964:      * @access private
 6965:      * @var string
 6966:      */
 6967:     var $port;
 6968: 
 6969:     /**
 6970:      * Path
 6971:      *
 6972:      * @access private
 6973:      * @var string
 6974:      */
 6975:     var $path;
 6976: 
 6977:     /**
 6978:      * Query
 6979:      *
 6980:      * @access private
 6981:      * @var string
 6982:      */
 6983:     var $query;
 6984: 
 6985:     /**
 6986:      * Fragment
 6987:      *
 6988:      * @access private
 6989:      * @var string
 6990:      */
 6991:     var $fragment;
 6992: 
 6993:     /**
 6994:      * Whether the object represents a valid IRI
 6995:      *
 6996:      * @access private
 6997:      * @var array
 6998:      */
 6999:     var $valid = array();
 7000: 
 7001:     /**
 7002:      * Return the entire IRI when you try and read the object as a string
 7003:      *
 7004:      * @access public
 7005:      * @return string
 7006:      */
 7007:     public function __toString()
 7008:     {
 7009:         return $this->get_iri();
 7010:     }
 7011: 
 7012:     /**
 7013:      * Create a new IRI object, from a specified string
 7014:      *
 7015:      * @access public
 7016:      * @param string $iri
 7017:      * @return SimplePie_IRI
 7018:      */
 7019:     public function __construct($iri)
 7020:     {
 7021:         $iri = (string) $iri;
 7022:         if ($iri !== '')
 7023:         {
 7024:             $parsed = $this->parse_iri($iri);
 7025:             $this->set_scheme($parsed['scheme']);
 7026:             $this->set_authority($parsed['authority']);
 7027:             $this->set_path($parsed['path']);
 7028:             $this->set_query($parsed['query']);
 7029:             $this->set_fragment($parsed['fragment']);
 7030:         }
 7031:     }
 7032: 
 7033:     /**
 7034:      * Create a new IRI object by resolving a relative IRI
 7035:      *
 7036:      * @static
 7037:      * @access public
 7038:      * @param SimplePie_IRI $base Base IRI
 7039:      * @param string $relative Relative IRI
 7040:      * @return SimplePie_IRI
 7041:      */
 7042:     public static function absolutize($base, $relative)
 7043:     {
 7044:         $relative = (string) $relative;
 7045:         if ($relative !== '')
 7046:         {
 7047:             $relative = new SimplePie_IRI($relative);
 7048:             if ($relative->get_scheme() !== null)
 7049:             {
 7050:                 $target = $relative;
 7051:             }
 7052:             elseif ($base->get_iri() !== null)
 7053:             {
 7054:                 if ($relative->get_authority() !== null)
 7055:                 {
 7056:                     $target = $relative;
 7057:                     $target->set_scheme($base->get_scheme());
 7058:                 }
 7059:                 else
 7060:                 {
 7061:                     $target = new SimplePie_IRI('');
 7062:                     $target->set_scheme($base->get_scheme());
 7063:                     $target->set_userinfo($base->get_userinfo());
 7064:                     $target->set_host($base->get_host());
 7065:                     $target->set_port($base->get_port());
 7066:                     if ($relative->get_path() !== null)
 7067:                     {
 7068:                         if (strpos($relative->get_path(), '/') === 0)
 7069:                         {
 7070:                             $target->set_path($relative->get_path());
 7071:                         }
 7072:                         elseif (($base->get_userinfo() !== null || $base->get_host() !== null || $base->get_port() !== null) && $base->get_path() === null)
 7073:                         {
 7074:                             $target->set_path('/' . $relative->get_path());
 7075:                         }
 7076:                         elseif (($last_segment = strrpos($base->get_path(), '/')) !== false)
 7077:                         {
 7078:                             $target->set_path(substr($base->get_path(), 0, $last_segment + 1) . $relative->get_path());
 7079:                         }
 7080:                         else
 7081:                         {
 7082:                             $target->set_path($relative->get_path());
 7083:                         }
 7084:                         $target->set_query($relative->get_query());
 7085:                     }
 7086:                     else
 7087:                     {
 7088:                         $target->set_path($base->get_path());
 7089:                         if ($relative->get_query() !== null)
 7090:                         {
 7091:                             $target->set_query($relative->get_query());
 7092:                         }
 7093:                         elseif ($base->get_query() !== null)
 7094:                         {
 7095:                             $target->set_query($base->get_query());
 7096:                         }
 7097:                     }
 7098:                 }
 7099:                 $target->set_fragment($relative->get_fragment());
 7100:             }
 7101:             else
 7102:             {
 7103:                 // No base URL, just return the relative URL
 7104:                 $target = $relative;
 7105:             }
 7106:         }
 7107:         else
 7108:         {
 7109:             $target = $base;
 7110:         }
 7111:         return $target;
 7112:     }
 7113: 
 7114:     /**
 7115:      * Parse an IRI into scheme/authority/path/query/fragment segments
 7116:      *
 7117:      * @access private
 7118:      * @param string $iri
 7119:      * @return array
 7120:      */
 7121:     public function parse_iri($iri)
 7122:     {
 7123:         preg_match('/^(([^:\/?#]+):)?(\/\/([^\/?#]*))?([^?#]*)(\?([^#]*))?(#(.*))?$/', $iri, $match);
 7124:         for ($i = count($match); $i <= 9; $i++)
 7125:         {
 7126:             $match[$i] = '';
 7127:         }
 7128:         return array('scheme' => $match[2], 'authority' => $match[4], 'path' => $match[5], 'query' => $match[7], 'fragment' => $match[9]);
 7129:     }
 7130: 
 7131:     /**
 7132:      * Remove dot segments from a path
 7133:      *
 7134:      * @access private
 7135:      * @param string $input
 7136:      * @return string
 7137:      */
 7138:     public function remove_dot_segments($input)
 7139:     {
 7140:         $output = '';
 7141:         while (strpos($input, './') !== false || strpos($input, '/.') !== false || $input === '.' || $input === '..')
 7142:         {
 7143:             // A: If the input buffer begins with a prefix of "../" or "./", then remove that prefix from the input buffer; otherwise,
 7144:             if (strpos($input, '../') === 0)
 7145:             {
 7146:                 $input = substr($input, 3);
 7147:             }
 7148:             elseif (strpos($input, './') === 0)
 7149:             {
 7150:                 $input = substr($input, 2);
 7151:             }
 7152:             // B: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/./" or "/.", where "." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer; otherwise,
 7153:             elseif (strpos($input, '/./') === 0)
 7154:             {
 7155:                 $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 3);
 7156:             }
 7157:             elseif ($input === '/.')
 7158:             {
 7159:                 $input = '/';
 7160:             }
 7161:             // C: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/../" or "/..", where ".." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer and remove the last segment and its preceding "/" (if any) from the output buffer; otherwise,
 7162:             elseif (strpos($input, '/../') === 0)
 7163:             {
 7164:                 $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 4);
 7165:                 $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
 7166:             }
 7167:             elseif ($input === '/..')
 7168:             {
 7169:                 $input = '/';
 7170:                 $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
 7171:             }
 7172:             // D: if the input buffer consists only of "." or "..", then remove that from the input buffer; otherwise,
 7173:             elseif ($input === '.' || $input === '..')
 7174:             {
 7175:                 $input = '';
 7176:             }
 7177:             // E: move the first path segment in the input buffer to the end of the output buffer, including the initial "/" character (if any) and any subsequent characters up to, but not including, the next "/" character or the end of the input buffer
 7178:             elseif (($pos = strpos($input, '/', 1)) !== false)
 7179:             {
 7180:                 $output .= substr($input, 0, $pos);
 7181:                 $input = substr_replace($input, '', 0, $pos);
 7182:             }
 7183:             else
 7184:             {
 7185:                 $output .= $input;
 7186:                 $input = '';
 7187:             }
 7188:         }
 7189:         return $output . $input;
 7190:     }
 7191: 
 7192:     /**
 7193:      * Replace invalid character with percent encoding
 7194:      *
 7195:      * @param string $string Input string
 7196:      * @param string $valid_chars Valid characters not in iunreserved or iprivate (this is ASCII-only)
 7197:      * @param int $case Normalise case
 7198:      * @param bool $iprivate Allow iprivate
 7199:      * @return string
 7200:      */
 7201:     protected function replace_invalid_with_pct_encoding($string, $valid_chars, $case = SIMPLEPIE_SAME_CASE, $iprivate = false)
 7202:     {
 7203:         // Normalize as many pct-encoded sections as possible
 7204:         $string = preg_replace_callback('/(?:%[A-Fa-f0-9]{2})+/', array(&$this, 'remove_iunreserved_percent_encoded'), $string);
 7205: 
 7206:         // Replace invalid percent characters
 7207:         $string = preg_replace('/%(?![A-Fa-f0-9]{2})/', '%25', $string);
 7208: 
 7209:         // Add unreserved and % to $valid_chars (the latter is safe because all
 7210:         // pct-encoded sections are now valid).
 7211:         $valid_chars .= 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789-._~%';
 7212: 
 7213:         // Now replace any bytes that aren't allowed with their pct-encoded versions
 7214:         $position = 0;
 7215:         $strlen = strlen($string);
 7216:         while (($position += strspn($string, $valid_chars, $position)) < $strlen)
 7217:         {
 7218:             $value = ord($string[$position]);
 7219: 
 7220:             // Start position
 7221:             $start = $position;
 7222: 
 7223:             // By default we are valid
 7224:             $valid = true;
 7225: 
 7226:             // No one byte sequences are valid due to the while.
 7227:             // Two byte sequence:
 7228:             if (($value & 0xE0) === 0xC0)
 7229:             {
 7230:                 $character = ($value & 0x1F) << 6;
 7231:                 $length = 2;
 7232:                 $remaining = 1;
 7233:             }
 7234:             // Three byte sequence:
 7235:             elseif (($value & 0xF0) === 0xE0)
 7236:             {
 7237:                 $character = ($value & 0x0F) << 12;
 7238:                 $length = 3;
 7239:                 $remaining = 2;
 7240:             }
 7241:             // Four byte sequence:
 7242:             elseif (($value & 0xF8) === 0xF0)
 7243:             {
 7244:                 $character = ($value & 0x07) << 18;
 7245:                 $length = 4;
 7246:                 $remaining = 3;
 7247:             }
 7248:             // Invalid byte:
 7249:             else
 7250:             {
 7251:                 $valid = false;
 7252:                 $length = 1;
 7253:                 $remaining = 0;
 7254:             }
 7255: 
 7256:             if ($remaining)
 7257:             {
 7258:                 if ($position + $length <= $strlen)
 7259:                 {
 7260:                     for ($position++; $remaining; $position++)
 7261:                     {
 7262:                         $value = ord($string[$position]);
 7263: 
 7264:                         // Check that the byte is valid, then add it to the character:
 7265:                         if (($value & 0xC0) === 0x80)
 7266:                         {
 7267:                             $character |= ($value & 0x3F) << (--$remaining * 6);
 7268:                         }
 7269:                         // If it is invalid, count the sequence as invalid and reprocess the current byte:
 7270:                         else
 7271:                         {
 7272:                             $valid = false;
 7273:                             $position--;
 7274:                             break;
 7275:                         }
 7276:                     }
 7277:                 }
 7278:                 else
 7279:                 {
 7280:                     $position = $strlen - 1;
 7281:                     $valid = false;
 7282:                 }
 7283:             }
 7284: 
 7285:             // Percent encode anything invalid or not in ucschar
 7286:             if (
 7287:                 // Invalid sequences
 7288:                 !$valid
 7289:                 // Non-shortest form sequences are invalid
 7290:                 || $length > 1 && $character <= 0x7F
 7291:                 || $length > 2 && $character <= 0x7FF
 7292:                 || $length > 3 && $character <= 0xFFFF
 7293:                 // Outside of range of ucschar codepoints
 7294:                 // Noncharacters
 7295:                 || ($character & 0xFFFE) === 0xFFFE
 7296:                 || $character >= 0xFDD0 && $character <= 0xFDEF
 7297:                 || (
 7298:                     // Everything else not in ucschar
 7299:                        $character > 0xD7FF && $character < 0xF900
 7300:                     || $character < 0xA0
 7301:                     || $character > 0xEFFFD
 7302:                 )
 7303:                 && (
 7304:                     // Everything not in iprivate, if it applies
 7305:                        !$iprivate
 7306:                     || $character < 0xE000
 7307:                     || $character > 0x10FFFD
 7308:                 )
 7309:             )
 7310:             {
 7311:                 // If we were a character, pretend we weren't, but rather an error.
 7312:                 if ($valid)
 7313:                     $position--;
 7314: 
 7315:                 for ($j = $start; $j <= $position; $j++)
 7316:                 {
 7317:                     $string = substr_replace($string, sprintf('%%%02X', ord($string[$j])), $j, 1);
 7318:                     $j += 2;
 7319:                     $position += 2;
 7320:                     $strlen += 2;
 7321:                 }
 7322:             }
 7323:         }
 7324: 
 7325:         // Normalise case
 7326:         if ($case & SIMPLEPIE_LOWERCASE)
 7327:         {
 7328:             $string = strtolower($string);
 7329:         }
 7330:         elseif ($case & SIMPLEPIE_UPPERCASE)
 7331:         {
 7332:             $string = strtoupper($string);
 7333:         }
 7334: 
 7335:         return $string;
 7336:     }
 7337: 
 7338:     /**
 7339:      * Callback function for preg_replace_callback.
 7340:      *
 7341:      * Removes sequences of percent encoded bytes that represent UTF-8
 7342:      * encoded characters in iunreserved
 7343:      *
 7344:      * @param array $match PCRE match
 7345:      * @return string Replacement
 7346:      */
 7347:     protected function remove_iunreserved_percent_encoded($match)
 7348:     {
 7349:         // As we just have valid percent encoded sequences we can just explode
 7350:         // and ignore the first member of the returned array (an empty string).
 7351:         $bytes = explode('%', $match[0]);
 7352: 
 7353:         // Initialize the new string (this is what will be returned) and that
 7354:         // there are no bytes remaining in the current sequence (unsurprising
 7355:         // at the first byte!).
 7356:         $string = '';
 7357:         $remaining = 0;
 7358: 
 7359:         // Loop over each and every byte, and set $value to its value
 7360:         for ($i = 1, $len = count($bytes); $i < $len; $i++)
 7361:         {
 7362:             $value = hexdec($bytes[$i]);
 7363: 
 7364:             // If we're the first byte of sequence:
 7365:             if (!$remaining)
 7366:             {
 7367:                 // Start position
 7368:                 $start = $i;
 7369: 
 7370:                 // By default we are valid
 7371:                 $valid = true;
 7372: 
 7373:                 // One byte sequence:
 7374:                 if ($value <= 0x7F)
 7375:                 {
 7376:                     $character = $value;
 7377:                     $length = 1;
 7378:                 }
 7379:                 // Two byte sequence:
 7380:                 elseif (($value & 0xE0) === 0xC0)
 7381:                 {
 7382:                     $character = ($value & 0x1F) << 6;
 7383:                     $length = 2;
 7384:                     $remaining = 1;
 7385:                 }
 7386:                 // Three byte sequence:
 7387:                 elseif (($value & 0xF0) === 0xE0)
 7388:                 {
 7389:                     $character = ($value & 0x0F) << 12;
 7390:                     $length = 3;
 7391:                     $remaining = 2;
 7392:                 }
 7393:                 // Four byte sequence:
 7394:                 elseif (($value & 0xF8) === 0xF0)
 7395:                 {
 7396:                     $character = ($value & 0x07) << 18;
 7397:                     $length = 4;
 7398:                     $remaining = 3;
 7399:                 }
 7400:                 // Invalid byte:
 7401:                 else
 7402:                 {
 7403:                     $valid = false;
 7404:                     $remaining = 0;
 7405:                 }
 7406:             }
 7407:             // Continuation byte:
 7408:             else
 7409:             {
 7410:                 // Check that the byte is valid, then add it to the character:
 7411:                 if (($value & 0xC0) === 0x80)
 7412:                 {
 7413:                     $remaining--;
 7414:                     $character |= ($value & 0x3F) << ($remaining * 6);
 7415:                 }
 7416:                 // If it is invalid, count the sequence as invalid and reprocess the current byte as the start of a sequence:
 7417:                 else
 7418:                 {
 7419:                     $valid = false;
 7420:                     $remaining = 0;
 7421:                     $i--;
 7422:                 }
 7423:             }
 7424: 
 7425:             // If we've reached the end of the current byte sequence, append it to Unicode::$data
 7426:             if (!$remaining)
 7427:             {
 7428:                 // Percent encode anything invalid or not in iunreserved
 7429:                 if (
 7430:                     // Invalid sequences
 7431:                     !$valid
 7432:                     // Non-shortest form sequences are invalid
 7433:                     || $length > 1 && $character <= 0x7F
 7434:                     || $length > 2 && $character <= 0x7FF
 7435:                     || $length > 3 && $character <= 0xFFFF
 7436:                     // Outside of range of iunreserved codepoints
 7437:                     || $character < 0x2D
 7438:                     || $character > 0xEFFFD
 7439:                     // Noncharacters
 7440:                     || ($character & 0xFFFE) === 0xFFFE
 7441:                     || $character >= 0xFDD0 && $character <= 0xFDEF
 7442:                     // Everything else not in iunreserved (this is all BMP)
 7443:                     || $character === 0x2F
 7444:                     || $character > 0x39 && $character < 0x41
 7445:                     || $character > 0x5A && $character < 0x61
 7446:                     || $character > 0x7A && $character < 0x7E
 7447:                     || $character > 0x7E && $character < 0xA0
 7448:                     || $character > 0xD7FF && $character < 0xF900
 7449:                 )
 7450:                 {
 7451:                     for ($j = $start; $j <= $i; $j++)
 7452:                     {
 7453:                         $string .= '%' . strtoupper($bytes[$j]);
 7454:                     }
 7455:                 }
 7456:                 else
 7457:                 {
 7458:                     for ($j = $start; $j <= $i; $j++)
 7459:                     {
 7460:                         $string .= chr(hexdec($bytes[$j]));
 7461:                     }
 7462:                 }
 7463:             }
 7464:         }
 7465: 
 7466:         // If we have any bytes left over they are invalid (i.e., we are
 7467:         // mid-way through a multi-byte sequence)
 7468:         if ($remaining)
 7469:         {
 7470:             for ($j = $start; $j < $len; $j++)
 7471:             {
 7472:                 $string .= '%' . strtoupper($bytes[$j]);
 7473:             }
 7474:         }
 7475: 
 7476:         return $string;
 7477:     }
 7478: 
 7479:     /**
 7480:      * Check if the object represents a valid IRI
 7481:      *
 7482:      * @access public
 7483:      * @return bool
 7484:      */
 7485:     public function is_valid()
 7486:     {
 7487:         return array_sum($this->valid) === count($this->valid);
 7488:     }
 7489: 
 7490:     /**
 7491:      * Set the scheme. Returns true on success, false on failure (if there are
 7492:      * any invalid characters).
 7493:      *
 7494:      * @access public
 7495:      * @param string $scheme
 7496:      * @return bool
 7497:      */
 7498:     public function set_scheme($scheme)
 7499:     {
 7500:         if ($scheme === null || $scheme === '')
 7501:         {
 7502:             $this->scheme = null;
 7503:         }
 7504:         else
 7505:         {
 7506:             $len = strlen($scheme);
 7507:             switch (true)
 7508:             {
 7509:                 case $len > 1:
 7510:                     if (!strspn($scheme, 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+-.', 1))
 7511:                     {
 7512:                         $this->scheme = null;
 7513:                         $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = false;
 7514:                         return false;
 7515:                     }
 7516: 
 7517:                 case $len > 0:
 7518:                     if (!strspn($scheme, 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz', 0, 1))
 7519:                     {
 7520:                         $this->scheme = null;
 7521:                         $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = false;
 7522:                         return false;
 7523:                     }
 7524:             }
 7525:             $this->scheme = strtolower($scheme);
 7526:         }
 7527:         $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7528:         return true;
 7529:     }
 7530: 
 7531:     /**
 7532:      * Set the authority. Returns true on success, false on failure (if there are
 7533:      * any invalid characters).
 7534:      *
 7535:      * @access public
 7536:      * @param string $authority
 7537:      * @return bool
 7538:      */
 7539:     public function set_authority($authority)
 7540:     {
 7541:         if (($userinfo_end = strrpos($authority, '@')) !== false)
 7542:         {
 7543:             $userinfo = substr($authority, 0, $userinfo_end);
 7544:             $authority = substr($authority, $userinfo_end + 1);
 7545:         }
 7546:         else
 7547:         {
 7548:             $userinfo = null;
 7549:         }
 7550: 
 7551:         if (($port_start = strpos($authority, ':')) !== false)
 7552:         {
 7553:             $port = substr($authority, $port_start + 1);
 7554:             if ($port === false)
 7555:             {
 7556:                 $port = null;
 7557:             }
 7558:             $authority = substr($authority, 0, $port_start);
 7559:         }
 7560:         else
 7561:         {
 7562:             $port = null;
 7563:         }
 7564: 
 7565:         return $this->set_userinfo($userinfo) && $this->set_host($authority) && $this->set_port($port);
 7566:     }
 7567: 
 7568:     /**
 7569:      * Set the userinfo.
 7570:      *
 7571:      * @access public
 7572:      * @param string $userinfo
 7573:      * @return bool
 7574:      */
 7575:     public function set_userinfo($userinfo)
 7576:     {
 7577:         if ($userinfo === null || $userinfo === '')
 7578:         {
 7579:             $this->userinfo = null;
 7580:         }
 7581:         else
 7582:         {
 7583:             $this->userinfo = $this->replace_invalid_with_pct_encoding($userinfo, 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789-._~!$&\'()*+,;=:');
 7584:         }
 7585:         $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7586:         return true;
 7587:     }
 7588: 
 7589:     /**
 7590:      * Set the host. Returns true on success, false on failure (if there are
 7591:      * any invalid characters).
 7592:      *
 7593:      * @access public
 7594:      * @param string $host
 7595:      * @return bool
 7596:      */
 7597:     public function set_host($host)
 7598:     {
 7599:         if ($host === null || $host === '')
 7600:         {
 7601:             $this->host = null;
 7602:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7603:             return true;
 7604:         }
 7605:         elseif ($host[0] === '[' && substr($host, -1) === ']')
 7606:         {
 7607:             if (SimplePie_Net_IPv6::checkIPv6(substr($host, 1, -1)))
 7608:             {
 7609:                 $this->host = $host;
 7610:                 $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7611:                 return true;
 7612:             }
 7613:             else
 7614:             {
 7615:                 $this->host = null;
 7616:                 $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = false;
 7617:                 return false;
 7618:             }
 7619:         }
 7620:         else
 7621:         {
 7622:             $this->host = $this->replace_invalid_with_pct_encoding($host, 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789-._~!$&\'()*+,;=', SIMPLEPIE_LOWERCASE);
 7623:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7624:             return true;
 7625:         }
 7626:     }
 7627: 
 7628:     /**
 7629:      * Set the port. Returns true on success, false on failure (if there are
 7630:      * any invalid characters).
 7631:      *
 7632:      * @access public
 7633:      * @param string $port
 7634:      * @return bool
 7635:      */
 7636:     public function set_port($port)
 7637:     {
 7638:         if ($port === null || $port === '')
 7639:         {
 7640:             $this->port = null;
 7641:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7642:             return true;
 7643:         }
 7644:         elseif (strspn($port, '0123456789') === strlen($port))
 7645:         {
 7646:             $this->port = (int) $port;
 7647:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7648:             return true;
 7649:         }
 7650:         else
 7651:         {
 7652:             $this->port = null;
 7653:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = false;
 7654:             return false;
 7655:         }
 7656:     }
 7657: 
 7658:     /**
 7659:      * Set the path.
 7660:      *
 7661:      * @access public
 7662:      * @param string $path
 7663:      * @return bool
 7664:      */
 7665:     public function set_path($path)
 7666:     {
 7667:         if ($path === null || $path === '')
 7668:         {
 7669:             $this->path = null;
 7670:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7671:             return true;
 7672:         }
 7673:         elseif (substr($path, 0, 2) === '//' && $this->userinfo === null && $this->host === null && $this->port === null)
 7674:         {
 7675:             $this->path = null;
 7676:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = false;
 7677:             return false;
 7678:         }
 7679:         else
 7680:         {
 7681:             $this->path = $this->replace_invalid_with_pct_encoding($path, 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789-._~!$&\'()*+,;=@/');
 7682:             if ($this->scheme !== null)
 7683:             {
 7684:                 $this->path = $this->remove_dot_segments($this->path);
 7685:             }
 7686:             $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7687:             return true;
 7688:         }
 7689:     }
 7690: 
 7691:     /**
 7692:      * Set the query.
 7693:      *
 7694:      * @access public
 7695:      * @param string $query
 7696:      * @return bool
 7697:      */
 7698:     public function set_query($query)
 7699:     {
 7700:         if ($query === null || $query === '')
 7701:         {
 7702:             $this->query = null;
 7703:         }
 7704:         else
 7705:         {
 7706:             $this->query = $this->replace_invalid_with_pct_encoding($query, 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789-._~!$\'()*+,;:@/?&=');
 7707:         }
 7708:         $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7709:         return true;
 7710:     }
 7711: 
 7712:     /**
 7713:      * Set the fragment.
 7714:      *
 7715:      * @access public
 7716:      * @param string $fragment
 7717:      * @return bool
 7718:      */
 7719:     public function set_fragment($fragment)
 7720:     {
 7721:         if ($fragment === null || $fragment === '')
 7722:         {
 7723:             $this->fragment = null;
 7724:         }
 7725:         else
 7726:         {
 7727:             $this->fragment = $this->replace_invalid_with_pct_encoding($fragment, 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789-._~!$&\'()*+,;=:@/?');
 7728:         }
 7729:         $this->valid[__FUNCTION__] = true;
 7730:         return true;
 7731:     }
 7732: 
 7733:     /**
 7734:      * Get the complete IRI
 7735:      *
 7736:      * @access public
 7737:      * @return string
 7738:      */
 7739:     public function get_iri()
 7740:     {
 7741:         $iri = '';
 7742:         if ($this->scheme !== null)
 7743:         {
 7744:             $iri .= $this->scheme . ':';
 7745:         }
 7746:         if (($authority = $this->get_authority()) !== null)
 7747:         {
 7748:             $iri .= '//' . $authority;
 7749:         }
 7750:         if ($this->path !== null)
 7751:         {
 7752:             $iri .= $this->path;
 7753:         }
 7754:         if ($this->query !== null)
 7755:         {
 7756:             $iri .= '?' . $this->query;
 7757:         }
 7758:         if ($this->fragment !== null)
 7759:         {
 7760:             $iri .= '#' . $this->fragment;
 7761:         }
 7762: 
 7763:         if ($iri !== '')
 7764:         {
 7765:             return $iri;
 7766:         }
 7767:         else
 7768:         {
 7769:             return null;
 7770:         }
 7771:     }
 7772: 
 7773:     /**
 7774:      * Get the scheme
 7775:      *
 7776:      * @access public
 7777:      * @return string
 7778:      */
 7779:     public function get_scheme()
 7780:     {
 7781:         return $this->scheme;
 7782:     }
 7783: 
 7784:     /**
 7785:      * Get the complete authority
 7786:      *
 7787:      * @access public
 7788:      * @return string
 7789:      */
 7790:     public function get_authority()
 7791:     {
 7792:         $authority = '';
 7793:         if ($this->userinfo !== null)
 7794:         {
 7795:             $authority .= $this->userinfo . '@';
 7796:         }
 7797:         if ($this->host !== null)
 7798:         {
 7799:             $authority .= $this->host;
 7800:         }
 7801:         if ($this->port !== null)
 7802:         {
 7803:             $authority .= ':' . $this->port;
 7804:         }
 7805: 
 7806:         if ($authority !== '')
 7807:         {
 7808:             return $authority;
 7809:         }
 7810:         else
 7811:         {
 7812:             return null;
 7813:         }
 7814:     }
 7815: 
 7816:     /**
 7817:      * Get the user information
 7818:      *
 7819:      * @access public
 7820:      * @return string
 7821:      */
 7822:     public function get_userinfo()
 7823:     {
 7824:         return $this->userinfo;
 7825:     }
 7826: 
 7827:     /**
 7828:      * Get the host
 7829:      *
 7830:      * @access public
 7831:      * @return string
 7832:      */
 7833:     public function get_host()
 7834:     {
 7835:         return $this->host;
 7836:     }
 7837: 
 7838:     /**
 7839:      * Get the port
 7840:      *
 7841:      * @access public
 7842:      * @return string
 7843:      */
 7844:     public function get_port()
 7845:     {
 7846:         return $this->port;
 7847:     }
 7848: 
 7849:     /**
 7850:      * Get the path
 7851:      *
 7852:      * @access public
 7853:      * @return string
 7854:      */
 7855:     public function get_path()
 7856:     {
 7857:         return $this->path;
 7858:     }
 7859: 
 7860:     /**
 7861:      * Get the query
 7862:      *
 7863:      * @access public
 7864:      * @return string
 7865:      */
 7866:     public function get_query()
 7867:     {
 7868:         return $this->query;
 7869:     }
 7870: 
 7871:     /**
 7872:      * Get the fragment
 7873:      *
 7874:      * @access public
 7875:      * @return string
 7876:      */
 7877:     public function get_fragment()
 7878:     {
 7879:         return $this->fragment;
 7880:     }
 7881: }
 7882: 
 7883: /**
 7884:  * Manages all item-related data
 7885:  *
 7886:  * Used by {@see SimplePie::get_item()} and {@see SimplePie::get_items()}
 7887:  *
 7888:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_item_class()}
 7889:  *
 7890:  * @package SimplePie
 7891:  */
 7892: class SimplePie_Item
 7893: {
 7894:     var $feed;
 7895:     var $data = array();
 7896:     protected $registry;
 7897: 
 7898:     public function __construct($feed, $data)
 7899:     {
 7900:         $this->feed = $feed;
 7901:         $this->data = $data;
 7902:     }
 7903: 
 7904:     public function set_registry(SimplePie_Registry &$registry)
 7905:     {
 7906:         $this->registry = &$registry;
 7907:     }
 7908: 
 7909:     public function __toString()
 7910:     {
 7911:         return md5(serialize($this->data));
 7912:     }
 7913: 
 7914:     /**
 7915:      * Remove items that link back to this before destroying this object
 7916:      */
 7917:     public function __destruct()
 7918:     {
 7919:         if ((version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.3', '<') || !gc_enabled()) && !ini_get('zend.ze1_compatibility_mode'))
 7920:         {
 7921:             unset($this->feed);
 7922:         }
 7923:     }
 7924: 
 7925:     public function get_item_tags($namespace, $tag)
 7926:     {
 7927:         if (isset($this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
 7928:         {
 7929:             return $this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag];
 7930:         }
 7931:         else
 7932:         {
 7933:             return null;
 7934:         }
 7935:     }
 7936: 
 7937:     public function get_base($element = array())
 7938:     {
 7939:         return $this->feed->get_base($element);
 7940:     }
 7941: 
 7942:     public function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
 7943:     {
 7944:         return $this->feed->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
 7945:     }
 7946: 
 7947:     public function get_feed()
 7948:     {
 7949:         return $this->feed;
 7950:     }
 7951: 
 7952:     public function get_id($hash = false)
 7953:     {
 7954:         if (!$hash)
 7955:         {
 7956:             if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'id'))
 7957:             {
 7958:                 return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 7959:             }
 7960:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'id'))
 7961:             {
 7962:                 return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 7963:             }
 7964:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'guid'))
 7965:             {
 7966:                 return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 7967:             }
 7968:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'identifier'))
 7969:             {
 7970:                 return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 7971:             }
 7972:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'identifier'))
 7973:             {
 7974:                 return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 7975:             }
 7976:             elseif (isset($this->data['attribs'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['about']))
 7977:             {
 7978:                 return $this->sanitize($this->data['attribs'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RDF]['about'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 7979:             }
 7980:             elseif (($return = $this->get_permalink()) !== null)
 7981:             {
 7982:                 return $return;
 7983:             }
 7984:             elseif (($return = $this->get_title()) !== null)
 7985:             {
 7986:                 return $return;
 7987:             }
 7988:         }
 7989:         if ($this->get_permalink() !== null || $this->get_title() !== null)
 7990:         {
 7991:             return md5($this->get_permalink() . $this->get_title());
 7992:         }
 7993:         else
 7994:         {
 7995:             return md5(serialize($this->data));
 7996:         }
 7997:     }
 7998: 
 7999:     public function get_title()
 8000:     {
 8001:         if (!isset($this->data['title']))
 8002:         {
 8003:             if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
 8004:             {
 8005:                 $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8006:             }
 8007:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
 8008:             {
 8009:                 $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8010:             }
 8011:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
 8012:             {
 8013:                 $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8014:             }
 8015:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
 8016:             {
 8017:                 $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8018:             }
 8019:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
 8020:             {
 8021:                 $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8022:             }
 8023:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
 8024:             {
 8025:                 $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8026:             }
 8027:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
 8028:             {
 8029:                 $this->data['title'] = $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8030:             }
 8031:             else
 8032:             {
 8033:                 $this->data['title'] = null;
 8034:             }
 8035:         }
 8036:         return $this->data['title'];
 8037:     }
 8038: 
 8039:     public function get_description($description_only = false)
 8040:     {
 8041:         if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'summary'))
 8042:         {
 8043:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8044:         }
 8045:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'summary'))
 8046:         {
 8047:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8048:         }
 8049:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
 8050:         {
 8051:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8052:         }
 8053:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
 8054:         {
 8055:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8056:         }
 8057:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
 8058:         {
 8059:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8060:         }
 8061:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
 8062:         {
 8063:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8064:         }
 8065:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
 8066:         {
 8067:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8068:         }
 8069:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
 8070:         {
 8071:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8072:         }
 8073:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
 8074:         {
 8075:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML);
 8076:         }
 8077: 
 8078:         elseif (!$description_only)
 8079:         {
 8080:             return $this->get_content(true);
 8081:         }
 8082:         else
 8083:         {
 8084:             return null;
 8085:         }
 8086:     }
 8087: 
 8088:     public function get_content($content_only = false)
 8089:     {
 8090:         if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'content'))
 8091:         {
 8092:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_content_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8093:         }
 8094:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'content'))
 8095:         {
 8096:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8097:         }
 8098:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10_MODULES_CONTENT, 'encoded'))
 8099:         {
 8100:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8101:         }
 8102:         elseif (!$content_only)
 8103:         {
 8104:             return $this->get_description(true);
 8105:         }
 8106:         else
 8107:         {
 8108:             return null;
 8109:         }
 8110:     }
 8111: 
 8112:     public function get_category($key = 0)
 8113:     {
 8114:         $categories = $this->get_categories();
 8115:         if (isset($categories[$key]))
 8116:         {
 8117:             return $categories[$key];
 8118:         }
 8119:         else
 8120:         {
 8121:             return null;
 8122:         }
 8123:     }
 8124: 
 8125:     public function get_categories()
 8126:     {
 8127:         $categories = array();
 8128: 
 8129:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
 8130:         {
 8131:             $term = null;
 8132:             $scheme = null;
 8133:             $label = null;
 8134:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
 8135:             {
 8136:                 $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8137:             }
 8138:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 8139:             {
 8140:                 $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8141:             }
 8142:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
 8143:             {
 8144:                 $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8145:             }
 8146:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 8147:         }
 8148:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
 8149:         {
 8150:             // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
 8151:             // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
 8152:             $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8153:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
 8154:             {
 8155:                 $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8156:             }
 8157:             else
 8158:             {
 8159:                 $scheme = null;
 8160:             }
 8161:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, null));
 8162:         }
 8163:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
 8164:         {
 8165:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 8166:         }
 8167:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
 8168:         {
 8169:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 8170:         }
 8171: 
 8172:         if (!empty($categories))
 8173:         {
 8174:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories));
 8175:         }
 8176:         else
 8177:         {
 8178:             return null;
 8179:         }
 8180:     }
 8181: 
 8182:     public function get_author($key = 0)
 8183:     {
 8184:         $authors = $this->get_authors();
 8185:         if (isset($authors[$key]))
 8186:         {
 8187:             return $authors[$key];
 8188:         }
 8189:         else
 8190:         {
 8191:             return null;
 8192:         }
 8193:     }
 8194: 
 8195:     public function get_contributor($key = 0)
 8196:     {
 8197:         $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
 8198:         if (isset($contributors[$key]))
 8199:         {
 8200:             return $contributors[$key];
 8201:         }
 8202:         else
 8203:         {
 8204:             return null;
 8205:         }
 8206:     }
 8207: 
 8208:     public function get_contributors()
 8209:     {
 8210:         $contributors = array();
 8211:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
 8212:         {
 8213:             $name = null;
 8214:             $uri = null;
 8215:             $email = null;
 8216:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
 8217:             {
 8218:                 $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8219:             }
 8220:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
 8221:             {
 8222:                 $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
 8223:             }
 8224:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
 8225:             {
 8226:                 $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8227:             }
 8228:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
 8229:             {
 8230:                 $contributors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $uri, $email));
 8231:             }
 8232:         }
 8233:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
 8234:         {
 8235:             $name = null;
 8236:             $url = null;
 8237:             $email = null;
 8238:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
 8239:             {
 8240:                 $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8241:             }
 8242:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
 8243:             {
 8244:                 $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
 8245:             }
 8246:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
 8247:             {
 8248:                 $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8249:             }
 8250:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
 8251:             {
 8252:                 $contributors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $url, $email));
 8253:             }
 8254:         }
 8255: 
 8256:         if (!empty($contributors))
 8257:         {
 8258:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($contributors));
 8259:         }
 8260:         else
 8261:         {
 8262:             return null;
 8263:         }
 8264:     }
 8265: 
 8266:     public function get_authors()
 8267:     {
 8268:         $authors = array();
 8269:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
 8270:         {
 8271:             $name = null;
 8272:             $uri = null;
 8273:             $email = null;
 8274:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
 8275:             {
 8276:                 $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8277:             }
 8278:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
 8279:             {
 8280:                 $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
 8281:             }
 8282:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
 8283:             {
 8284:                 $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8285:             }
 8286:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
 8287:             {
 8288:                 $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $uri, $email));
 8289:             }
 8290:         }
 8291:         if ($author = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
 8292:         {
 8293:             $name = null;
 8294:             $url = null;
 8295:             $email = null;
 8296:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
 8297:             {
 8298:                 $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8299:             }
 8300:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
 8301:             {
 8302:                 $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
 8303:             }
 8304:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
 8305:             {
 8306:                 $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8307:             }
 8308:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
 8309:             {
 8310:                 $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $url, $email));
 8311:             }
 8312:         }
 8313:         if ($author = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'author'))
 8314:         {
 8315:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array(null, null, $this->sanitize($author[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT)));
 8316:         }
 8317:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
 8318:         {
 8319:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 8320:         }
 8321:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
 8322:         {
 8323:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 8324:         }
 8325:         foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
 8326:         {
 8327:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
 8328:         }
 8329: 
 8330:         if (!empty($authors))
 8331:         {
 8332:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($authors));
 8333:         }
 8334:         elseif (($source = $this->get_source()) && ($authors = $source->get_authors()))
 8335:         {
 8336:             return $authors;
 8337:         }
 8338:         elseif ($authors = $this->feed->get_authors())
 8339:         {
 8340:             return $authors;
 8341:         }
 8342:         else
 8343:         {
 8344:             return null;
 8345:         }
 8346:     }
 8347: 
 8348:     public function get_copyright()
 8349:     {
 8350:         if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
 8351:         {
 8352:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
 8353:         }
 8354:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
 8355:         {
 8356:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8357:         }
 8358:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
 8359:         {
 8360:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8361:         }
 8362:         else
 8363:         {
 8364:             return null;
 8365:         }
 8366:     }
 8367: 
 8368:     public function get_date($date_format = 'j F Y, g:i a')
 8369:     {
 8370:         if (!isset($this->data['date']))
 8371:         {
 8372:             if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'published'))
 8373:             {
 8374:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8375:             }
 8376:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'updated'))
 8377:             {
 8378:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8379:             }
 8380:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'issued'))
 8381:             {
 8382:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8383:             }
 8384:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'created'))
 8385:             {
 8386:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8387:             }
 8388:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'modified'))
 8389:             {
 8390:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8391:             }
 8392:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'pubDate'))
 8393:             {
 8394:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8395:             }
 8396:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'date'))
 8397:             {
 8398:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8399:             }
 8400:             elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'date'))
 8401:             {
 8402:                 $this->data['date']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8403:             }
 8404: 
 8405:             if (!empty($this->data['date']['raw']))
 8406:             {
