 8407:                 $parser = $this->registry->call('Parse_Date', 'get');
 8408:                 $this->data['date']['parsed'] = $parser->parse($this->data['date']['raw']);
 8409:             }
 8410:             else
 8411:             {
 8412:                 $this->data['date'] = null;
 8413:             }
 8414:         }
 8415:         if ($this->data['date'])
 8416:         {
 8417:             $date_format = (string) $date_format;
 8418:             switch ($date_format)
 8419:             {
 8420:                 case '':
 8421:                     return $this->sanitize($this->data['date']['raw'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8422: 
 8423:                 case 'U':
 8424:                     return $this->data['date']['parsed'];
 8425: 
 8426:                 default:
 8427:                     return date($date_format, $this->data['date']['parsed']);
 8428:             }
 8429:         }
 8430:         else
 8431:         {
 8432:             return null;
 8433:         }
 8434:     }
 8435: 
 8436:     public function get_updated_date($date_format = 'j F Y, g:i a')
 8437:     {
 8438:         if (!isset($this->data['updated']))
 8439:         {
 8440:             if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'updated'))
 8441:             {
 8442:                 $this->data['updated']['raw'] = $return[0]['data'];
 8443:             }
 8444: 
 8445:             if (!empty($this->data['updated']['raw']))
 8446:             {
 8447:                 $parser = $this->registry->call('Parse_Date', 'get');
 8448:                 $this->data['updated']['parsed'] = $parser->parse($this->data['date']['raw']);
 8449:             }
 8450:             else
 8451:             {
 8452:                 $this->data['updated'] = null;
 8453:             }
 8454:         }
 8455:         if ($this->data['updated'])
 8456:         {
 8457:             $date_format = (string) $date_format;
 8458:             switch ($date_format)
 8459:             {
 8460:                 case '':
 8461:                     return $this->sanitize($this->data['updated']['raw'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8462: 
 8463:                 case 'U':
 8464:                     return $this->data['updated']['parsed'];
 8465: 
 8466:                 default:
 8467:                     return date($date_format, $this->data['updated']['parsed']);
 8468:             }
 8469:         }
 8470:         else
 8471:         {
 8472:             return null;
 8473:         }
 8474:     }
 8475:     
 8476:     public function get_local_date($date_format = '%c')
 8477:     {
 8478:         if (!$date_format)
 8479:         {
 8480:             return $this->sanitize($this->get_date(''), SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8481:         }
 8482:         elseif (($date = $this->get_date('U')) !== null && $date !== false)
 8483:         {
 8484:             return strftime($date_format, $date);
 8485:         }
 8486:         else
 8487:         {
 8488:             return null;
 8489:         }
 8490:     }
 8491: 
 8492:     public function get_gmdate($date_format = 'j F Y, g:i a')
 8493:     {
 8494:         $date = $this->get_date('U');
 8495:         if ($date === null)
 8496:         {
 8497:             return null;
 8498:         }
 8499: 
 8500:         return gmdate($date_format, $date);
 8501:     }
 8502: 
 8503:     public function get_updated_gmdate($date_format = 'j F Y, g:i a')
 8504:     {
 8505:         $date = $this->get_updated_date('U');
 8506:         if ($date === null)
 8507:         {
 8508:             return null;
 8509:         }
 8510: 
 8511:         return gmdate($date_format, $date);
 8512:     }
 8513: 
 8514:     public function get_permalink()
 8515:     {
 8516:         $link = $this->get_link();
 8517:         $enclosure = $this->get_enclosure(0);
 8518:         if ($link !== null)
 8519:         {
 8520:             return $link;
 8521:         }
 8522:         elseif ($enclosure !== null)
 8523:         {
 8524:             return $enclosure->get_link();
 8525:         }
 8526:         else
 8527:         {
 8528:             return null;
 8529:         }
 8530:     }
 8531: 
 8532:     public function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
 8533:     {
 8534:         $links = $this->get_links($rel);
 8535:         if ($links[$key] !== null)
 8536:         {
 8537:             return $links[$key];
 8538:         }
 8539:         else
 8540:         {
 8541:             return null;
 8542:         }
 8543:     }
 8544: 
 8545:     public function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
 8546:     {
 8547:         if (!isset($this->data['links']))
 8548:         {
 8549:             $this->data['links'] = array();
 8550:             foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link') as $link)
 8551:             {
 8552:                 if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
 8553:                 {
 8554:                     $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
 8555:                     $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
 8556: 
 8557:                 }
 8558:             }
 8559:             foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link') as $link)
 8560:             {
 8561:                 if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
 8562:                 {
 8563:                     $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
 8564:                     $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
 8565:                 }
 8566:             }
 8567:             if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
 8568:             {
 8569:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
 8570:             }
 8571:             if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
 8572:             {
 8573:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
 8574:             }
 8575:             if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
 8576:             {
 8577:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
 8578:             }
 8579:             if ($links = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'guid'))
 8580:             {
 8581:                 if (!isset($links[0]['attribs']['']['isPermaLink']) || strtolower(trim($links[0]['attribs']['']['isPermaLink'])) === 'true')
 8582:                 {
 8583:                     $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
 8584:                 }
 8585:             }
 8586: 
 8587:             $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
 8588:             foreach ($keys as $key)
 8589:             {
 8590:                 if ($this->registry->call('Misc', 'is_isegment_nz_nc', array($key)))
 8591:                 {
 8592:                     if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
 8593:                     {
 8594:                         $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
 8595:                         $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
 8596:                     }
 8597:                     else
 8598:                     {
 8599:                         $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
 8600:                     }
 8601:                 }
 8602:                 elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
 8603:                 {
 8604:                     $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
 8605:                 }
 8606:                 $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
 8607:             }
 8608:         }
 8609:         if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
 8610:         {
 8611:             return $this->data['links'][$rel];
 8612:         }
 8613:         else
 8614:         {
 8615:             return null;
 8616:         }
 8617:     }
 8618: 
 8619:     /**
 8620:      * @todo Add ability to prefer one type of content over another (in a media group).
 8621:      */
 8622:     public function get_enclosure($key = 0, $prefer = null)
 8623:     {
 8624:         $enclosures = $this->get_enclosures();
 8625:         if (isset($enclosures[$key]))
 8626:         {
 8627:             return $enclosures[$key];
 8628:         }
 8629:         else
 8630:         {
 8631:             return null;
 8632:         }
 8633:     }
 8634: 
 8635:     /**
 8636:      * Grabs all available enclosures (podcasts, etc.)
 8637:      *
 8638:      * Supports the <enclosure> RSS tag, as well as Media RSS and iTunes RSS.
 8639:      *
 8640:      * At this point, we're pretty much assuming that all enclosures for an item are the same content.  Anything else is too complicated to properly support.
 8641:      *
 8642:      * @todo Add support for end-user defined sorting of enclosures by type/handler (so we can prefer the faster-loading FLV over MP4).
 8643:      * @todo If an element exists at a level, but it's value is empty, we should fall back to the value from the parent (if it exists).
 8644:      */
 8645:     public function get_enclosures()
 8646:     {
 8647:         if (!isset($this->data['enclosures']))
 8648:         {
 8649:             $this->data['enclosures'] = array();
 8650: 
 8651:             // Elements
 8652:             $captions_parent = null;
 8653:             $categories_parent = null;
 8654:             $copyrights_parent = null;
 8655:             $credits_parent = null;
 8656:             $description_parent = null;
 8657:             $duration_parent = null;
 8658:             $hashes_parent = null;
 8659:             $keywords_parent = null;
 8660:             $player_parent = null;
 8661:             $ratings_parent = null;
 8662:             $restrictions_parent = null;
 8663:             $thumbnails_parent = null;
 8664:             $title_parent = null;
 8665: 
 8666:             // Let's do the channel and item-level ones first, and just re-use them if we need to.
 8667:             $parent = $this->get_feed();
 8668: 
 8669:             // CAPTIONS
 8670:             if ($captions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'text'))
 8671:             {
 8672:                 foreach ($captions as $caption)
 8673:                 {
 8674:                     $caption_type = null;
 8675:                     $caption_lang = null;
 8676:                     $caption_startTime = null;
 8677:                     $caption_endTime = null;
 8678:                     $caption_text = null;
 8679:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
 8680:                     {
 8681:                         $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8682:                     }
 8683:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
 8684:                     {
 8685:                         $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8686:                     }
 8687:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
 8688:                     {
 8689:                         $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8690:                     }
 8691:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
 8692:                     {
 8693:                         $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8694:                     }
 8695:                     if (isset($caption['data']))
 8696:                     {
 8697:                         $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8698:                     }
 8699:                     $captions_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Caption', array($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text));
 8700:                 }
 8701:             }
 8702:             elseif ($captions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'text'))
 8703:             {
 8704:                 foreach ($captions as $caption)
 8705:                 {
 8706:                     $caption_type = null;
 8707:                     $caption_lang = null;
 8708:                     $caption_startTime = null;
 8709:                     $caption_endTime = null;
 8710:                     $caption_text = null;
 8711:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
 8712:                     {
 8713:                         $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8714:                     }
 8715:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
 8716:                     {
 8717:                         $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8718:                     }
 8719:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
 8720:                     {
 8721:                         $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8722:                     }
 8723:                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
 8724:                     {
 8725:                         $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8726:                     }
 8727:                     if (isset($caption['data']))
 8728:                     {
 8729:                         $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8730:                     }
 8731:                     $captions_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Caption', array($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text));
 8732:                 }
 8733:             }
 8734:             if (is_array($captions_parent))
 8735:             {
 8736:                 $captions_parent = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($captions_parent)));
 8737:             }
 8738: 
 8739:             // CATEGORIES
 8740:             foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'category') as $category)
 8741:             {
 8742:                 $term = null;
 8743:                 $scheme = null;
 8744:                 $label = null;
 8745:                 if (isset($category['data']))
 8746:                 {
 8747:                     $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8748:                 }
 8749:                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 8750:                 {
 8751:                     $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8752:                 }
 8753:                 else
 8754:                 {
 8755:                     $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
 8756:                 }
 8757:                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
 8758:                 {
 8759:                     $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8760:                 }
 8761:                 $categories_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 8762:             }
 8763:             foreach ((array) $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'category') as $category)
 8764:             {
 8765:                 $term = null;
 8766:                 $scheme = null;
 8767:                 $label = null;
 8768:                 if (isset($category['data']))
 8769:                 {
 8770:                     $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8771:                 }
 8772:                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 8773:                 {
 8774:                     $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8775:                 }
 8776:                 else
 8777:                 {
 8778:                     $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
 8779:                 }
 8780:                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
 8781:                 {
 8782:                     $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8783:                 }
 8784:                 $categories_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 8785:             }
 8786:             foreach ((array) $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'category') as $category)
 8787:             {
 8788:                 $term = null;
 8789:                 $scheme = 'http://www.itunes.com/dtds/podcast-1.0.dtd';
 8790:                 $label = null;
 8791:                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['text']))
 8792:                 {
 8793:                     $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['text'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8794:                 }
 8795:                 $categories_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 8796: 
 8797:                 if (isset($category['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES]['category']))
 8798:                 {
 8799:                     foreach ((array) $category['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES]['category'] as $subcategory)
 8800:                     {
 8801:                         if (isset($subcategory['attribs']['']['text']))
 8802:                         {
 8803:                             $label = $this->sanitize($subcategory['attribs']['']['text'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8804:                         }
 8805:                         $categories_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 8806:                     }
 8807:                 }
 8808:             }
 8809:             if (is_array($categories_parent))
 8810:             {
 8811:                 $categories_parent = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories_parent)));
 8812:             }
 8813: 
 8814:             // COPYRIGHT
 8815:             if ($copyright = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'copyright'))
 8816:             {
 8817:                 $copyright_url = null;
 8818:                 $copyright_label = null;
 8819:                 if (isset($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
 8820:                 {
 8821:                     $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8822:                 }
 8823:                 if (isset($copyright[0]['data']))
 8824:                 {
 8825:                     $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8826:                 }
 8827:                 $copyrights_parent = $this->registry->create('Copyright', array($copyright_url, $copyright_label));
 8828:             }
 8829:             elseif ($copyright = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'copyright'))
 8830:             {
 8831:                 $copyright_url = null;
 8832:                 $copyright_label = null;
 8833:                 if (isset($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
 8834:                 {
 8835:                     $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8836:                 }
 8837:                 if (isset($copyright[0]['data']))
 8838:                 {
 8839:                     $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($copyright[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8840:                 }
 8841:                 $copyrights_parent = $this->registry->create('Copyright', array($copyright_url, $copyright_label));
 8842:             }
 8843: 
 8844:             // CREDITS
 8845:             if ($credits = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'credit'))
 8846:             {
 8847:                 foreach ($credits as $credit)
 8848:                 {
 8849:                     $credit_role = null;
 8850:                     $credit_scheme = null;
 8851:                     $credit_name = null;
 8852:                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
 8853:                     {
 8854:                         $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8855:                     }
 8856:                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 8857:                     {
 8858:                         $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8859:                     }
 8860:                     else
 8861:                     {
 8862:                         $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
 8863:                     }
 8864:                     if (isset($credit['data']))
 8865:                     {
 8866:                         $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8867:                     }
 8868:                     $credits_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Credit', array($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name));
 8869:                 }
 8870:             }
 8871:             elseif ($credits = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'credit'))
 8872:             {
 8873:                 foreach ($credits as $credit)
 8874:                 {
 8875:                     $credit_role = null;
 8876:                     $credit_scheme = null;
 8877:                     $credit_name = null;
 8878:                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
 8879:                     {
 8880:                         $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8881:                     }
 8882:                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 8883:                     {
 8884:                         $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8885:                     }
 8886:                     else
 8887:                     {
 8888:                         $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
 8889:                     }
 8890:                     if (isset($credit['data']))
 8891:                     {
 8892:                         $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8893:                     }
 8894:                     $credits_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Credit', array($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name));
 8895:                 }
 8896:             }
 8897:             if (is_array($credits_parent))
 8898:             {
 8899:                 $credits_parent = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($credits_parent)));
 8900:             }
 8901: 
 8902:             // DESCRIPTION
 8903:             if ($description_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'description'))
 8904:             {
 8905:                 if (isset($description_parent[0]['data']))
 8906:                 {
 8907:                     $description_parent = $this->sanitize($description_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8908:                 }
 8909:             }
 8910:             elseif ($description_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'description'))
 8911:             {
 8912:                 if (isset($description_parent[0]['data']))
 8913:                 {
 8914:                     $description_parent = $this->sanitize($description_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8915:                 }
 8916:             }
 8917: 
 8918:             // DURATION
 8919:             if ($duration_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'duration'))
 8920:             {
 8921:                 $seconds = null;
 8922:                 $minutes = null;
 8923:                 $hours = null;
 8924:                 if (isset($duration_parent[0]['data']))
 8925:                 {
 8926:                     $temp = explode(':', $this->sanitize($duration_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
 8927:                     if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
 8928:                     {
 8929:                         $seconds = (int) array_pop($temp);
 8930:                     }
 8931:                     if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
 8932:                     {
 8933:                         $minutes = (int) array_pop($temp);
 8934:                         $seconds += $minutes * 60;
 8935:                     }
 8936:                     if (sizeof($temp) > 0)
 8937:                     {
 8938:                         $hours = (int) array_pop($temp);
 8939:                         $seconds += $hours * 3600;
 8940:                     }
 8941:                     unset($temp);
 8942:                     $duration_parent = $seconds;
 8943:                 }
 8944:             }
 8945: 
 8946:             // HASHES
 8947:             if ($hashes_iterator = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'hash'))
 8948:             {
 8949:                 foreach ($hashes_iterator as $hash)
 8950:                 {
 8951:                     $value = null;
 8952:                     $algo = null;
 8953:                     if (isset($hash['data']))
 8954:                     {
 8955:                         $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8956:                     }
 8957:                     if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
 8958:                     {
 8959:                         $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8960:                     }
 8961:                     else
 8962:                     {
 8963:                         $algo = 'md5';
 8964:                     }
 8965:                     $hashes_parent[] = $algo.':'.$value;
 8966:                 }
 8967:             }
 8968:             elseif ($hashes_iterator = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'hash'))
 8969:             {
 8970:                 foreach ($hashes_iterator as $hash)
 8971:                 {
 8972:                     $value = null;
 8973:                     $algo = null;
 8974:                     if (isset($hash['data']))
 8975:                     {
 8976:                         $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8977:                     }
 8978:                     if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
 8979:                     {
 8980:                         $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 8981:                     }
 8982:                     else
 8983:                     {
 8984:                         $algo = 'md5';
 8985:                     }
 8986:                     $hashes_parent[] = $algo.':'.$value;
 8987:                 }
 8988:             }
 8989:             if (is_array($hashes_parent))
 8990:             {
 8991:                 $hashes_parent = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($hashes_parent)));
 8992:             }
 8993: 
 8994:             // KEYWORDS
 8995:             if ($keywords = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'keywords'))
 8996:             {
 8997:                 if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
 8998:                 {
 8999:                     $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
 9000:                     foreach ($temp as $word)
 9001:                     {
 9002:                         $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
 9003:                     }
 9004:                 }
 9005:                 unset($temp);
 9006:             }
 9007:             elseif ($keywords = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'keywords'))
 9008:             {
 9009:                 if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
 9010:                 {
 9011:                     $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
 9012:                     foreach ($temp as $word)
 9013:                     {
 9014:                         $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
 9015:                     }
 9016:                 }
 9017:                 unset($temp);
 9018:             }
 9019:             elseif ($keywords = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'keywords'))
 9020:             {
 9021:                 if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
 9022:                 {
 9023:                     $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
 9024:                     foreach ($temp as $word)
 9025:                     {
 9026:                         $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
 9027:                     }
 9028:                 }
 9029:                 unset($temp);
 9030:             }
 9031:             elseif ($keywords = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'keywords'))
 9032:             {
 9033:                 if (isset($keywords[0]['data']))
 9034:                 {
 9035:                     $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($keywords[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
 9036:                     foreach ($temp as $word)
 9037:                     {
 9038:                         $keywords_parent[] = trim($word);
 9039:                     }
 9040:                 }
 9041:                 unset($temp);
 9042:             }
 9043:             if (is_array($keywords_parent))
 9044:             {
 9045:                 $keywords_parent = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($keywords_parent)));
 9046:             }
 9047: 
 9048:             // PLAYER
 9049:             if ($player_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'player'))
 9050:             {
 9051:                 if (isset($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
 9052:                 {
 9053:                     $player_parent = $this->sanitize($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9054:                 }
 9055:             }
 9056:             elseif ($player_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'player'))
 9057:             {
 9058:                 if (isset($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
 9059:                 {
 9060:                     $player_parent = $this->sanitize($player_parent[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9061:                 }
 9062:             }
 9063: 
 9064:             // RATINGS
 9065:             if ($ratings = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'rating'))
 9066:             {
 9067:                 foreach ($ratings as $rating)
 9068:                 {
 9069:                     $rating_scheme = null;
 9070:                     $rating_value = null;
 9071:                     if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9072:                     {
 9073:                         $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9074:                     }
 9075:                     else
 9076:                     {
 9077:                         $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
 9078:                     }
 9079:                     if (isset($rating['data']))
 9080:                     {
 9081:                         $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9082:                     }
 9083:                     $ratings_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Rating', array($rating_scheme, $rating_value));
 9084:                 }
 9085:             }
 9086:             elseif ($ratings = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'explicit'))
 9087:             {
 9088:                 foreach ($ratings as $rating)
 9089:                 {
 9090:                     $rating_scheme = 'urn:itunes';
 9091:                     $rating_value = null;
 9092:                     if (isset($rating['data']))
 9093:                     {
 9094:                         $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9095:                     }
 9096:                     $ratings_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Rating', array($rating_scheme, $rating_value));
 9097:                 }
 9098:             }
 9099:             elseif ($ratings = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'rating'))
 9100:             {
 9101:                 foreach ($ratings as $rating)
 9102:                 {
 9103:                     $rating_scheme = null;
 9104:                     $rating_value = null;
 9105:                     if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9106:                     {
 9107:                         $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9108:                     }
 9109:                     else
 9110:                     {
 9111:                         $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
 9112:                     }
 9113:                     if (isset($rating['data']))
 9114:                     {
 9115:                         $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9116:                     }
 9117:                     $ratings_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Rating', array($rating_scheme, $rating_value));
 9118:                 }
 9119:             }
 9120:             elseif ($ratings = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'explicit'))
 9121:             {
 9122:                 foreach ($ratings as $rating)
 9123:                 {
 9124:                     $rating_scheme = 'urn:itunes';
 9125:                     $rating_value = null;
 9126:                     if (isset($rating['data']))
 9127:                     {
 9128:                         $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9129:                     }
 9130:                     $ratings_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Rating', array($rating_scheme, $rating_value));
 9131:                 }
 9132:             }
 9133:             if (is_array($ratings_parent))
 9134:             {
 9135:                 $ratings_parent = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($ratings_parent)));
 9136:             }
 9137: 
 9138:             // RESTRICTIONS
 9139:             if ($restrictions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'restriction'))
 9140:             {
 9141:                 foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
 9142:                 {
 9143:                     $restriction_relationship = null;
 9144:                     $restriction_type = null;
 9145:                     $restriction_value = null;
 9146:                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
 9147:                     {
 9148:                         $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9149:                     }
 9150:                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
 9151:                     {
 9152:                         $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9153:                     }
 9154:                     if (isset($restriction['data']))
 9155:                     {
 9156:                         $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9157:                     }
 9158:                     $restrictions_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Restriction', array($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value));
 9159:                 }
 9160:             }
 9161:             elseif ($restrictions = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'block'))
 9162:             {
 9163:                 foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
 9164:                 {
 9165:                     $restriction_relationship = 'allow';
 9166:                     $restriction_type = null;
 9167:                     $restriction_value = 'itunes';
 9168:                     if (isset($restriction['data']) && strtolower($restriction['data']) === 'yes')
 9169:                     {
 9170:                         $restriction_relationship = 'deny';
 9171:                     }
 9172:                     $restrictions_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Restriction', array($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value));
 9173:                 }
 9174:             }
 9175:             elseif ($restrictions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'restriction'))
 9176:             {
 9177:                 foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
 9178:                 {
 9179:                     $restriction_relationship = null;
 9180:                     $restriction_type = null;
 9181:                     $restriction_value = null;
 9182:                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
 9183:                     {
 9184:                         $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9185:                     }
 9186:                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
 9187:                     {
 9188:                         $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9189:                     }
 9190:                     if (isset($restriction['data']))
 9191:                     {
 9192:                         $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9193:                     }
 9194:                     $restrictions_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Restriction', array($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value));
 9195:                 }
 9196:             }
 9197:             elseif ($restrictions = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'block'))
 9198:             {
 9199:                 foreach ($restrictions as $restriction)
 9200:                 {
 9201:                     $restriction_relationship = 'allow';
 9202:                     $restriction_type = null;
 9203:                     $restriction_value = 'itunes';
 9204:                     if (isset($restriction['data']) && strtolower($restriction['data']) === 'yes')
 9205:                     {
 9206:                         $restriction_relationship = 'deny';
 9207:                     }
 9208:                     $restrictions_parent[] = $this->registry->create('Restriction', array($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value));
 9209:                 }
 9210:             }
 9211:             if (is_array($restrictions_parent))
 9212:             {
 9213:                 $restrictions_parent = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($restrictions_parent)));
 9214:             }
 9215: 
 9216:             // THUMBNAILS
 9217:             if ($thumbnails = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'thumbnail'))
 9218:             {
 9219:                 foreach ($thumbnails as $thumbnail)
 9220:                 {
 9221:                     if (isset($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url']))
 9222:                     {
 9223:                         $thumbnails_parent[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9224:                     }
 9225:                 }
 9226:             }
 9227:             elseif ($thumbnails = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'thumbnail'))
 9228:             {
 9229:                 foreach ($thumbnails as $thumbnail)
 9230:                 {
 9231:                     if (isset($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url']))
 9232:                     {
 9233:                         $thumbnails_parent[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9234:                     }
 9235:                 }
 9236:             }
 9237: 
 9238:             // TITLES
 9239:             if ($title_parent = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'title'))
 9240:             {
 9241:                 if (isset($title_parent[0]['data']))
 9242:                 {
 9243:                     $title_parent = $this->sanitize($title_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9244:                 }
 9245:             }
 9246:             elseif ($title_parent = $parent->get_channel_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'title'))
 9247:             {
 9248:                 if (isset($title_parent[0]['data']))
 9249:                 {
 9250:                     $title_parent = $this->sanitize($title_parent[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9251:                 }
 9252:             }
 9253: 
 9254:             // Clear the memory
 9255:             unset($parent);
 9256: 
 9257:             // Attributes
 9258:             $bitrate = null;
 9259:             $channels = null;
 9260:             $duration = null;
 9261:             $expression = null;
 9262:             $framerate = null;
 9263:             $height = null;
 9264:             $javascript = null;
 9265:             $lang = null;
 9266:             $length = null;
 9267:             $medium = null;
 9268:             $samplingrate = null;
 9269:             $type = null;
 9270:             $url = null;
 9271:             $width = null;
 9272: 
 9273:             // Elements
 9274:             $captions = null;
 9275:             $categories = null;
 9276:             $copyrights = null;
 9277:             $credits = null;
 9278:             $description = null;
 9279:             $hashes = null;
 9280:             $keywords = null;
 9281:             $player = null;
 9282:             $ratings = null;
 9283:             $restrictions = null;
 9284:             $thumbnails = null;
 9285:             $title = null;
 9286: 
 9287:             // If we have media:group tags, loop through them.
 9288:             foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS, 'group') as $group)
 9289:             {
 9290:                 if(isset($group['child']) && isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content']))
 9291:                 {
 9292:                     // If we have media:content tags, loop through them.
 9293:                     foreach ((array) $group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content'] as $content)
 9294:                     {
 9295:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']))
 9296:                         {
 9297:                             // Attributes
 9298:                             $bitrate = null;
 9299:                             $channels = null;
 9300:                             $duration = null;
 9301:                             $expression = null;
 9302:                             $framerate = null;
 9303:                             $height = null;
 9304:                             $javascript = null;
 9305:                             $lang = null;
 9306:                             $length = null;
 9307:                             $medium = null;
 9308:                             $samplingrate = null;
 9309:                             $type = null;
 9310:                             $url = null;
 9311:                             $width = null;
 9312: 
 9313:                             // Elements
 9314:                             $captions = null;
 9315:                             $categories = null;
 9316:                             $copyrights = null;
 9317:                             $credits = null;
 9318:                             $description = null;
 9319:                             $hashes = null;
 9320:                             $keywords = null;
 9321:                             $player = null;
 9322:                             $ratings = null;
 9323:                             $restrictions = null;
 9324:                             $thumbnails = null;
 9325:                             $title = null;
 9326: 
 9327:                             // Start checking the attributes of media:content
 9328:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['bitrate']))
 9329:                             {
 9330:                                 $bitrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['bitrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9331:                             }
 9332:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['channels']))
 9333:                             {
 9334:                                 $channels = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['channels'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9335:                             }
 9336:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['duration']))
 9337:                             {
 9338:                                 $duration = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['duration'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9339:                             }
 9340:                             else
 9341:                             {
 9342:                                 $duration = $duration_parent;
 9343:                             }
 9344:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['expression']))
 9345:                             {
 9346:                                 $expression = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['expression'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9347:                             }
 9348:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['framerate']))
 9349:                             {
 9350:                                 $framerate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['framerate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9351:                             }
 9352:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['height']))
 9353:                             {
 9354:                                 $height = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['height'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9355:                             }
 9356:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['lang']))
 9357:                             {
 9358:                                 $lang = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9359:                             }
 9360:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']))
 9361:                             {
 9362:                                 $length = ceil($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']);
 9363:                             }
 9364:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['medium']))
 9365:                             {
 9366:                                 $medium = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['medium'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9367:                             }
 9368:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate']))
 9369:                             {
 9370:                                 $samplingrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9371:                             }
 9372:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['type']))
 9373:                             {
 9374:                                 $type = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9375:                             }
 9376:                             if (isset($content['attribs']['']['width']))
 9377:                             {
 9378:                                 $width = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['width'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9379:                             }
 9380:                             $url = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9381: 
 9382:                             // Checking the other optional media: elements. Priority: media:content, media:group, item, channel
 9383: 
 9384:                             // CAPTIONS
 9385:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
 9386:                             {
 9387:                                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
 9388:                                 {
 9389:                                     $caption_type = null;
 9390:                                     $caption_lang = null;
 9391:                                     $caption_startTime = null;
 9392:                                     $caption_endTime = null;
 9393:                                     $caption_text = null;
 9394:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
 9395:                                     {
 9396:                                         $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9397:                                     }
 9398:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
 9399:                                     {
 9400:                                         $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9401:                                     }
 9402:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
 9403:                                     {
 9404:                                         $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9405:                                     }
 9406:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
 9407:                                     {
 9408:                                         $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9409:                                     }
 9410:                                     if (isset($caption['data']))
 9411:                                     {
 9412:                                         $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9413:                                     }
 9414:                                     $captions[] = $this->registry->create('Caption', array($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text));
 9415:                                 }
 9416:                                 if (is_array($captions))
 9417:                                 {
 9418:                                     $captions = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($captions)));
 9419:                                 }
 9420:                             }
 9421:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
 9422:                             {
 9423:                                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
 9424:                                 {
 9425:                                     $caption_type = null;
 9426:                                     $caption_lang = null;
 9427:                                     $caption_startTime = null;
 9428:                                     $caption_endTime = null;
 9429:                                     $caption_text = null;
 9430:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
 9431:                                     {
 9432:                                         $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9433:                                     }
 9434:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
 9435:                                     {
 9436:                                         $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9437:                                     }
 9438:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
 9439:                                     {
 9440:                                         $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9441:                                     }
 9442:                                     if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
 9443:                                     {
 9444:                                         $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9445:                                     }
 9446:                                     if (isset($caption['data']))
 9447:                                     {
 9448:                                         $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9449:                                     }
 9450:                                     $captions[] = $this->registry->create('Caption', array($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text));
 9451:                                 }
 9452:                                 if (is_array($captions))
 9453:                                 {
 9454:                                     $captions = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($captions)));
 9455:                                 }
 9456:                             }
 9457:                             else
 9458:                             {
 9459:                                 $captions = $captions_parent;
 9460:                             }
 9461: 
 9462:                             // CATEGORIES
 9463:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
 9464:                             {
 9465:                                 foreach ((array) $content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
 9466:                                 {
 9467:                                     $term = null;
 9468:                                     $scheme = null;
 9469:                                     $label = null;
 9470:                                     if (isset($category['data']))
 9471:                                     {
 9472:                                         $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9473:                                     }
 9474:                                     if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9475:                                     {
 9476:                                         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9477:                                     }
 9478:                                     else
 9479:                                     {
 9480:                                         $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
 9481:                                     }
 9482:                                     if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
 9483:                                     {
 9484:                                         $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9485:                                     }
 9486:                                     $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 9487:                                 }
 9488:                             }
 9489:                             if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
 9490:                             {
 9491:                                 foreach ((array) $group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
 9492:                                 {
 9493:                                     $term = null;
 9494:                                     $scheme = null;
 9495:                                     $label = null;
 9496:                                     if (isset($category['data']))
 9497:                                     {
 9498:                                         $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9499:                                     }
 9500:                                     if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9501:                                     {
 9502:                                         $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9503:                                     }
 9504:                                     else
 9505:                                     {
 9506:                                         $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
 9507:                                     }
 9508:                                     if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
 9509:                                     {
 9510:                                         $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9511:                                     }
 9512:                                     $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
 9513:                                 }
 9514:                             }
 9515:                             if (is_array($categories) && is_array($categories_parent))
 9516:                             {
 9517:                                 $categories = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array(array_merge($categories, $categories_parent))));
 9518:                             }
 9519:                             elseif (is_array($categories))
 9520:                             {
 9521:                                 $categories = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories)));
 9522:                             }
 9523:                             elseif (is_array($categories_parent))
 9524:                             {
 9525:                                 $categories = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories_parent)));
 9526:                             }
 9527: 
 9528:                             // COPYRIGHTS
 9529:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
 9530:                             {
 9531:                                 $copyright_url = null;
 9532:                                 $copyright_label = null;
 9533:                                 if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
 9534:                                 {
 9535:                                     $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9536:                                 }
 9537:                                 if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
 9538:                                 {
 9539:                                     $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9540:                                 }
 9541:                                 $copyrights = $this->registry->create('Copyright', array($copyright_url, $copyright_label));
 9542:                             }
 9543:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
 9544:                             {
 9545:                                 $copyright_url = null;
 9546:                                 $copyright_label = null;
 9547:                                 if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
 9548:                                 {
 9549:                                     $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9550:                                 }
 9551:                                 if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
 9552:                                 {
 9553:                                     $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9554:                                 }
 9555:                                 $copyrights = $this->registry->create('Copyright', array($copyright_url, $copyright_label));
 9556:                             }
 9557:                             else
 9558:                             {
 9559:                                 $copyrights = $copyrights_parent;
 9560:                             }
 9561: 
 9562:                             // CREDITS
 9563:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
 9564:                             {
 9565:                                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
 9566:                                 {
 9567:                                     $credit_role = null;
 9568:                                     $credit_scheme = null;
 9569:                                     $credit_name = null;
 9570:                                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
 9571:                                     {
 9572:                                         $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9573:                                     }
 9574:                                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9575:                                     {
 9576:                                         $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9577:                                     }
 9578:                                     else
 9579:                                     {
 9580:                                         $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
 9581:                                     }
 9582:                                     if (isset($credit['data']))
 9583:                                     {
 9584:                                         $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9585:                                     }
 9586:                                     $credits[] = $this->registry->create('Credit', array($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name));
 9587:                                 }
 9588:                                 if (is_array($credits))
 9589:                                 {
 9590:                                     $credits = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($credits)));
 9591:                                 }
 9592:                             }
 9593:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
 9594:                             {
 9595:                                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
 9596:                                 {
 9597:                                     $credit_role = null;
 9598:                                     $credit_scheme = null;
 9599:                                     $credit_name = null;
 9600:                                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
 9601:                                     {
 9602:                                         $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9603:                                     }
 9604:                                     if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9605:                                     {
 9606:                                         $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9607:                                     }
 9608:                                     else
 9609:                                     {
 9610:                                         $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
 9611:                                     }
 9612:                                     if (isset($credit['data']))
 9613:                                     {
 9614:                                         $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9615:                                     }
 9616:                                     $credits[] = $this->registry->create('Credit', array($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name));
 9617:                                 }
 9618:                                 if (is_array($credits))
 9619:                                 {
 9620:                                     $credits = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($credits)));
 9621:                                 }
 9622:                             }
 9623:                             else
 9624:                             {
 9625:                                 $credits = $credits_parent;
 9626:                             }
 9627: 
 9628:                             // DESCRIPTION
 9629:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
 9630:                             {
 9631:                                 $description = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9632:                             }
 9633:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
 9634:                             {
 9635:                                 $description = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9636:                             }
 9637:                             else
 9638:                             {
 9639:                                 $description = $description_parent;
 9640:                             }
 9641: 
 9642:                             // HASHES
 9643:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
 9644:                             {
 9645:                                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
 9646:                                 {
 9647:                                     $value = null;
 9648:                                     $algo = null;
 9649:                                     if (isset($hash['data']))
 9650:                                     {
 9651:                                         $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9652:                                     }
 9653:                                     if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
 9654:                                     {
 9655:                                         $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9656:                                     }
 9657:                                     else
 9658:                                     {
 9659:                                         $algo = 'md5';
 9660:                                     }
 9661:                                     $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
 9662:                                 }
 9663:                                 if (is_array($hashes))
 9664:                                 {
 9665:                                     $hashes = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($hashes)));
 9666:                                 }
 9667:                             }
 9668:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
 9669:                             {
 9670:                                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
 9671:                                 {
 9672:                                     $value = null;
 9673:                                     $algo = null;
 9674:                                     if (isset($hash['data']))
 9675:                                     {
 9676:                                         $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9677:                                     }
 9678:                                     if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
 9679:                                     {
 9680:                                         $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9681:                                     }
 9682:                                     else
 9683:                                     {
 9684:                                         $algo = 'md5';
 9685:                                     }
 9686:                                     $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
 9687:                                 }
 9688:                                 if (is_array($hashes))
 9689:                                 {
 9690:                                     $hashes = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($hashes)));
 9691:                                 }
 9692:                             }
 9693:                             else
 9694:                             {
 9695:                                 $hashes = $hashes_parent;
 9696:                             }
 9697: 
 9698:                             // KEYWORDS
 9699:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
 9700:                             {
 9701:                                 if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
 9702:                                 {
 9703:                                     $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
 9704:                                     foreach ($temp as $word)
 9705:                                     {
 9706:                                         $keywords[] = trim($word);
 9707:                                     }
 9708:                                     unset($temp);
 9709:                                 }
 9710:                                 if (is_array($keywords))
 9711:                                 {
 9712:                                     $keywords = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($keywords)));
 9713:                                 }
 9714:                             }
 9715:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
 9716:                             {
 9717:                                 if (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
 9718:                                 {
 9719:                                     $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
 9720:                                     foreach ($temp as $word)
 9721:                                     {
 9722:                                         $keywords[] = trim($word);
 9723:                                     }
 9724:                                     unset($temp);
 9725:                                 }
 9726:                                 if (is_array($keywords))
 9727:                                 {
 9728:                                     $keywords = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($keywords)));
 9729:                                 }
 9730:                             }
 9731:                             else
 9732:                             {
 9733:                                 $keywords = $keywords_parent;
 9734:                             }
 9735: 
 9736:                             // PLAYER
 9737:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
 9738:                             {
 9739:                                 $player = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9740:                             }
 9741:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
 9742:                             {
 9743:                                 $player = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9744:                             }
 9745:                             else
 9746:                             {
 9747:                                 $player = $player_parent;
 9748:                             }
 9749: 
 9750:                             // RATINGS
 9751:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
 9752:                             {
 9753:                                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
 9754:                                 {
 9755:                                     $rating_scheme = null;
 9756:                                     $rating_value = null;
 9757:                                     if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9758:                                     {
 9759:                                         $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9760:                                     }
 9761:                                     else
 9762:                                     {
 9763:                                         $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
 9764:                                     }
 9765:                                     if (isset($rating['data']))
 9766:                                     {
 9767:                                         $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9768:                                     }
 9769:                                     $ratings[] = $this->registry->create('Rating', array($rating_scheme, $rating_value));
 9770:                                 }
 9771:                                 if (is_array($ratings))
 9772:                                 {
 9773:                                     $ratings = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($ratings)));
 9774:                                 }
 9775:                             }
 9776:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
 9777:                             {
 9778:                                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
 9779:                                 {
 9780:                                     $rating_scheme = null;
 9781:                                     $rating_value = null;
 9782:                                     if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
 9783:                                     {
 9784:                                         $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9785:                                     }
 9786:                                     else
 9787:                                     {
 9788:                                         $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
 9789:                                     }
 9790:                                     if (isset($rating['data']))
 9791:                                     {
 9792:                                         $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9793:                                     }
 9794:                                     $ratings[] = $this->registry->create('Rating', array($rating_scheme, $rating_value));
 9795:                                 }
 9796:                                 if (is_array($ratings))
 9797:                                 {
 9798:                                     $ratings = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($ratings)));
 9799:                                 }
 9800:                             }
 9801:                             else
 9802:                             {
 9803:                                 $ratings = $ratings_parent;
 9804:                             }
 9805: 
 9806:                             // RESTRICTIONS
 9807:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
 9808:                             {
 9809:                                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
 9810:                                 {
 9811:                                     $restriction_relationship = null;
 9812:                                     $restriction_type = null;
 9813:                                     $restriction_value = null;
 9814:                                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
 9815:                                     {
 9816:                                         $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9817:                                     }
 9818:                                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
 9819:                                     {
 9820:                                         $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9821:                                     }
 9822:                                     if (isset($restriction['data']))
 9823:                                     {
 9824:                                         $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9825:                                     }
 9826:                                     $restrictions[] = $this->registry->create('Restriction', array($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value));
 9827:                                 }
