 9828:                                 if (is_array($restrictions))
 9829:                                 {
 9830:                                     $restrictions = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($restrictions)));
 9831:                                 }
 9832:                             }
 9833:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
 9834:                             {
 9835:                                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
 9836:                                 {
 9837:                                     $restriction_relationship = null;
 9838:                                     $restriction_type = null;
 9839:                                     $restriction_value = null;
 9840:                                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
 9841:                                     {
 9842:                                         $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9843:                                     }
 9844:                                     if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
 9845:                                     {
 9846:                                         $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9847:                                     }
 9848:                                     if (isset($restriction['data']))
 9849:                                     {
 9850:                                         $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9851:                                     }
 9852:                                     $restrictions[] = $this->registry->create('Restriction', array($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value));
 9853:                                 }
 9854:                                 if (is_array($restrictions))
 9855:                                 {
 9856:                                     $restrictions = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($restrictions)));
 9857:                                 }
 9858:                             }
 9859:                             else
 9860:                             {
 9861:                                 $restrictions = $restrictions_parent;
 9862:                             }
 9863: 
 9864:                             // THUMBNAILS
 9865:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
 9866:                             {
 9867:                                 foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
 9868:                                 {
 9869:                                     $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9870:                                 }
 9871:                                 if (is_array($thumbnails))
 9872:                                 {
 9873:                                     $thumbnails = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($thumbnails)));
 9874:                                 }
 9875:                             }
 9876:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
 9877:                             {
 9878:                                 foreach ($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
 9879:                                 {
 9880:                                     $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
 9881:                                 }
 9882:                                 if (is_array($thumbnails))
 9883:                                 {
 9884:                                     $thumbnails = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($thumbnails)));
 9885:                                 }
 9886:                             }
 9887:                             else
 9888:                             {
 9889:                                 $thumbnails = $thumbnails_parent;
 9890:                             }
 9891: 
 9892:                             // TITLES
 9893:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
 9894:                             {
 9895:                                 $title = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9896:                             }
 9897:                             elseif (isset($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
 9898:                             {
 9899:                                 $title = $this->sanitize($group['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9900:                             }
 9901:                             else
 9902:                             {
 9903:                                 $title = $title_parent;
 9904:                             }
 9905: 
 9906:                             $this->data['enclosures'][] = $this->registry->create('Enclosure', array($url, $type, $length, null, $bitrate, $captions, $categories, $channels, $copyrights, $credits, $description, $duration, $expression, $framerate, $hashes, $height, $keywords, $lang, $medium, $player, $ratings, $restrictions, $samplingrate, $thumbnails, $title, $width));
 9907:                         }
 9908:                     }
 9909:                 }
 9910:             }
 9911: 
 9912:             // If we have standalone media:content tags, loop through them.
 9913:             if (isset($this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content']))
 9914:             {
 9915:                 foreach ((array) $this->data['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['content'] as $content)
 9916:                 {
 9917:                     if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']) || isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
 9918:                     {
 9919:                         // Attributes
 9920:                         $bitrate = null;
 9921:                         $channels = null;
 9922:                         $duration = null;
 9923:                         $expression = null;
 9924:                         $framerate = null;
 9925:                         $height = null;
 9926:                         $javascript = null;
 9927:                         $lang = null;
 9928:                         $length = null;
 9929:                         $medium = null;
 9930:                         $samplingrate = null;
 9931:                         $type = null;
 9932:                         $url = null;
 9933:                         $width = null;
 9934: 
 9935:                         // Elements
 9936:                         $captions = null;
 9937:                         $categories = null;
 9938:                         $copyrights = null;
 9939:                         $credits = null;
 9940:                         $description = null;
 9941:                         $hashes = null;
 9942:                         $keywords = null;
 9943:                         $player = null;
 9944:                         $ratings = null;
 9945:                         $restrictions = null;
 9946:                         $thumbnails = null;
 9947:                         $title = null;
 9948: 
 9949:                         // Start checking the attributes of media:content
 9950:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['bitrate']))
 9951:                         {
 9952:                             $bitrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['bitrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9953:                         }
 9954:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['channels']))
 9955:                         {
 9956:                             $channels = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['channels'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9957:                         }
 9958:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['duration']))
 9959:                         {
 9960:                             $duration = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['duration'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9961:                         }
 9962:                         else
 9963:                         {
 9964:                             $duration = $duration_parent;
 9965:                         }
 9966:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['expression']))
 9967:                         {
 9968:                             $expression = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['expression'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9969:                         }
 9970:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['framerate']))
 9971:                         {
 9972:                             $framerate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['framerate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9973:                         }
 9974:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['height']))
 9975:                         {
 9976:                             $height = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['height'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9977:                         }
 9978:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['lang']))
 9979:                         {
 9980:                             $lang = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9981:                         }
 9982:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']))
 9983:                         {
 9984:                             $length = ceil($content['attribs']['']['fileSize']);
 9985:                         }
 9986:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['medium']))
 9987:                         {
 9988:                             $medium = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['medium'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9989:                         }
 9990:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate']))
 9991:                         {
 9992:                             $samplingrate = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['samplingrate'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9993:                         }
 9994:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['type']))
 9995:                         {
 9996:                             $type = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
 9997:                         }
 9998:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['width']))
 9999:                         {
10000:                             $width = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['width'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10001:                         }
10002:                         if (isset($content['attribs']['']['url']))
10003:                         {
10004:                             $url = $this->sanitize($content['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
10005:                         }
10006:                         // Checking the other optional media: elements. Priority: media:content, media:group, item, channel
10007: 
10008:                         // CAPTIONS
10009:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text']))
10010:                         {
10011:                             foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['text'] as $caption)
10012:                             {
10013:                                 $caption_type = null;
10014:                                 $caption_lang = null;
10015:                                 $caption_startTime = null;
10016:                                 $caption_endTime = null;
10017:                                 $caption_text = null;
10018:                                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['type']))
10019:                                 {
10020:                                     $caption_type = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10021:                                 }
10022:                                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['lang']))
10023:                                 {
10024:                                     $caption_lang = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10025:                                 }
10026:                                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['start']))
10027:                                 {
10028:                                     $caption_startTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['start'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10029:                                 }
10030:                                 if (isset($caption['attribs']['']['end']))
10031:                                 {
10032:                                     $caption_endTime = $this->sanitize($caption['attribs']['']['end'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10033:                                 }
10034:                                 if (isset($caption['data']))
10035:                                 {
10036:                                     $caption_text = $this->sanitize($caption['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10037:                                 }
10038:                                 $captions[] = $this->registry->create('Caption', array($caption_type, $caption_lang, $caption_startTime, $caption_endTime, $caption_text));
10039:                             }
10040:                             if (is_array($captions))
10041:                             {
10042:                                 $captions = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($captions)));
10043:                             }
10044:                         }
10045:                         else
10046:                         {
10047:                             $captions = $captions_parent;
10048:                         }
10049: 
10050:                         // CATEGORIES
10051:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category']))
10052:                         {
10053:                             foreach ((array) $content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['category'] as $category)
10054:                             {
10055:                                 $term = null;
10056:                                 $scheme = null;
10057:                                 $label = null;
10058:                                 if (isset($category['data']))
10059:                                 {
10060:                                     $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10061:                                 }
10062:                                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
10063:                                 {
10064:                                     $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10065:                                 }
10066:                                 else
10067:                                 {
10068:                                     $scheme = 'http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/category_schema';
10069:                                 }
10070:                                 if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
10071:                                 {
10072:                                     $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10073:                                 }
10074:                                 $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
10075:                             }
10076:                         }
10077:                         if (is_array($categories) && is_array($categories_parent))
10078:                         {
10079:                             $categories = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array(array_merge($categories, $categories_parent))));
10080:                         }
10081:                         elseif (is_array($categories))
10082:                         {
10083:                             $categories = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories)));
10084:                         }
10085:                         elseif (is_array($categories_parent))
10086:                         {
10087:                             $categories = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories_parent)));
10088:                         }
10089:                         else
10090:                         {
10091:                             $categories = null;
10092:                         }
10093: 
10094:                         // COPYRIGHTS
10095:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright']))
10096:                         {
10097:                             $copyright_url = null;
10098:                             $copyright_label = null;
10099:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url']))
10100:                             {
10101:                                 $copyright_url = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10102:                             }
10103:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data']))
10104:                             {
10105:                                 $copyright_label = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['copyright'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10106:                             }
10107:                             $copyrights = $this->registry->create('Copyright', array($copyright_url, $copyright_label));
10108:                         }
10109:                         else
10110:                         {
10111:                             $copyrights = $copyrights_parent;
10112:                         }
10113: 
10114:                         // CREDITS
10115:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit']))
10116:                         {
10117:                             foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['credit'] as $credit)
10118:                             {
10119:                                 $credit_role = null;
10120:                                 $credit_scheme = null;
10121:                                 $credit_name = null;
10122:                                 if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['role']))
10123:                                 {
10124:                                     $credit_role = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['role'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10125:                                 }
10126:                                 if (isset($credit['attribs']['']['scheme']))
10127:                                 {
10128:                                     $credit_scheme = $this->sanitize($credit['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10129:                                 }
10130:                                 else
10131:                                 {
10132:                                     $credit_scheme = 'urn:ebu';
10133:                                 }
10134:                                 if (isset($credit['data']))
10135:                                 {
10136:                                     $credit_name = $this->sanitize($credit['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10137:                                 }
10138:                                 $credits[] = $this->registry->create('Credit', array($credit_role, $credit_scheme, $credit_name));
10139:                             }
10140:                             if (is_array($credits))
10141:                             {
10142:                                 $credits = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($credits)));
10143:                             }
10144:                         }
10145:                         else
10146:                         {
10147:                             $credits = $credits_parent;
10148:                         }
10149: 
10150:                         // DESCRIPTION
10151:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description']))
10152:                         {
10153:                             $description = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['description'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10154:                         }
10155:                         else
10156:                         {
10157:                             $description = $description_parent;
10158:                         }
10159: 
10160:                         // HASHES
10161:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash']))
10162:                         {
10163:                             foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['hash'] as $hash)
10164:                             {
10165:                                 $value = null;
10166:                                 $algo = null;
10167:                                 if (isset($hash['data']))
10168:                                 {
10169:                                     $value = $this->sanitize($hash['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10170:                                 }
10171:                                 if (isset($hash['attribs']['']['algo']))
10172:                                 {
10173:                                     $algo = $this->sanitize($hash['attribs']['']['algo'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10174:                                 }
10175:                                 else
10176:                                 {
10177:                                     $algo = 'md5';
10178:                                 }
10179:                                 $hashes[] = $algo.':'.$value;
10180:                             }
10181:                             if (is_array($hashes))
10182:                             {
10183:                                 $hashes = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($hashes)));
10184:                             }
10185:                         }
10186:                         else
10187:                         {
10188:                             $hashes = $hashes_parent;
10189:                         }
10190: 
10191:                         // KEYWORDS
10192:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords']))
10193:                         {
10194:                             if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data']))
10195:                             {
10196:                                 $temp = explode(',', $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['keywords'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT));
10197:                                 foreach ($temp as $word)
10198:                                 {
10199:                                     $keywords[] = trim($word);
10200:                                 }
10201:                                 unset($temp);
10202:                             }
10203:                             if (is_array($keywords))
10204:                             {
10205:                                 $keywords = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($keywords)));
10206:                             }
10207:                         }
10208:                         else
10209:                         {
10210:                             $keywords = $keywords_parent;
10211:                         }
10212: 
10213:                         // PLAYER
10214:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player']))
10215:                         {
10216:                             $player = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['player'][0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
10217:                         }
10218:                         else
10219:                         {
10220:                             $player = $player_parent;
10221:                         }
10222: 
10223:                         // RATINGS
10224:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating']))
10225:                         {
10226:                             foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['rating'] as $rating)
10227:                             {
10228:                                 $rating_scheme = null;
10229:                                 $rating_value = null;
10230:                                 if (isset($rating['attribs']['']['scheme']))
10231:                                 {
10232:                                     $rating_scheme = $this->sanitize($rating['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10233:                                 }
10234:                                 else
10235:                                 {
10236:                                     $rating_scheme = 'urn:simple';
10237:                                 }
10238:                                 if (isset($rating['data']))
10239:                                 {
10240:                                     $rating_value = $this->sanitize($rating['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10241:                                 }
10242:                                 $ratings[] = $this->registry->create('Rating', array($rating_scheme, $rating_value));
10243:                             }
10244:                             if (is_array($ratings))
10245:                             {
10246:                                 $ratings = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($ratings)));
10247:                             }
10248:                         }
10249:                         else
10250:                         {
10251:                             $ratings = $ratings_parent;
10252:                         }
10253: 
10254:                         // RESTRICTIONS
10255:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction']))
10256:                         {
10257:                             foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['restriction'] as $restriction)
10258:                             {
10259:                                 $restriction_relationship = null;
10260:                                 $restriction_type = null;
10261:                                 $restriction_value = null;
10262:                                 if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship']))
10263:                                 {
10264:                                     $restriction_relationship = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['relationship'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10265:                                 }
10266:                                 if (isset($restriction['attribs']['']['type']))
10267:                                 {
10268:                                     $restriction_type = $this->sanitize($restriction['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10269:                                 }
10270:                                 if (isset($restriction['data']))
10271:                                 {
10272:                                     $restriction_value = $this->sanitize($restriction['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10273:                                 }
10274:                                 $restrictions[] = $this->registry->create('Restriction', array($restriction_relationship, $restriction_type, $restriction_value));
10275:                             }
10276:                             if (is_array($restrictions))
10277:                             {
10278:                                 $restrictions = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($restrictions)));
10279:                             }
10280:                         }
10281:                         else
10282:                         {
10283:                             $restrictions = $restrictions_parent;
10284:                         }
10285: 
10286:                         // THUMBNAILS
10287:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail']))
10288:                         {
10289:                             foreach ($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['thumbnail'] as $thumbnail)
10290:                             {
10291:                                 $thumbnails[] = $this->sanitize($thumbnail['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
10292:                             }
10293:                             if (is_array($thumbnails))
10294:                             {
10295:                                 $thumbnails = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($thumbnails)));
10296:                             }
10297:                         }
10298:                         else
10299:                         {
10300:                             $thumbnails = $thumbnails_parent;
10301:                         }
10302: 
10303:                         // TITLES
10304:                         if (isset($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title']))
10305:                         {
10306:                             $title = $this->sanitize($content['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS]['title'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10307:                         }
10308:                         else
10309:                         {
10310:                             $title = $title_parent;
10311:                         }
10312: 
10313:                         $this->data['enclosures'][] = $this->registry->create('Enclosure', array($url, $type, $length, null, $bitrate, $captions, $categories, $channels, $copyrights, $credits, $description, $duration, $expression, $framerate, $hashes, $height, $keywords, $lang, $medium, $player, $ratings, $restrictions, $samplingrate, $thumbnails, $title, $width));
10314:                     }
10315:                 }
10316:             }
10317: 
10318:             foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link') as $link)
10319:             {
10320:                 if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']) && !empty($link['attribs']['']['rel']) && $link['attribs']['']['rel'] === 'enclosure')
10321:                 {
10322:                     // Attributes
10323:                     $bitrate = null;
10324:                     $channels = null;
10325:                     $duration = null;
10326:                     $expression = null;
10327:                     $framerate = null;
10328:                     $height = null;
10329:                     $javascript = null;
10330:                     $lang = null;
10331:                     $length = null;
10332:                     $medium = null;
10333:                     $samplingrate = null;
10334:                     $type = null;
10335:                     $url = null;
10336:                     $width = null;
10337: 
10338:                     $url = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
10339:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['type']))
10340:                     {
10341:                         $type = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10342:                     }
10343:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['length']))
10344:                     {
10345:                         $length = ceil($link['attribs']['']['length']);
10346:                     }
10347: 
10348:                     // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
10349:                     $this->data['enclosures'][] = $this->registry->create('Enclosure', array($url, $type, $length, null, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width));
10350:                 }
10351:             }
10352: 
10353:             foreach ((array) $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link') as $link)
10354:             {
10355:                 if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']) && !empty($link['attribs']['']['rel']) && $link['attribs']['']['rel'] === 'enclosure')
10356:                 {
10357:                     // Attributes
10358:                     $bitrate = null;
10359:                     $channels = null;
10360:                     $duration = null;
10361:                     $expression = null;
10362:                     $framerate = null;
10363:                     $height = null;
10364:                     $javascript = null;
10365:                     $lang = null;
10366:                     $length = null;
10367:                     $medium = null;
10368:                     $samplingrate = null;
10369:                     $type = null;
10370:                     $url = null;
10371:                     $width = null;
10372: 
10373:                     $url = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
10374:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['type']))
10375:                     {
10376:                         $type = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10377:                     }
10378:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['length']))
10379:                     {
10380:                         $length = ceil($link['attribs']['']['length']);
10381:                     }
10382: 
10383:                     // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
10384:                     $this->data['enclosures'][] = $this->registry->create('Enclosure', array($url, $type, $length, null, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width));
10385:                 }
10386:             }
10387: 
10388:             if ($enclosure = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'enclosure'))
10389:             {
10390:                 if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['url']))
10391:                 {
10392:                     // Attributes
10393:                     $bitrate = null;
10394:                     $channels = null;
10395:                     $duration = null;
10396:                     $expression = null;
10397:                     $framerate = null;
10398:                     $height = null;
10399:                     $javascript = null;
10400:                     $lang = null;
10401:                     $length = null;
10402:                     $medium = null;
10403:                     $samplingrate = null;
10404:                     $type = null;
10405:                     $url = null;
10406:                     $width = null;
10407: 
10408:                     $url = $this->sanitize($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['url'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($enclosure[0]));
10409:                     if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['type']))
10410:                     {
10411:                         $type = $this->sanitize($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['type'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
10412:                     }
10413:                     if (isset($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['length']))
10414:                     {
10415:                         $length = ceil($enclosure[0]['attribs']['']['length']);
10416:                     }
10417: 
10418:                     // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
10419:                     $this->data['enclosures'][] = $this->registry->create('Enclosure', array($url, $type, $length, null, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width));
10420:                 }
10421:             }
10422: 
10423:             if (sizeof($this->data['enclosures']) === 0 && ($url || $type || $length || $bitrate || $captions_parent || $categories_parent || $channels || $copyrights_parent || $credits_parent || $description_parent || $duration_parent || $expression || $framerate || $hashes_parent || $height || $keywords_parent || $lang || $medium || $player_parent || $ratings_parent || $restrictions_parent || $samplingrate || $thumbnails_parent || $title_parent || $width))
10424:             {
10425:                 // Since we don't have group or content for these, we'll just pass the '*_parent' variables directly to the constructor
10426:                 $this->data['enclosures'][] = $this->registry->create('Enclosure', array($url, $type, $length, null, $bitrate, $captions_parent, $categories_parent, $channels, $copyrights_parent, $credits_parent, $description_parent, $duration_parent, $expression, $framerate, $hashes_parent, $height, $keywords_parent, $lang, $medium, $player_parent, $ratings_parent, $restrictions_parent, $samplingrate, $thumbnails_parent, $title_parent, $width));
10427:             }
10428: 
10429:             $this->data['enclosures'] = array_values($this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($this->data['enclosures'])));
10430:         }
10431:         if (!empty($this->data['enclosures']))
10432:         {
10433:             return $this->data['enclosures'];
10434:         }
10435:         else
10436:         {
10437:             return null;
10438:         }
10439:     }
10440: 
10441:     public function get_latitude()
10442:     {
10443:         if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
10444:         {
10445:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
10446:         }
10447:         elseif (($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
10448:         {
10449:             return (float) $match[1];
10450:         }
10451:         else
10452:         {
10453:             return null;
10454:         }
10455:     }
10456: 
10457:     public function get_longitude()
10458:     {
10459:         if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
10460:         {
10461:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
10462:         }
10463:         elseif ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
10464:         {
10465:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
10466:         }
10467:         elseif (($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
10468:         {
10469:             return (float) $match[2];
10470:         }
10471:         else
10472:         {
10473:             return null;
10474:         }
10475:     }
10476: 
10477:     public function get_source()
10478:     {
10479:         if ($return = $this->get_item_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'source'))
10480:         {
10481:             return $this->registry->create('Source', array($this, $return[0]));
10482:         }
10483:         else
10484:         {
10485:             return null;
10486:         }
10487:     }
10488: }
10489: 
10490: /**
10491:  * Used for feed auto-discovery
10492:  *
10493:  *
10494:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_locator_class()}
10495:  *
10496:  * @package SimplePie
10497:  */
10498: class SimplePie_Locator
10499: {
10500:     var $useragent;
10501:     var $timeout;
10502:     var $file;
10503:     var $local = array();
10504:     var $elsewhere = array();
10505:     var $cached_entities = array();
10506:     var $http_base;
10507:     var $base;
10508:     var $base_location = 0;
10509:     var $checked_feeds = 0;
10510:     var $max_checked_feeds = 10;
10511:     protected $registry;
10512: 
10513:     public function __construct(&$file, $timeout = 10, $useragent = null, $max_checked_feeds = 10)
10514:     {
10515:         $this->file =& $file;
10516:         $this->useragent = $useragent;
10517:         $this->timeout = $timeout;
10518:         $this->max_checked_feeds = $max_checked_feeds;
10519: 
10520:         $this->dom = new DOMDocument();
10521: 
10522:         set_error_handler(array('SimplePie_Misc', 'silence_errors'));
10523:         $this->dom->loadHTML($this->file->body);
10524:         restore_error_handler();
10525:     }
10526: 
10527:     public function set_registry(SimplePie_Registry &$registry)
10528:     {
10529:         $this->registry = &$registry;
10530:     }
10531: 
10532:     public function find($type = SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL, &$working)
10533:     {
10534:         if ($this->is_feed($this->file))
10535:         {
10536:             return $this->file;
10537:         }
10538: 
10539:         if ($this->file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE)
10540:         {
10541:             $sniffer = $this->registry->create('Content_Type_Sniffer', array($this->file));
10542:             if ($sniffer->get_type() !== 'text/html')
10543:             {
10544:                 return null;
10545:             }
10546:         }
10547: 
10548:         if ($type & ~SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_NONE)
10549:         {
10550:             $this->get_base();
10551:         }
10552: 
10553:         if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_AUTODISCOVERY && $working = $this->autodiscovery())
10554:         {
10555:             return $working[0];
10556:         }
10557: 
10558:         if ($type & (SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_EXTENSION | SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_BODY | SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_EXTENSION | SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_BODY) && $this->get_links())
10559:         {
10560:             if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_EXTENSION && $working = $this->extension($this->local))
10561:             {
10562:                 return $working;
10563:             }
10564: 
10565:             if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_BODY && $working = $this->body($this->local))
10566:             {
10567:                 return $working;
10568:             }
10569: 
10570:             if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_EXTENSION && $working = $this->extension($this->elsewhere))
10571:             {
10572:                 return $working;
10573:             }
10574: 
10575:             if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_BODY && $working = $this->body($this->elsewhere))
10576:             {
10577:                 return $working;
10578:             }
10579:         }
10580:         return null;
10581:     }
10582: 
10583:     public function is_feed(&$file)
10584:     {
10585:         if ($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE)
10586:         {
10587:             $sniffer = $this->registry->create('Content_Type_Sniffer', array($file));
10588:             $sniffed = $sniffer->get_type();
10589:             if (in_array($sniffed, array('application/rss+xml', 'application/rdf+xml', 'text/rdf', 'application/atom+xml', 'text/xml', 'application/xml')))
10590:             {
10591:                 return true;
10592:             }
10593:             else
10594:             {
10595:                 return false;
10596:             }
10597:         }
10598:         elseif ($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_LOCAL)
10599:         {
10600:             return true;
10601:         }
10602:         else
10603:         {
10604:             return false;
10605:         }
10606:     }
10607: 
10608:     public function get_base()
10609:     {
10610:         $this->http_base = $this->file->url;
10611:         $this->base = $this->http_base;
10612:         $elements = $this->dom->getElementsByTagName('base');
10613:         foreach ($elements as $element)
10614:         {
10615:             if ($element->hasAttribute('href'))
10616:             {
10617:                 $this->base = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array(trim($element->getAttribute('href')), $this->http_base));
10618:                 $this->base_location = $element->getLineNo();
10619:                 break;
10620:             }
10621:         }
10622:     }
10623: 
10624:     public function autodiscovery()
10625:     {
10626:         $done = array();
10627:         $feeds = array();
10628:         $feeds = array_merge($feeds, $this->search_elements_by_tag('link', $done, $feeds));
10629:         $feeds = array_merge($feeds, $this->search_elements_by_tag('a', $done, $feeds));
10630:         $feeds = array_merge($feeds, $this->search_elements_by_tag('area', $done, $feeds));
10631: 
10632:         if (!empty($feeds))
10633:         {
10634:             return array_values($feeds);
10635:         }
10636:         else
10637:         {
10638:             return null;
10639:         }
10640:     }
10641: 
10642:     protected function search_elements_by_tag($name, &$done, $feeds)
10643:     {
10644:         $links = $this->dom->getElementsByTagName($name);
10645:         foreach ($links as $link)
10646:         {
10647:             if ($this->checked_feeds === $this->max_checked_feeds)
10648:             {
10649:                 break;
10650:             }
10651:             if ($link->hasAttribute('href') && $link->hasAttribute('rel'))
10652:             {
10653:                 $rel = array_unique($this->registry->call('Misc', 'space_seperated_tokens', array(strtolower($link->getAttribute('rel')))));
10654: 
10655:                 if ($this->base_location < $link->getLineNo())
10656:                 {
10657:                     $href = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array(trim($link->getAttribute('href')), $this->base));
10658:                 }
10659:                 else
10660:                 {
10661:                     $href = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array(trim($link->getAttribute('href')), $this->http_base));
10662:                 }
10663: 
10664:                 if (!in_array($href, $done) && in_array('feed', $rel) || (in_array('alternate', $rel) && !in_array('stylesheet', $rel) && $link->hasAttribute('type') && in_array(strtolower($this->registry->call('Misc', 'parse_mime', array($link->getAttribute('type')))), array('application/rss+xml', 'application/atom+xml'))) && !isset($feeds[$href]))
10665:                 {
10666:                     $this->checked_feeds++;
10667:                     $headers = array(
10668:                         'Accept' => 'application/atom+xml, application/rss+xml, application/rdf+xml;q=0.9, application/xml;q=0.8, text/xml;q=0.8, text/html;q=0.7, unknown/unknown;q=0.1, application/unknown;q=0.1, */*;q=0.1',
10669:                     );
10670:                     $feed = $this->registry->create('File', array($href, $this->timeout, 5, $headers, $this->useragent));
10671:                     if ($feed->success && ($feed->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($feed->status_code === 200 || $feed->status_code > 206 && $feed->status_code < 300)) && $this->is_feed($feed))
10672:                     {
10673:                         $feeds[$href] = $feed;
10674:                     }
10675:                 }
10676:                 $done[] = $href;
10677:             }
10678:         }
10679: 
10680:         return $feeds;
10681:     }
10682: 
10683:     public function get_links()
10684:     {
10685:         $links = $this->dom->getElementsByTagName('a');
10686:         foreach ($links as $link)
10687:         {
10688:             if ($link->hasAttribute('href'))
10689:             {
10690:                 $href = trim($link->getAttribute('href'));
10691:                 $parsed = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'parse_url', array($href));
10692:                 if ($parsed['scheme'] === '' || preg_match('/^(http(s)|feed)?$/i', $parsed['scheme']))
10693:                 {
10694:                     if ($this->base_location < $link->getLineNo())
10695:                     {
10696:                         $href = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array(trim($link->getAttribute('href')), $this->base));
10697:                     }
10698:                     else
10699:                     {
10700:                         $href = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array(trim($link->getAttribute('href')), $this->http_base));
10701:                     }
10702: 
10703:                     $current = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'parse_url', array($this->file->url));
10704: 
10705:                     if ($parsed['authority'] === '' || $parsed['authority'] === $current['authority'])
10706:                     {
10707:                         $this->local[] = $href;
10708:                     }
10709:                     else
10710:                     {
10711:                         $this->elsewhere[] = $href;
10712:                     }
10713:                 }
10714:             }
10715:         }
10716:         $this->local = array_unique($this->local);
10717:         $this->elsewhere = array_unique($this->elsewhere);
10718:         if (!empty($this->local) || !empty($this->elsewhere))
10719:         {
10720:             return true;
10721:         }
10722:         return null;
10723:     }
10724: 
10725:     public function extension(&$array)
10726:     {
10727:         foreach ($array as $key => $value)
10728:         {
10729:             if ($this->checked_feeds === $this->max_checked_feeds)
10730:             {
10731:                 break;
10732:             }
10733:             if (in_array(strtolower(strrchr($value, '.')), array('.rss', '.rdf', '.atom', '.xml')))
10734:             {
10735:                 $this->checked_feeds++;
10736: 
10737:                 $headers = array(
10738:                     'Accept' => 'application/atom+xml, application/rss+xml, application/rdf+xml;q=0.9, application/xml;q=0.8, text/xml;q=0.8, text/html;q=0.7, unknown/unknown;q=0.1, application/unknown;q=0.1, */*;q=0.1',
10739:                 );
10740:                 $feed = $this->registry->create('File', array($value, $this->timeout, 5, $headers, $this->useragent));
10741:                 if ($feed->success && ($feed->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($feed->status_code === 200 || $feed->status_code > 206 && $feed->status_code < 300)) && $this->is_feed($feed))
10742:                 {
10743:                     return $feed;
10744:                 }
10745:                 else
10746:                 {
10747:                     unset($array[$key]);
10748:                 }
10749:             }
10750:         }
10751:         return null;
10752:     }
10753: 
10754:     public function body(&$array)
10755:     {
10756:         foreach ($array as $key => $value)
10757:         {
10758:             if ($this->checked_feeds === $this->max_checked_feeds)
10759:             {
10760:                 break;
10761:             }
10762:             if (preg_match('/(rss|rdf|atom|xml)/i', $value))
10763:             {
10764:                 $this->checked_feeds++;
10765:                 $headers = array(
10766:                     'Accept' => 'application/atom+xml, application/rss+xml, application/rdf+xml;q=0.9, application/xml;q=0.8, text/xml;q=0.8, text/html;q=0.7, unknown/unknown;q=0.1, application/unknown;q=0.1, */*;q=0.1',
10767:                 );
10768:                 $feed = $this->registry->create('File', array($value, $this->timeout, 5, null, $this->useragent));
10769:                 if ($feed->success && ($feed->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($feed->status_code === 200 || $feed->status_code > 206 && $feed->status_code < 300)) && $this->is_feed($feed))
10770:                 {
10771:                     return $feed;
10772:                 }
10773:                 else
10774:                 {
10775:                     unset($array[$key]);
10776:                 }
10777:             }
10778:         }
10779:         return null;
10780:     }
10781: }
10782: 
10783: /**
10784:  * Miscellanous utilities
10785:  *
10786:  * @package SimplePie
10787:  */
10788: class SimplePie_Misc
10789: {
10790:     public static function time_hms($seconds)
10791:     {
10792:         $time = '';
10793: 
10794:         $hours = floor($seconds / 3600);
10795:         $remainder = $seconds % 3600;
10796:         if ($hours > 0)
10797:         {
10798:             $time .= $hours.':';
10799:         }
10800: 
10801:         $minutes = floor($remainder / 60);
10802:         $seconds = $remainder % 60;
10803:         if ($minutes < 10 && $hours > 0)
10804:         {
10805:             $minutes = '0' . $minutes;
10806:         }
10807:         if ($seconds < 10)
10808:         {
10809:             $seconds = '0' . $seconds;
10810:         }
10811: 
10812:         $time .= $minutes.':';
10813:         $time .= $seconds;
10814: 
10815:         return $time;
10816:     }
10817: 
10818:     public static function absolutize_url($relative, $base)
10819:     {
10820:         $iri = SimplePie_IRI::absolutize(new SimplePie_IRI($base), $relative);
10821:         return $iri->get_iri();
10822:     }
10823: 
10824:     public static function remove_dot_segments($input)
10825:     {
10826:         $output = '';
10827:         while (strpos($input, './') !== false || strpos($input, '/.') !== false || $input === '.' || $input === '..')
10828:         {
10829:             // A: If the input buffer begins with a prefix of "../" or "./", then remove that prefix from the input buffer; otherwise,
10830:             if (strpos($input, '../') === 0)
10831:             {
10832:                 $input = substr($input, 3);
10833:             }
10834:             elseif (strpos($input, './') === 0)
10835:             {
10836:                 $input = substr($input, 2);
10837:             }
10838:             // B: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/./" or "/.", where "." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer; otherwise,
10839:             elseif (strpos($input, '/./') === 0)
10840:             {
10841:                 $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 3);
10842:             }
10843:             elseif ($input === '/.')
10844:             {
10845:                 $input = '/';
10846:             }
10847:             // C: if the input buffer begins with a prefix of "/../" or "/..", where ".." is a complete path segment, then replace that prefix with "/" in the input buffer and remove the last segment and its preceding "/" (if any) from the output buffer; otherwise,
10848:             elseif (strpos($input, '/../') === 0)
10849:             {
10850:                 $input = substr_replace($input, '/', 0, 4);
10851:                 $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
10852:             }
10853:             elseif ($input === '/..')
10854:             {
10855:                 $input = '/';
10856:                 $output = substr_replace($output, '', strrpos($output, '/'));
10857:             }
10858:             // D: if the input buffer consists only of "." or "..", then remove that from the input buffer; otherwise,
10859:             elseif ($input === '.' || $input === '..')
10860:             {
10861:                 $input = '';
10862:             }
10863:             // E: move the first path segment in the input buffer to the end of the output buffer, including the initial "/" character (if any) and any subsequent characters up to, but not including, the next "/" character or the end of the input buffer
10864:             elseif (($pos = strpos($input, '/', 1)) !== false)
10865:             {
10866:                 $output .= substr($input, 0, $pos);
10867:                 $input = substr_replace($input, '', 0, $pos);
10868:             }
10869:             else
10870:             {
10871:                 $output .= $input;
10872:                 $input = '';
10873:             }
10874:         }
10875:         return $output . $input;
10876:     }
10877: 
10878:     /**
10879:      * Get a HTML/XML element from a HTML string
10880:      *
10881:      * @deprecated Use DOMDocument instead (parsing HTML with regex is bad!)
10882:      * @param string $realname Element name (including namespace prefix if applicable)
10883:      * @param string $string HTML document
10884:      * @return array
10885:      */
10886:     public static function get_element($realname, $string)
10887:     {
10888:         $return = array();
10889:         $name = preg_quote($realname, '/');
10890:         if (preg_match_all("/<($name)" . SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_HTML_ATTRIBUTE . "(>(.*)<\/$name>|(\/)?>)/siU", $string, $matches, PREG_SET_ORDER | PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE))
10891:         {
10892:             for ($i = 0, $total_matches = count($matches); $i < $total_matches; $i++)
10893:             {
10894:                 $return[$i]['tag'] = $realname;
10895:                 $return[$i]['full'] = $matches[$i][0][0];
10896:                 $return[$i]['offset'] = $matches[$i][0][1];
10897:                 if (strlen($matches[$i][3][0]) <= 2)
10898:                 {
10899:                     $return[$i]['self_closing'] = true;
10900:                 }
10901:                 else
10902:                 {
10903:                     $return[$i]['self_closing'] = false;
10904:                     $return[$i]['content'] = $matches[$i][4][0];
10905:                 }
10906:                 $return[$i]['attribs'] = array();
10907:                 if (isset($matches[$i][2][0]) && preg_match_all('/[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]+([^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3D\x3E]*)(?:[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*=[\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20]*(?:"([^"]*)"|\'([^\']*)\'|([^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x22\x27\x3E][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x3E]*)?))?/', ' ' . $matches[$i][2][0] . ' ', $attribs, PREG_SET_ORDER))
10908:                 {
10909:                     for ($j = 0, $total_attribs = count($attribs); $j < $total_attribs; $j++)
10910:                     {
10911:                         if (count($attribs[$j]) === 2)
10912:                         {
10913:                             $attribs[$j][2] = $attribs[$j][1];
10914:                         }
10915:                         $return[$i]['attribs'][strtolower($attribs[$j][1])]['data'] = SimplePie_Misc::entities_decode(end($attribs[$j]), 'UTF-8');
10916:                     }
10917:                 }
10918:             }
10919:         }
10920:         return $return;
10921:     }
10922: 
10923:     public static function element_implode($element)
10924:     {
10925:         $full = "<$element[tag]";
10926:         foreach ($element['attribs'] as $key => $value)
10927:         {
10928:             $key = strtolower($key);
10929:             $full .= " $key=\"" . htmlspecialchars($value['data']) . '"';
10930:         }
10931:         if ($element['self_closing'])
10932:         {
10933:             $full .= ' />';
10934:         }
10935:         else
10936:         {
10937:             $full .= ">$element[content]</$element[tag]>";
10938:         }
10939:         return $full;
10940:     }
10941: 
10942:     public static function error($message, $level, $file, $line)
10943:     {
10944:         if ((ini_get('error_reporting') & $level) > 0)
10945:         {
10946:             switch ($level)
10947:             {
10948:                 case E_USER_ERROR:
10949:                     $note = 'PHP Error';
10950:                     break;
10951:                 case E_USER_WARNING:
10952:                     $note = 'PHP Warning';
10953:                     break;
10954:                 case E_USER_NOTICE:
10955:                     $note = 'PHP Notice';
10956:                     break;
10957:                 default:
10958:                     $note = 'Unknown Error';
10959:                     break;
10960:             }
10961: 
10962:             $log_error = true;
10963:             if (!function_exists('error_log'))
10964:             {
10965:                 $log_error = false;
10966:             }
10967: 
10968:             $log_file = @ini_get('error_log');
10969:             if (!empty($log_file) && ('syslog' !== $log_file) && !@is_writable($log_file))
10970:             {
10971:                 $log_error = false;
10972:             }
10973: 
10974:             if ($log_error)
10975:             {
10976:                 @error_log("$note: $message in $file on line $line", 0);
10977:             }
10978:         }
10979: 
10980:         return $message;
10981:     }
10982: 
10983:     public static function fix_protocol($url, $http = 1)
10984:     {
10985:         $url = SimplePie_Misc::normalize_url($url);
10986:         $parsed = SimplePie_Misc::parse_url($url);
10987:         if ($parsed['scheme'] !== '' && $parsed['scheme'] !== 'http' && $parsed['scheme'] !== 'https')
10988:         {
10989:             return SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol(SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url('http', $parsed['authority'], $parsed['path'], $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']), $http);
10990:         }
10991: 
10992:         if ($parsed['scheme'] === '' && $parsed['authority'] === '' && !file_exists($url))
10993:         {
10994:             return SimplePie_Misc::fix_protocol(SimplePie_Misc::compress_parse_url('http', $parsed['path'], '', $parsed['query'], $parsed['fragment']), $http);
10995:         }
10996: 
10997:         if ($http === 2 && $parsed['scheme'] !== '')
10998:         {
10999:             return "feed:$url";
11000:         }
11001:         elseif ($http === 3 && strtolower($parsed['scheme']) === 'http')
11002:         {
11003:             return substr_replace($url, 'podcast', 0, 4);
11004:         }
11005:         elseif ($http === 4 && strtolower($parsed['scheme']) === 'http')
11006:         {
11007:             return substr_replace($url, 'itpc', 0, 4);
11008:         }
11009:         else
11010:         {
11011:             return $url;
11012:         }
11013:     }
11014: 
11015:     public static function parse_url($url)
11016:     {
11017:         $iri = new SimplePie_IRI($url);
11018:         return array(
11019:             'scheme' => (string) $iri->get_scheme(),
11020:             'authority' => (string) $iri->get_authority(),
11021:             'path' => (string) $iri->get_path(),
11022:             'query' => (string) $iri->get_query(),
11023:             'fragment' => (string) $iri->get_fragment()
11024:         );
11025:     }
11026: 
11027:     public static function compress_parse_url($scheme = '', $authority = '', $path = '', $query = '', $fragment = '')
11028:     {
11029:         $iri = new SimplePie_IRI('');
11030:         $iri->set_scheme($scheme);
11031:         $iri->set_authority($authority);
11032:         $iri->set_path($path);
11033:         $iri->set_query($query);
11034:         $iri->set_fragment($fragment);
11035:         return $iri->get_iri();
11036:     }
11037: 
11038:     public static function normalize_url($url)
11039:     {
11040:         $iri = new SimplePie_IRI($url);
11041:         return $iri->get_iri();
11042:     }
11043: 
11044:     public static function percent_encoding_normalization($match)
11045:     {
11046:         $integer = hexdec($match[1]);
11047:         if ($integer >= 0x41 && $integer <= 0x5A || $integer >= 0x61 && $integer <= 0x7A || $integer >= 0x30 && $integer <= 0x39 || $integer === 0x2D || $integer === 0x2E || $integer === 0x5F || $integer === 0x7E)
11048:         {
11049:             return chr($integer);
11050:         }
11051:         else
11052:         {
11053:             return strtoupper($match[0]);
11054:         }
11055:     }
11056: 
11057:     /**
11058:      * Converts a Windows-1252 encoded string to a UTF-8 encoded string
11059:      *
11060:      * @static
11061:      * @param string $string Windows-1252 encoded string
11062:      * @return string UTF-8 encoded string
11063:      */
11064:     public static function windows_1252_to_utf8($string)
11065:     {
11066:         static $convert_table = array("\x80" => "\xE2\x82\xAC", "\x81" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x82" => "\xE2\x80\x9A", "\x83" => "\xC6\x92", "\x84" => "\xE2\x80\x9E", "\x85" => "\xE2\x80\xA6", "\x86" => "\xE2\x80\xA0", "\x87" => "\xE2\x80\xA1", "\x88" => "\xCB\x86", "\x89" => "\xE2\x80\xB0", "\x8A" => "\xC5\xA0", "\x8B" => "\xE2\x80\xB9", "\x8C" => "\xC5\x92", "\x8D" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x8E" => "\xC5\xBD", "\x8F" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x90" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x91" => "\xE2\x80\x98", "\x92" => "\xE2\x80\x99", "\x93" => "\xE2\x80\x9C", "\x94" => "\xE2\x80\x9D", "\x95" => "\xE2\x80\xA2", "\x96" => "\xE2\x80\x93", "\x97" => "\xE2\x80\x94", "\x98" => "\xCB\x9C", "\x99" => "\xE2\x84\xA2", "\x9A" => "\xC5\xA1", "\x9B" => "\xE2\x80\xBA", "\x9C" => "\xC5\x93", "\x9D" => "\xEF\xBF\xBD", "\x9E" => "\xC5\xBE", "\x9F" => "\xC5\xB8", "\xA0" => "\xC2\xA0", "\xA1" => "\xC2\xA1", "\xA2" => "\xC2\xA2", "\xA3" => "\xC2\xA3", "\xA4" => "\xC2\xA4", "\xA5" => "\xC2\xA5", "\xA6" => "\xC2\xA6", "\xA7" => "\xC2\xA7", "\xA8" => "\xC2\xA8", "\xA9" => "\xC2\xA9", "\xAA" => "\xC2\xAA", "\xAB" => "\xC2\xAB", "\xAC" => "\xC2\xAC", "\xAD" => "\xC2\xAD", "\xAE" => "\xC2\xAE", "\xAF" => "\xC2\xAF", "\xB0" => "\xC2\xB0", "\xB1" => "\xC2\xB1", "\xB2" => "\xC2\xB2", "\xB3" => "\xC2\xB3", "\xB4" => "\xC2\xB4", "\xB5" => "\xC2\xB5", "\xB6" => "\xC2\xB6", "\xB7" => "\xC2\xB7", "\xB8" => "\xC2\xB8", "\xB9" => "\xC2\xB9", "\xBA" => "\xC2\xBA", "\xBB" => "\xC2\xBB", "\xBC" => "\xC2\xBC", "\xBD" => "\xC2\xBD", "\xBE" => "\xC2\xBE", "\xBF" => "\xC2\xBF", "\xC0" => "\xC3\x80", "\xC1" => "\xC3\x81", "\xC2" => "\xC3\x82", "\xC3" => "\xC3\x83", "\xC4" => "\xC3\x84", "\xC5" => "\xC3\x85", "\xC6" => "\xC3\x86", "\xC7" => "\xC3\x87", "\xC8" => "\xC3\x88", "\xC9" => "\xC3\x89", "\xCA" => "\xC3\x8A", "\xCB" => "\xC3\x8B", "\xCC" => "\xC3\x8C", "\xCD" => "\xC3\x8D", "\xCE" => "\xC3\x8E", "\xCF" => "\xC3\x8F", "\xD0" => "\xC3\x90", "\xD1" => "\xC3\x91", "\xD2" => "\xC3\x92", "\xD3" => "\xC3\x93", "\xD4" => "\xC3\x94", "\xD5" => "\xC3\x95", "\xD6" => "\xC3\x96", "\xD7" => "\xC3\x97", "\xD8" => "\xC3\x98", "\xD9" => "\xC3\x99", "\xDA" => "\xC3\x9A", "\xDB" => "\xC3\x9B", "\xDC" => "\xC3\x9C", "\xDD" => "\xC3\x9D", "\xDE" => "\xC3\x9E", "\xDF" => "\xC3\x9F", "\xE0" => "\xC3\xA0", "\xE1" => "\xC3\xA1", "\xE2" => "\xC3\xA2", "\xE3" => "\xC3\xA3", "\xE4" => "\xC3\xA4", "\xE5" => "\xC3\xA5", "\xE6" => "\xC3\xA6", "\xE7" => "\xC3\xA7", "\xE8" => "\xC3\xA8", "\xE9" => "\xC3\xA9", "\xEA" => "\xC3\xAA", "\xEB" => "\xC3\xAB", "\xEC" => "\xC3\xAC", "\xED" => "\xC3\xAD", "\xEE" => "\xC3\xAE", "\xEF" => "\xC3\xAF", "\xF0" => "\xC3\xB0", "\xF1" => "\xC3\xB1", "\xF2" => "\xC3\xB2", "\xF3" => "\xC3\xB3", "\xF4" => "\xC3\xB4", "\xF5" => "\xC3\xB5", "\xF6" => "\xC3\xB6", "\xF7" => "\xC3\xB7", "\xF8" => "\xC3\xB8", "\xF9" => "\xC3\xB9", "\xFA" => "\xC3\xBA", "\xFB" => "\xC3\xBB", "\xFC" => "\xC3\xBC", "\xFD" => "\xC3\xBD", "\xFE" => "\xC3\xBE", "\xFF" => "\xC3\xBF");
11067: 
11068:         return strtr($string, $convert_table);
11069:     }
11070: 
11071:     /**
11072:      * Change a string from one encoding to another
11073:      *
11074:      * @param string $data Raw data in $input encoding
11075:      * @param string $input Encoding of $data
11076:      * @param string $output Encoding you want
11077:      * @return string|boolean False if we can't convert it
11078:      */
11079:     public static function change_encoding($data, $input, $output)
11080:     {
11081:         $input = SimplePie_Misc::encoding($input);
11082:         $output = SimplePie_Misc::encoding($output);
11083: 
11084:         // We fail to fail on non US-ASCII bytes
11085:         if ($input === 'US-ASCII')
11086:         {
11087:             static $non_ascii_octects = '';
11088:             if (!$non_ascii_octects)
11089:             {
11090:                 for ($i = 0x80; $i <= 0xFF; $i++)
11091:                 {
11092:                     $non_ascii_octects .= chr($i);
11093:                 }
11094:             }
11095:             $data = substr($data, 0, strcspn($data, $non_ascii_octects));
11096:         }
11097: 
11098:         // This is first, as behaviour of this is completely predictable
11099:         if ($input === 'windows-1252' && $output === 'UTF-8')
11100:         {
11101:             return SimplePie_Misc::windows_1252_to_utf8($data);
11102:         }
11103:         // This is second, as behaviour of this varies only with PHP version (the middle part of this expression checks the encoding is supported).
11104:         elseif (function_exists('mb_convert_encoding') && ($return = SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding_mbstring($data, $input, $output)))
11105:         {
11106:             return $return;
11107:         }
11108:         // This is last, as behaviour of this varies with OS userland and PHP version
11109:         elseif (function_exists('iconv') && ($return = SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding_iconv($data, $input, $output)))
11110:         {
11111:             return $return;
11112:         }
11113:         // If we can't do anything, just fail
11114:         else
11115:         {
11116:             return false;
11117:         }
11118:     }
11119: 
11120:     protected static function change_encoding_mbstring($data, $input, $output)
11121:     {
11122:         if ($input === 'windows-949')
11123:         {
11124:             $input = 'EUC-KR';
11125:         }
11126:         if ($output === 'windows-949')
11127:         {
11128:             $output = 'EUC-KR';
11129:         }
11130: 
11131:         // Check that the encoding is supported
11132:         if (@mb_convert_encoding("\x80", 'UTF-16BE', $input) === "\x00\x80")
11133:         {
11134:             return false;
11135:         }
11136:         if (!in_array($input, mb_list_encodings()))
11137:         {
11138:             return false;
11139:         }
11140: 
11141:         // Let's do some conversion
11142:         if ($return = @mb_convert_encoding($data, $output, $input))
11143:         {
11144:             return $return;
11145:         }
11146: 
11147:         return false;
11148:     }
11149: 
11150:     protected static function change_encoding_iconv($data, $input, $output)
11151:     {
11152:         return @iconv($input, $output, $data);
11153:     }
11154: 
11155:     /**
11156:      * Normalize an encoding name
11157:      *
11158:      * This is automatically generated by create.php
11159:      *
11160:      * To generate it, run `php create.php` on the command line, and copy the
11161:      * output to replace this function.
11162:      *
11163:      * @param string $charset Character set to standardise
11164:      * @return string Standardised name
11165:      */
11166:     public static function encoding($charset)
11167:     {
11168:         // Normalization from UTS #22
11169:         switch (strtolower(preg_replace('/(?:[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|([^0-9])0+)/', '\1', $charset)))
11170:         {
11171:             case 'adobestandardencoding':
11172:             case 'csadobestandardencoding':
11173:                 return 'Adobe-Standard-Encoding';
11174: 
11175:             case 'adobesymbolencoding':
11176:             case 'cshppsmath':
11177:                 return 'Adobe-Symbol-Encoding';
11178: 
11179:             case 'ami1251':
11180:             case 'amiga1251':
11181:                 return 'Amiga-1251';
11182: 
11183:             case 'ansix31101983':
11184:             case 'csat5001983':
11185:             case 'csiso99naplps':
11186:             case 'isoir99':
11187:             case 'naplps':
11188:                 return 'ANSI_X3.110-1983';
11189: 
11190:             case 'arabic7':
11191:             case 'asmo449':
11192:             case 'csiso89asmo449':
11193:             case 'iso9036':
11194:             case 'isoir89':
11195:                 return 'ASMO_449';
11196: 
11197:             case 'big5':
11198:             case 'csbig5':
11199:                 return 'Big5';
11200: 
11201:             case 'big5hkscs':
11202:                 return 'Big5-HKSCS';
11203: 
11204:             case 'bocu1':
11205:             case 'csbocu1':
11206:                 return 'BOCU-1';
11207: 
11208:             case 'brf':
11209:             case 'csbrf':
11210:                 return 'BRF';
11211: 
11212:             case 'bs4730':
11213:             case 'csiso4unitedkingdom':
11214:             case 'gb':
11215:             case 'iso646gb':
11216:             case 'isoir4':
11217:             case 'uk':
11218:                 return 'BS_4730';
11219: 
11220:             case 'bsviewdata':
11221:             case 'csiso47bsviewdata':
11222:             case 'isoir47':
11223:                 return 'BS_viewdata';
11224: 
11225:             case 'cesu8':
11226:             case 'cscesu8':
11227:                 return 'CESU-8';
11228: 
11229:             case 'ca':
11230:             case 'csa71':
11231:             case 'csaz243419851':
11232:             case 'csiso121canadian1':
11233:             case 'iso646ca':
11234:             case 'isoir121':
11235:                 return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-1';
11236: 
11237:             case 'csa72':
11238:             case 'csaz243419852':
11239:             case 'csiso122canadian2':
11240:             case 'iso646ca2':
11241:             case 'isoir122':
11242:                 return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-2';
11243: 
11244:             case 'csaz24341985gr':
11245:             case 'csiso123csaz24341985gr':
11246:             case 'isoir123':
11247:                 return 'CSA_Z243.4-1985-gr';
11248: 
11249:             case 'csiso139csn369103':
11250:             case 'csn369103':

11252:                 return 'CSN_369103';
11253: 
11254:             case 'csdecmcs':
11255:             case 'dec':

11257:                 return 'DEC-MCS';
11258:

11260:             case 'de':

11581:             case '857':
11582:             case 'cp857':
11583:             case 'csibm857':

11586: 
11587:             case 'ccsid858':
11588:             case 'cp858':

12269:                 return 'PC8-Danish-Norwegian';
12270: 
12271:             case 'cspc8turkish':
12272:             case 'pc8turkish':
12273:                 return 'PC8-Turkish';
12274: 
12275:             case 'csiso16portuguese':
12276:             case 'iso646pt':
12277:             case 'isoir16':
12278:             case 'pt':
12279:                 return 'PT';
12280: 
12281:             case 'csiso84portuguese2':
12282:             case 'iso646pt2':
12283:             case 'isoir84':
12284:             case 'pt2':
12285:                 return 'PT2';
12286: 
12287:             case 'cp154':
12288:             case 'csptcp154':
12289:             case 'cyrillicasian':
12290:             case 'pt154':
12291:             case 'ptcp154':
12292:                 return 'PTCP154';
12293: 
12294:             case 'scsu':
12295:                 return 'SCSU';
12296: 
12297:             case 'csiso10swedish':
12298:             case 'fi':
12299:             case 'iso646fi':
12300:             case 'iso646se':
12301:             case 'isoir10':
12302:             case 'se':
12303:             case 'sen850200b':
12304:                 return 'SEN_850200_B';
12305: 
12306:             case 'csiso11swedishfornames':

12312:

12323:
