12476:         }
12477:     }
12478: 
12479:     public static function get_curl_version()
12480:     {
12481:         if (is_array($curl = curl_version()))
12482:         {
12483:             $curl = $curl['version'];
12484:         }
12485:         elseif (substr($curl, 0, 5) === 'curl/')
12486:         {
12487:             $curl = substr($curl, 5, strcspn($curl, "\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D", 5));
12488:         }
12489:         elseif (substr($curl, 0, 8) === 'libcurl/')
12490:         {
12491:             $curl = substr($curl, 8, strcspn($curl, "\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D", 8));
12492:         }
12493:         else
12494:         {
12495:             $curl = 0;
12496:         }
12497:         return $curl;
12498:     }
12499: 
12500:     public static function is_subclass_of($class1, $class2)
12501:     {
12502:         if (func_num_args() !== 2)
12503:         {
12504:             trigger_error('Wrong parameter count for SimplePie_Misc::is_subclass_of()', E_USER_WARNING);
12505:         }
12506:         elseif (version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.0.3', '>=') || is_object($class1))
12507:         {
12508:             return is_subclass_of($class1, $class2);
12509:         }
12510:         elseif (is_string($class1) && is_string($class2))
12511:         {
12512:             if (class_exists($class1))
12513:             {
12514:                 if (class_exists($class2))
12515:                 {
12516:                     $class2 = strtolower($class2);
12517:                     while ($class1 = strtolower(get_parent_class($class1)))
12518:                     {
12519:                         if ($class1 === $class2)
12520:                         {
12521:                             return true;
12522:                         }
12523:                     }
12524:                 }
12525:             }
12526:             else
12527:             {
12528:                 trigger_error('Unknown class passed as parameter', E_USER_WARNNG);
12529:             }
12530:         }
12531:         return false;
12532:     }
12533: 
12534:     /**
12535:      * Strip HTML comments
12536:      *
12537:      * @param string $data Data to strip comments from
12538:      * @return string Comment stripped string
12539:      */
12540:     public static function strip_comments($data)
12541:     {
12542:         $output = '';
12543:         while (($start = strpos($data, '<!--')) !== false)
12544:         {
12545:             $output .= substr($data, 0, $start);
12546:             if (($end = strpos($data, '-->', $start)) !== false)
12547:             {
12548:                 $data = substr_replace($data, '', 0, $end + 3);
12549:             }
12550:             else
12551:             {
12552:                 $data = '';
12553:             }
12554:         }
12555:         return $output . $data;
12556:     }
12557: 
12558:     public static function parse_date($dt)
12559:     {
12560:         $parser = SimplePie_Parse_Date::get();
12561:         return $parser->parse($dt);
12562:     }
12563: 
12564:     /**
12565:      * Decode HTML entities
12566:      *
12567:      * @deprecated Use DOMDocument instead
12568:      * @param string $data Input data
12569:      * @return string Output data
12570:      */
12571:     public static function entities_decode($data)
12572:     {
12573:         $decoder = new SimplePie_Decode_HTML_Entities($data);
12574:         return $decoder->parse();
12575:     }
12576: 
12577:     /**
12578:      * Remove RFC822 comments
12579:      *
12580:      * @param string $data Data to strip comments from
12581:      * @return string Comment stripped string
12582:      */
12583:     public static function uncomment_rfc822($string)
12584:     {
12585:         $string = (string) $string;
12586:         $position = 0;
12587:         $length = strlen($string);
12588:         $depth = 0;
12589: 
12590:         $output = '';
12591: 
12592:         while ($position < $length && ($pos = strpos($string, '(', $position)) !== false)
12593:         {
12594:             $output .= substr($string, $position, $pos - $position);
12595:             $position = $pos + 1;
12596:             if ($string[$pos - 1] !== '\\')
12597:             {
12598:                 $depth++;
12599:                 while ($depth && $position < $length)
12600:                 {
12601:                     $position += strcspn($string, '()', $position);
12602:                     if ($string[$position - 1] === '\\')
12603:                     {
12604:                         $position++;
12605:                         continue;
12606:                     }
12607:                     elseif (isset($string[$position]))
12608:                     {
12609:                         switch ($string[$position])
12610:                         {
12611:                             case '(':
12612:                                 $depth++;
12613:                                 break;
12614: 
12615:                             case ')':
12616:                                 $depth--;
12617:                                 break;
12618:                         }
12619:                         $position++;
12620:                     }
12621:                     else
12622:                     {
12623:                         break;
12624:                     }
12625:                 }
12626:             }
12627:             else
12628:             {
12629:                 $output .= '(';
12630:             }
12631:         }
12632:         $output .= substr($string, $position);
12633: 
12634:         return $output;
12635:     }
12636: 
12637:     public static function parse_mime($mime)
12638:     {
12639:         if (($pos = strpos($mime, ';')) === false)
12640:         {
12641:             return trim($mime);
12642:         }
12643:         else
12644:         {
12645:             return trim(substr($mime, 0, $pos));
12646:         }
12647:     }
12648: 
12649:     public static function htmlspecialchars_decode($string, $quote_style)
12650:     {
12651:         if (function_exists('htmlspecialchars_decode'))
12652:         {
12653:             return htmlspecialchars_decode($string, $quote_style);
12654:         }
12655:         else
12656:         {
12657:             return strtr($string, array_flip(get_html_translation_table(HTML_SPECIALCHARS, $quote_style)));
12658:         }
12659:     }
12660: 
12661:     public static function atom_03_construct_type($attribs)
12662:     {
12663:         if (isset($attribs['']['mode']) && strtolower(trim($attribs['']['mode']) === 'base64'))
12664:         {
12665:             $mode = SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_BASE64;
12666:         }
12667:         else
12668:         {
12669:             $mode = SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_NONE;
12670:         }
12671:         if (isset($attribs['']['type']))
12672:         {
12673:             switch (strtolower(trim($attribs['']['type'])))
12674:             {
12675:                 case 'text':
12676:                 case 'text/plain':
12677:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT | $mode;
12678: 
12679:                 case 'html':
12680:                 case 'text/html':
12681:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML | $mode;
12682: 
12683:                 case 'xhtml':
12684:                 case 'application/xhtml+xml':
12685:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML | $mode;
12686: 
12687:                 default:
12688:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_NONE | $mode;
12689:             }
12690:         }
12691:         else
12692:         {
12693:             return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT | $mode;
12694:         }
12695:     }
12696: 
12697:     public static function atom_10_construct_type($attribs)
12698:     {
12699:         if (isset($attribs['']['type']))
12700:         {
12701:             switch (strtolower(trim($attribs['']['type'])))
12702:             {
12703:                 case 'text':
12704:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT;
12705: 
12706:                 case 'html':
12707:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML;
12708: 
12709:                 case 'xhtml':
12710:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML;
12711: 
12712:                 default:
12713:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_NONE;
12714:             }
12715:         }
12716:         return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT;
12717:     }
12718: 
12719:     public static function atom_10_content_construct_type($attribs)
12720:     {
12721:         if (isset($attribs['']['type']))
12722:         {
12723:             $type = strtolower(trim($attribs['']['type']));
12724:             switch ($type)
12725:             {
12726:                 case 'text':
12727:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT;
12728: 
12729:                 case 'html':
12730:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML;
12731: 
12732:                 case 'xhtml':
12733:                     return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML;
12734:             }
12735:             if (in_array(substr($type, -4), array('+xml', '/xml')) || substr($type, 0, 5) === 'text/')
12736:             {
12737:                 return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_NONE;
12738:             }
12739:             else
12740:             {
12741:                 return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_BASE64;
12742:             }
12743:         }
12744:         else
12745:         {
12746:             return SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT;
12747:         }
12748:     }
12749: 
12750:     public static function is_isegment_nz_nc($string)
12751:     {
12752:         return (bool) preg_match('/^([A-Za-z0-9\-._~\x{A0}-\x{D7FF}\x{F900}-\x{FDCF}\x{FDF0}-\x{FFEF}\x{10000}-\x{1FFFD}\x{20000}-\x{2FFFD}\x{30000}-\x{3FFFD}\x{40000}-\x{4FFFD}\x{50000}-\x{5FFFD}\x{60000}-\x{6FFFD}\x{70000}-\x{7FFFD}\x{80000}-\x{8FFFD}\x{90000}-\x{9FFFD}\x{A0000}-\x{AFFFD}\x{B0000}-\x{BFFFD}\x{C0000}-\x{CFFFD}\x{D0000}-\x{DFFFD}\x{E1000}-\x{EFFFD}!$&\'()*+,;=@]|(%[0-9ABCDEF]{2}))+$/u', $string);
12753:     }
12754: 
12755:     public static function space_seperated_tokens($string)
12756:     {
12757:         $space_characters = "\x20\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D";
12758:         $string_length = strlen($string);
12759: 
12760:         $position = strspn($string, $space_characters);
12761:         $tokens = array();
12762: 
12763:         while ($position < $string_length)
12764:         {
12765:             $len = strcspn($string, $space_characters, $position);
12766:             $tokens[] = substr($string, $position, $len);
12767:             $position += $len;
12768:             $position += strspn($string, $space_characters, $position);
12769:         }
12770: 
12771:         return $tokens;
12772:     }
12773: 
12774:     public static function array_unique($array)
12775:     {
12776:         if (version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5.2', '>='))
12777:         {
12778:             return array_unique($array);
12779:         }
12780:         else
12781:         {
12782:             $array = (array) $array;
12783:             $new_array = array();
12784:             $new_array_strings = array();
12785:             foreach ($array as $key => $value)
12786:             {
12787:                 if (is_object($value))
12788:                 {
12789:                     if (method_exists($value, '__toString'))
12790:                     {
12791:                         $cmp = $value->__toString();
12792:                     }
12793:                     else
12794:                     {
12795:                         trigger_error('Object of class ' . get_class($value) . ' could not be converted to string', E_USER_ERROR);
12796:                     }
12797:                 }
12798:                 elseif (is_array($value))
12799:                 {
12800:                     $cmp = (string) reset($value);
12801:                 }
12802:                 else
12803:                 {
12804:                     $cmp = (string) $value;
12805:                 }
12806:                 if (!in_array($cmp, $new_array_strings))
12807:                 {
12808:                     $new_array[$key] = $value;
12809:                     $new_array_strings[] = $cmp;
12810:                 }
12811:             }
12812:             return $new_array;
12813:         }
12814:     }
12815: 
12816:     /**
12817:      * Converts a unicode codepoint to a UTF-8 character
12818:      *
12819:      * @static
12820:      * @param int $codepoint Unicode codepoint
12821:      * @return string UTF-8 character
12822:      */
12823:     public static function codepoint_to_utf8($codepoint)
12824:     {
12825:         $codepoint = (int) $codepoint;
12826:         if ($codepoint < 0)
12827:         {
12828:             return false;
12829:         }
12830:         else if ($codepoint <= 0x7f)
12831:         {
12832:             return chr($codepoint);
12833:         }
12834:         else if ($codepoint <= 0x7ff)
12835:         {
12836:             return chr(0xc0 | ($codepoint >> 6)) . chr(0x80 | ($codepoint & 0x3f));
12837:         }
12838:         else if ($codepoint <= 0xffff)
12839:         {
12840:             return chr(0xe0 | ($codepoint >> 12)) . chr(0x80 | (($codepoint >> 6) & 0x3f)) . chr(0x80 | ($codepoint & 0x3f));
12841:         }
12842:         else if ($codepoint <= 0x10ffff)
12843:         {
12844:             return chr(0xf0 | ($codepoint >> 18)) . chr(0x80 | (($codepoint >> 12) & 0x3f)) . chr(0x80 | (($codepoint >> 6) & 0x3f)) . chr(0x80 | ($codepoint & 0x3f));
12845:         }
12846:         else
12847:         {
12848:             // U+FFFD REPLACEMENT CHARACTER
12849:             return "\xEF\xBF\xBD";
12850:         }
12851:     }
12852: 
12853:     /**
12854:      * Similar to parse_str()
12855:      *
12856:      * Returns an associative array of name/value pairs, where the value is an
12857:      * array of values that have used the same name
12858:      *
12859:      * @static
12860:      * @param string $str The input string.
12861:      * @return array
12862:      */
12863:     public static function parse_str($str)
12864:     {
12865:         $return = array();
12866:         $str = explode('&', $str);
12867: 
12868:         foreach ($str as $section)
12869:         {
12870:             if (strpos($section, '=') !== false)
12871:             {
12872:                 list($name, $value) = explode('=', $section, 2);
12873:                 $return[urldecode($name)][] = urldecode($value);
12874:             }
12875:             else
12876:             {
12877:                 $return[urldecode($section)][] = null;
12878:             }
12879:         }
12880: 
12881:         return $return;
12882:     }
12883: 
12884:     /**
12885:      * Detect XML encoding, as per XML 1.0 Appendix F.1
12886:      *
12887:      * @todo Add support for EBCDIC
12888:      * @param string $data XML data
12889:      * @param SimplePie_Registry $registry Class registry
12890:      * @return array Possible encodings
12891:      */
12892:     public static function xml_encoding($data, &$registry)
12893:     {
12894:         // UTF-32 Big Endian BOM
12895:         if (substr($data, 0, 4) === "\x00\x00\xFE\xFF")
12896:         {
12897:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-32BE';
12898:         }
12899:         // UTF-32 Little Endian BOM
12900:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 4) === "\xFF\xFE\x00\x00")
12901:         {
12902:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-32LE';
12903:         }
12904:         // UTF-16 Big Endian BOM
12905:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 2) === "\xFE\xFF")
12906:         {
12907:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-16BE';
12908:         }
12909:         // UTF-16 Little Endian BOM
12910:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 2) === "\xFF\xFE")
12911:         {
12912:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-16LE';
12913:         }
12914:         // UTF-8 BOM
12915:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 3) === "\xEF\xBB\xBF")
12916:         {
12917:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-8';
12918:         }
12919:         // UTF-32 Big Endian Without BOM
12920:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 20) === "\x00\x00\x00\x3C\x00\x00\x00\x3F\x00\x00\x00\x78\x00\x00\x00\x6D\x00\x00\x00\x6C")
12921:         {
12922:             if ($pos = strpos($data, "\x00\x00\x00\x3F\x00\x00\x00\x3E"))
12923:             {
12924:                 $parser = $registry->create('XML_Declaration_Parser', array(SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding(substr($data, 20, $pos - 20), 'UTF-32BE', 'UTF-8')));
12925:                 if ($parser->parse())
12926:                 {
12927:                     $encoding[] = $parser->encoding;
12928:                 }
12929:             }
12930:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-32BE';
12931:         }
12932:         // UTF-32 Little Endian Without BOM
12933:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 20) === "\x3C\x00\x00\x00\x3F\x00\x00\x00\x78\x00\x00\x00\x6D\x00\x00\x00\x6C\x00\x00\x00")
12934:         {
12935:             if ($pos = strpos($data, "\x3F\x00\x00\x00\x3E\x00\x00\x00"))
12936:             {
12937:                 $parser = $registry->create('XML_Declaration_Parser', array(SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding(substr($data, 20, $pos - 20), 'UTF-32LE', 'UTF-8')));
12938:                 if ($parser->parse())
12939:                 {
12940:                     $encoding[] = $parser->encoding;
12941:                 }
12942:             }
12943:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-32LE';
12944:         }
12945:         // UTF-16 Big Endian Without BOM
12946:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 10) === "\x00\x3C\x00\x3F\x00\x78\x00\x6D\x00\x6C")
12947:         {
12948:             if ($pos = strpos($data, "\x00\x3F\x00\x3E"))
12949:             {
12950:                 $parser = $registry->create('XML_Declaration_Parser', array(SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding(substr($data, 20, $pos - 10), 'UTF-16BE', 'UTF-8')));
12951:                 if ($parser->parse())
12952:                 {
12953:                     $encoding[] = $parser->encoding;
12954:                 }
12955:             }
12956:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-16BE';
12957:         }
12958:         // UTF-16 Little Endian Without BOM
12959:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 10) === "\x3C\x00\x3F\x00\x78\x00\x6D\x00\x6C\x00")
12960:         {
12961:             if ($pos = strpos($data, "\x3F\x00\x3E\x00"))
12962:             {
12963:                 $parser = $registry->create('XML_Declaration_Parser', array(SimplePie_Misc::change_encoding(substr($data, 20, $pos - 10), 'UTF-16LE', 'UTF-8')));
12964:                 if ($parser->parse())
12965:                 {
12966:                     $encoding[] = $parser->encoding;
12967:                 }
12968:             }
12969:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-16LE';
12970:         }
12971:         // US-ASCII (or superset)
12972:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 5) === "\x3C\x3F\x78\x6D\x6C")
12973:         {
12974:             if ($pos = strpos($data, "\x3F\x3E"))
12975:             {
12976:                 $parser = $registry->create('XML_Declaration_Parser', array(substr($data, 5, $pos - 5)));
12977:                 if ($parser->parse())
12978:                 {
12979:                     $encoding[] = $parser->encoding;
12980:                 }
12981:             }
12982:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-8';
12983:         }
12984:         // Fallback to UTF-8
12985:         else
12986:         {
12987:             $encoding[] = 'UTF-8';
12988:         }
12989:         return $encoding;
12990:     }
12991: 
12992:     public static function output_javascript()
12993:     {
12994:         if (function_exists('ob_gzhandler'))
12995:         {
12996:             ob_start('ob_gzhandler');
12997:         }
12998:         header('Content-type: text/javascript; charset: UTF-8');
12999:         header('Cache-Control: must-revalidate');
13000:         header('Expires: ' . gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', time() + 604800) . ' GMT'); // 7 days
13001:         ?>
13002: function embed_quicktime(type, bgcolor, width, height, link, placeholder, loop) {
13003:     if (placeholder != '') {
13004:         document.writeln('<embed type="'+type+'" style="cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;" href="'+link+'" src="'+placeholder+'" width="'+width+'" height="'+height+'" autoplay="false" target="myself" controller="false" loop="'+loop+'" scale="aspect" bgcolor="'+bgcolor+'" pluginspage="http://www.apple.com/quicktime/download/"></embed>');
13005:     }
13006:     else {
13007:         document.writeln('<embed type="'+type+'" style="cursor:hand; cursor:pointer;" src="'+link+'" width="'+width+'" height="'+height+'" autoplay="false" target="myself" controller="true" loop="'+loop+'" scale="aspect" bgcolor="'+bgcolor+'" pluginspage="http://www.apple.com/quicktime/download/"></embed>');
13008:     }
13009: }
13010: 
13011: function embed_flash(bgcolor, width, height, link, loop, type) {
13012:     document.writeln('<embed src="'+link+'" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer" type="'+type+'" quality="high" width="'+width+'" height="'+height+'" bgcolor="'+bgcolor+'" loop="'+loop+'"></embed>');
13013: }
13014: 
13015: function embed_flv(width, height, link, placeholder, loop, player) {
13016:     document.writeln('<embed src="'+player+'" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" quality="high" width="'+width+'" height="'+height+'" wmode="transparent" flashvars="file='+link+'&autostart=false&repeat='+loop+'&showdigits=true&showfsbutton=false"></embed>');
13017: }
13018: 
13019: function embed_wmedia(width, height, link) {
13020:     document.writeln('<embed type="application/x-mplayer2" src="'+link+'" autosize="1" width="'+width+'" height="'+height+'" showcontrols="1" showstatusbar="0" showdisplay="0" autostart="0"></embed>');
13021: }
13022:         <?php
13023:     }
13024: 
13025:     /**
13026:      * Get the SimplePie build timestamp
13027:      *
13028:      * Uses the git index if it exists, otherwise uses the modification time
13029:      * of the newest file.
13030:      */
13031:     public static function get_build()
13032:     {
13033:         $root = dirname(dirname(__FILE__));
13034:         if (file_exists($root . '/.git/index'))
13035:         {
13036:             return filemtime($root . '/.git/index');
13037:         }
13038:         elseif (file_exists($root . '/SimplePie'))
13039:         {
13040:             $time = 0;
13041:             foreach (glob($root . '/SimplePie/*.php') as $file)
13042:             {
13043:                 if (($mtime = filemtime($file)) > $time)
13044:                 {
13045:                     $time = $mtime;
13046:                 }
13047:             }
13048:             return $time;
13049:         }
13050:         elseif (file_exists(dirname(__FILE__) . '/Core.php'))
13051:         {
13052:             return filemtime(dirname(__FILE__) . '/Core.php');
13053:         }
13054:         else
13055:         {
13056:             return filemtime(__FILE__);
13057:         }
13058:     }
13059: 
13060:     /**
13061:      * Format debugging information
13062:      */
13063:     public static function debug(&$sp)
13064:     {
13065:         $info = 'SimplePie ' . SIMPLEPIE_VERSION . ' Build ' . SIMPLEPIE_BUILD . "\n";
13066:         $info .= 'PHP ' . PHP_VERSION . "\n";
13067:         if ($sp->error() !== null)
13068:         {
13069:             $info .= 'Error occurred: ' . $sp->error() . "\n";
13070:         }
13071:         else
13072:         {
13073:             $info .= "No error found.\n";
13074:         }
13075:         $info .= "Extensions:\n";
13076:         $extensions = array('pcre', 'curl', 'zlib', 'mbstring', 'iconv', 'xmlreader', 'xml');
13077:         foreach ($extensions as $ext)
13078:         {
13079:             if (extension_loaded($ext))
13080:             {
13081:                 $info .= "    $ext loaded\n";
13082:                 switch ($ext)
13083:                 {
13084:                     case 'pcre':
13085:                         $info .= '      Version ' . PCRE_VERSION . "\n";
13086:                         break;
13087:                     case 'curl':
13088:                         $version = curl_version();
13089:                         $info .= '      Version ' . $version['version'] . "\n";
13090:                         break;
13091:                     case 'mbstring':
13092:                         $info .= '      Overloading: ' . mb_get_info('func_overload') . "\n";
13093:                         break;
13094:                     case 'iconv':
13095:                         $info .= '      Version ' . ICONV_VERSION . "\n";
13096:                         break;
13097:                     case 'xml':
13098:                         $info .= '      Version ' . LIBXML_DOTTED_VERSION . "\n";
13099:                         break;
13100:                 }
13101:             }
13102:             else
13103:             {
13104:                 $info .= "    $ext not loaded\n";
13105:             }
13106:         }
13107:         return $info;
13108:     }
13109: 
13110:     public static function silence_errors($num, $str)
13111:     {
13112:         // No-op
13113:     }
13114: }
13115: 
13116: /**
13117:  * Class to validate and to work with IPv6 addresses.
13118:  *
13119:  * @package SimplePie
13120:  * @copyright 2003-2005 The PHP Group
13121:  * @license http://www.opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php
13122:  * @link http://pear.php.net/package/Net_IPv6
13123:  * @author Alexander Merz <alexander.merz@web.de>
13124:  * @author elfrink at introweb dot nl
13125:  * @author Josh Peck <jmp at joshpeck dot org>
13126:  * @author Geoffrey Sneddon <geoffers@gmail.com>
13127:  */
13128: class SimplePie_Net_IPv6
13129: {
13130:     /**
13131:      * Removes a possible existing netmask specification of an IP address.
13132:      *
13133:      * @param string $ip the (compressed) IP as Hex representation
13134:      * @return string the IP the without netmask
13135:      * @since 1.1.0
13136:      * @access public
13137:      * @static
13138:      */
13139:     public static function removeNetmaskSpec($ip)
13140:     {
13141:         if (strpos($ip, '/') !== false)
13142:         {
13143:             list($addr, $nm) = explode('/', $ip);
13144:         }
13145:         else
13146:         {
13147:             $addr = $ip;
13148:         }
13149:         return $addr;
13150:     }
13151: 
13152:     /**
13153:      * Uncompresses an IPv6 address
13154:      *
13155:      * RFC 2373 allows you to compress zeros in an address to '::'. This
13156:      * function expects an valid IPv6 address and expands the '::' to
13157:      * the required zeros.
13158:      *
13159:      * Example:  FF01::101  ->  FF01:0:0:0:0:0:0:101
13160:      *           ::1        ->  0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1
13161:      *
13162:      * @access public
13163:      * @static
13164:      * @param string $ip a valid IPv6-address (hex format)
13165:      * @return string the uncompressed IPv6-address (hex format)
13166:      */
13167:     public static function Uncompress($ip)
13168:     {
13169:         $uip = SimplePie_Net_IPv6::removeNetmaskSpec($ip);
13170:         $c1 = -1;
13171:         $c2 = -1;
13172:         if (strpos($ip, '::') !== false)
13173:         {
13174:             list($ip1, $ip2) = explode('::', $ip);
13175:             if ($ip1 === '')
13176:             {
13177:                 $c1 = -1;
13178:             }
13179:             else
13180:             {
13181:                 $pos = 0;
13182:                 if (($pos = substr_count($ip1, ':')) > 0)
13183:                 {
13184:                     $c1 = $pos;
13185:                 }
13186:                 else
13187:                 {
13188:                     $c1 = 0;
13189:                 }
13190:             }
13191:             if ($ip2 === '')
13192:             {
13193:                 $c2 = -1;
13194:             }
13195:             else
13196:             {
13197:                 $pos = 0;
13198:                 if (($pos = substr_count($ip2, ':')) > 0)
13199:                 {
13200:                     $c2 = $pos;
13201:                 }
13202:                 else
13203:                 {
13204:                     $c2 = 0;
13205:                 }
13206:             }
13207:             if (strstr($ip2, '.'))
13208:             {
13209:                 $c2++;
13210:             }
13211:             // ::
13212:             if ($c1 === -1 && $c2 === -1)
13213:             {
13214:                 $uip = '0:0:0:0:0:0:0:0';
13215:             }
13216:             // ::xxx
13217:             else if ($c1 === -1)
13218:             {
13219:                 $fill = str_repeat('0:', 7 - $c2);
13220:                 $uip =  str_replace('::', $fill, $uip);
13221:             }
13222:             // xxx::
13223:             else if ($c2 === -1)
13224:             {
13225:                 $fill = str_repeat(':0', 7 - $c1);
13226:                 $uip =  str_replace('::', $fill, $uip);
13227:             }
13228:             // xxx::xxx
13229:             else
13230:             {
13231:                 $fill = str_repeat(':0:', 6 - $c2 - $c1);
13232:                 $uip =  str_replace('::', $fill, $uip);
13233:                 $uip =  str_replace('::', ':', $uip);
13234:             }
13235:         }
13236:         return $uip;
13237:     }
13238: 
13239:     /**
13240:      * Splits an IPv6 address into the IPv6 and a possible IPv4 part
13241:      *
13242:      * RFC 2373 allows you to note the last two parts of an IPv6 address as
13243:      * an IPv4 compatible address
13244:      *
13245:      * Example:  0:0:0:0:0:0:13.1.68.3
13246:      *           0:0:0:0:0:FFFF:129.144.52.38
13247:      *
13248:      * @access public
13249:      * @static
13250:      * @param string $ip a valid IPv6-address (hex format)
13251:      * @return array [0] contains the IPv6 part, [1] the IPv4 part (hex format)
13252:      */
13253:     public static function SplitV64($ip)
13254:     {
13255:         $ip = SimplePie_Net_IPv6::Uncompress($ip);
13256:         if (strstr($ip, '.'))
13257:         {
13258:             $pos = strrpos($ip, ':');
13259:             $ip[$pos] = '_';
13260:             $ipPart = explode('_', $ip);
13261:             return $ipPart;
13262:         }
13263:         else
13264:         {
13265:             return array($ip, '');
13266:         }
13267:     }
13268: 
13269:     /**
13270:      * Checks an IPv6 address
13271:      *
13272:      * Checks if the given IP is IPv6-compatible
13273:      *
13274:      * @access public
13275:      * @static
13276:      * @param string $ip a valid IPv6-address
13277:      * @return bool true if $ip is an IPv6 address
13278:      */
13279:     public static function checkIPv6($ip)
13280:     {
13281:         $ipPart = SimplePie_Net_IPv6::SplitV64($ip);
13282:         $count = 0;
13283:         if (!empty($ipPart[0]))
13284:         {
13285:             $ipv6 = explode(':', $ipPart[0]);
13286:             for ($i = 0; $i < count($ipv6); $i++)
13287:             {
13288:                 $dec = hexdec($ipv6[$i]);
13289:                 $hex = strtoupper(preg_replace('/^[0]{1,3}(.*[0-9a-fA-F])$/', '\\1', $ipv6[$i]));
13290:                 if ($ipv6[$i] >= 0 && $dec <= 65535 && $hex === strtoupper(dechex($dec)))
13291:                 {
13292:                     $count++;
13293:                 }
13294:             }
13295:             if ($count === 8)
13296:             {
13297:                 return true;
13298:             }
13299:             elseif ($count === 6 && !empty($ipPart[1]))
13300:             {
13301:                 $ipv4 = explode('.', $ipPart[1]);
13302:                 $count = 0;
13303:                 foreach ($ipv4 as $ipv4_part)
13304:                 {
13305:                     if ($ipv4_part >= 0 && $ipv4_part <= 255 && preg_match('/^\d{1,3}$/', $ipv4_part))
13306:                     {
13307:                         $count++;
13308:                     }
13309:                 }
13310:                 if ($count === 4)
13311:                 {
13312:                     return true;
13313:                 }
13314:             }
13315:             else
13316:             {
13317:                 return false;
13318:             }
13319: 
13320:         }
13321:         else
13322:         {
13323:             return false;
13324:         }
13325:     }
13326: }
13327: 
13328: /**
13329:  * Date Parser
13330:  *
13331:  * @package SimplePie
13332:  */
13333: class SimplePie_Parse_Date
13334: {
13335:     /**
13336:      * Input data
13337:      *
13338:      * @access protected
13339:      * @var string
13340:      */
13341:     var $date;
13342: 
13343:     /**
13344:      * List of days, calendar day name => ordinal day number in the week
13345:      *
13346:      * @access protected
13347:      * @var array
13348:      */
13349:     var $day = array(
13350:         // English
13351:         'mon' => 1,
13352:         'monday' => 1,
13353:         'tue' => 2,
13354:         'tuesday' => 2,
13355:         'wed' => 3,
13356:         'wednesday' => 3,
13357:         'thu' => 4,
13358:         'thursday' => 4,
13359:         'fri' => 5,
13360:         'friday' => 5,
13361:         'sat' => 6,
13362:         'saturday' => 6,
13363:         'sun' => 7,
13364:         'sunday' => 7,
13365:         // Dutch
13366:         'maandag' => 1,
13367:         'dinsdag' => 2,
13368:         'woensdag' => 3,
13369:         'donderdag' => 4,
13370:         'vrijdag' => 5,
13371:         'zaterdag' => 6,
13372:         'zondag' => 7,
13373:         // French
13374:         'lundi' => 1,
13375:         'mardi' => 2,
13376:         'mercredi' => 3,
13377:         'jeudi' => 4,
13378:         'vendredi' => 5,
13379:         'samedi' => 6,
13380:         'dimanche' => 7,
13381:         // German
13382:         'montag' => 1,
13383:         'dienstag' => 2,
13384:         'mittwoch' => 3,
13385:         'donnerstag' => 4,
13386:         'freitag' => 5,
13387:         'samstag' => 6,
13388:         'sonnabend' => 6,
13389:         'sonntag' => 7,
13390:         // Italian

13396:         'sabato' => 6,

13398:         // Spanish
13399:         'lunes' => 1,
13400:         'martes' => 2,
13401:         'miércoles' => 3,
13402:         'jueves' => 4,
13403:         'viernes' => 5,
13404:         'sábado' => 6,
13405:         'domingo' => 7,
13406:         // Finnish

13408:         'tiistai' => 2,
13409:         'keskiviikko' => 3,
13410:         'torstai' => 4,
13411:         'perjantai' => 5,
13412:         'lauantai' => 6,
13413:         'sunnuntai' => 7,
13414:         // Hungarian
13415:         'hétfő' => 1,
13416:         'kedd' => 2,
13417:         'szerda' => 3,
13418:         'csütörtok' => 4,
13419:         'péntek' => 5,
13420:         'szombat' => 6,
13421:         'vasárnap' => 7,
13422:         // Greek
13423:         'Δευ' => 1,
13424:         'Τρι' => 2,
13425:         'Τετ' => 3,
13426:         'Πεμ' => 4,
13427:         'Παρ' => 5,
13428:         'Σαβ' => 6,
13429:         'Κυρ' => 7,
13430:     );
13431: 
13432:     /**
13433:      * List of months, calendar month name => calendar month number
13434:      *
13435:      * @access protected
13436:      * @var array
13437:      */
13438:     var $month = array(
13439:         // English
13440:         'jan' => 1,
13441:         'january' => 1,
13442:         'feb' => 2,
13443:         'february' => 2,
13444:         'mar' => 3,
13445:         'march' => 3,

13450:         'jun' => 6,

13454:         'aug' => 8,
13455:         'august' => 8,

13459:         'october' => 10,
13460:         'nov' => 11,
13461:         'november' => 11,
13462:         'dec' => 12,
13463:         'december' => 12,

13465:         'januari' => 1,
13466:         'februari' => 2,
13467:         'maart' => 3,
13468:         'april' => 4,
13469:         'mei' => 5,
13470:         'juni' => 6,
13471:         'juli' => 7,
13472:         'augustus' => 8,

13474:         'oktober' => 10,
13475:         'november' => 11,

13537:         'heinäkuu' => 7,
13538:         'elokuu' => 8,
13539:         'suuskuu' => 9,
13540:         'lokakuu' => 10,
13541:         'marras' => 11,
13542:         'joulukuu' => 12,
13543:         // Hungarian
13544:         'január' => 1,
13545:         'február' => 2,
13546:         'március' => 3,
13547:         'április' => 4,
13548:         'május' => 5,
13549:         'június' => 6,
13550:         'július' => 7,
13551:         'augusztus' => 8,
13552:         'szeptember' => 9,
13553:         'október' => 10,
13554:         'november' => 11,
13555:         'december' => 12,
13556:         // Greek
13557:         'Ιαν' => 1,
13558:         'Φεβ' => 2,
13559:         'Μάώ' => 3,
13560:         'Μαώ' => 3,
13561:         'Απρ' => 4,
13562:         'Μάι' => 5,
13563:         'Μαϊ' => 5,
13564:         'Μαι' => 5,
13565:         'Ιούν' => 6,
13566:         'Ιον' => 6,

13568:         'Ιολ' => 7,
13569:         'Αύγ' => 8,

13571:         'Σεπ' => 9,
13572:         'Οκτ' => 10,
13573:         'Νοέ' => 11,
13574:         'Δεκ' => 12,
13575:     );

13783:     );
13784: 
13785:     /**
13786:      * Cached PCRE for SimplePie_Parse_Date::$day
13787:      *
13788:      * @access protected
13789:      * @var string
13790:      */
13791:     var $day_pcre;
13792: 
13793:     /**
13794:      * Cached PCRE for SimplePie_Parse_Date::$month
13795:      *
13796:      * @access protected
13797:      * @var string
13798:      */
13799:     var $month_pcre;
13800: 
13801:     /**
13802:      * Array of user-added callback methods
13803:      *
13804:      * @access private
13805:      * @var array
13806:      */
13807:     var $built_in = array();
13808: 
13809:     /**
13810:      * Array of user-added callback methods
13811:      *
13812:      * @access private
13813:      * @var array
13814:      */
13815:     var $user = array();
13816: 
13817:     /**
13818:      * Create new SimplePie_Parse_Date object, and set self::day_pcre,
13819:      * self::month_pcre, and self::built_in
13820:      *
13821:      * @access private
13822:      */
13823:     public function __construct()
13824:     {
13825:         $this->day_pcre = '(' . implode(array_keys($this->day), '|') . ')';
13826:         $this->month_pcre = '(' . implode(array_keys($this->month), '|') . ')';
13827: 
13828:         static $cache;
13829:         if (!isset($cache[get_class($this)]))
13830:         {
13831:             $all_methods = get_class_methods($this);
13832: 
13833:             foreach ($all_methods as $method)
13834:             {
13835:                 if (strtolower(substr($method, 0, 5)) === 'date_')
13836:                 {
13837:                     $cache[get_class($this)][] = $method;
13838:                 }
13839:             }
13840:         }
13841: 
13842:         foreach ($cache[get_class($this)] as $method)
13843:         {
13844:             $this->built_in[] = $method;
13845:         }
13846:     }
13847: 
13848:     /**
13849:      * Get the object
13850:      *
13851:      * @access public
13852:      */
13853:     public static function get()
13854:     {
13855:         static $object;
13856:         if (!$object)
13857:         {
13858:             $object = new SimplePie_Parse_Date;
13859:         }
13860:         return $object;
13861:     }
13862: 
13863:     /**
13864:      * Parse a date
13865:      *
13866:      * @final
13867:      * @access public
13868:      * @param string $date Date to parse
13869:      * @return int Timestamp corresponding to date string, or false on failure
13870:      */
13871:     public function parse($date)
13872:     {
13873:         foreach ($this->user as $method)
13874:         {
13875:             if (($returned = call_user_func($method, $date)) !== false)
13876:             {
13877:                 return $returned;
13878:             }
13879:         }
13880: 
13881:         foreach ($this->built_in as $method)
13882:         {
13883:             if (($returned = call_user_func(array(&$this, $method), $date)) !== false)
13884:             {
13885:                 return $returned;
13886:             }
13887:         }
13888: 
13889:         return false;
13890:     }
13891: 
13892:     /**
13893:      * Add a callback method to parse a date
13894:      *
13895:      * @final
13896:      * @access public
13897:      * @param callback $callback
13898:      */
13899:     public function add_callback($callback)
13900:     {
13901:         if (is_callable($callback))
13902:         {
13903:             $this->user[] = $callback;
13904:         }
13905:         else
13906:         {
13907:             trigger_error('User-supplied function must be a valid callback', E_USER_WARNING);
13908:         }
13909:     }
13910: 
13911:     /**
13912:      * Parse a superset of W3C-DTF (allows hyphens and colons to be omitted, as
13913:      * well as allowing any of upper or lower case "T", horizontal tabs, or
13914:      * spaces to be used as the time seperator (including more than one))
13915:      *
13916:      * @access protected
13917:      * @return int Timestamp
13918:      */
13919:     public function date_w3cdtf($date)
13920:     {
13921:         static $pcre;
13922:         if (!$pcre)
13923:         {
13924:             $year = '([0-9]{4})';
13925:             $month = $day = $hour = $minute = $second = '([0-9]{2})';
13926:             $decimal = '([0-9]*)';
13927:             $zone = '(?:(Z)|([+\-])([0-9]{1,2}):?([0-9]{1,2}))';
13928:             $pcre = '/^' . $year . '(?:-?' . $month . '(?:-?' . $day . '(?:[Tt\x09\x20]+' . $hour . '(?::?' . $minute . '(?::?' . $second . '(?:.' . $decimal . ')?)?)?' . $zone . ')?)?)?$/';
13929:         }
13930:         if (preg_match($pcre, $date, $match))
13931:         {
13932:             /*
13933:             Capturing subpatterns:
13934:             1: Year
13935:             2: Month
13936:             3: Day
13937:             4: Hour
13938:             5: Minute
13939:             6: Second
13940:             7: Decimal fraction of a second
13941:             8: Zulu
13942:             9: Timezone ±
13943:             10: Timezone hours
13944:             11: Timezone minutes
13945:             */
13946: 
13947:             // Fill in empty matches
13948:             for ($i = count($match); $i <= 3; $i++)
13949:             {
13950:                 $match[$i] = '1';
13951:             }
13952: 
13953:             for ($i = count($match); $i <= 7; $i++)
13954:             {
13955:                 $match[$i] = '0';
13956:             }
13957: 
13958:             // Numeric timezone
13959:             if (isset($match[9]) && $match[9] !== '')
13960:             {
13961:                 $timezone = $match[10] * 3600;
13962:                 $timezone += $match[11] * 60;
13963:                 if ($match[9] === '-')
13964:                 {
13965:                     $timezone = 0 - $timezone;
13966:                 }
13967:             }
13968:             else
13969:             {
13970:                 $timezone = 0;
13971:             }
13972: 
13973:             // Convert the number of seconds to an integer, taking decimals into account
13974:             $second = round($match[6] + $match[7] / pow(10, strlen($match[7])));
13975: 
13976:             return gmmktime($match[4], $match[5], $second, $match[2], $match[3], $match[1]) - $timezone;
13977:         }
13978:         else
13979:         {
13980:             return false;
13981:         }
13982:     }
13983: 
13984:     /**
13985:      * Remove RFC822 comments
13986:      *
13987:      * @access protected
13988:      * @param string $data Data to strip comments from
13989:      * @return string Comment stripped string
13990:      */
13991:     public function remove_rfc2822_comments($string)
13992:     {
13993:         $string = (string) $string;
13994:         $position = 0;
13995:         $length = strlen($string);
13996:         $depth = 0;
13997: 
13998:         $output = '';
13999: 
14000:         while ($position < $length && ($pos = strpos($string, '(', $position)) !== false)
14001:         {
14002:             $output .= substr($string, $position, $pos - $position);
14003:             $position = $pos + 1;
14004:             if ($string[$pos - 1] !== '\\')
14005:             {
14006:                 $depth++;
14007:                 while ($depth && $position < $length)
14008:                 {
14009:                     $position += strcspn($string, '()', $position);
14010:                     if ($string[$position - 1] === '\\')
14011:                     {
14012:                         $position++;
14013:                         continue;
14014:                     }
14015:                     elseif (isset($string[$position]))
14016:                     {
14017:                         switch ($string[$position])
14018:                         {
14019:                             case '(':
14020:                                 $depth++;
14021:                                 break;
14022: 
14023:                             case ')':
14024:                                 $depth--;
14025:                                 break;
14026:                         }
14027:                         $position++;
14028:                     }
14029:                     else
14030:                     {
14031:                         break;
14032:                     }
14033:                 }
14034:             }
14035:             else
14036:             {
14037:                 $output .= '(';
14038:             }
14039:         }
14040:         $output .= substr($string, $position);
14041: 
14042:         return $output;
14043:     }
14044: 
14045:     /**
14046:      * Parse RFC2822's date format
14047:      *
14048:      * @access protected
14049:      * @return int Timestamp
14050:      */
14051:     public function date_rfc2822($date)
14052:     {
14053:         static $pcre;
14054:         if (!$pcre)
14055:         {
14056:             $wsp = '[\x09\x20]';
14057:             $fws = '(?:' . $wsp . '+|' . $wsp . '*(?:\x0D\x0A' . $wsp . '+)+)';
14058:             $optional_fws = $fws . '?';
14059:             $day_name = $this->day_pcre;
14060:             $month = $this->month_pcre;
14061:             $day = '([0-9]{1,2})';
14062:             $hour = $minute = $second = '([0-9]{2})';
14063:             $year = '([0-9]{2,4})';
14064:             $num_zone = '([+\-])([0-9]{2})([0-9]{2})';
14065:             $character_zone = '([A-Z]{1,5})';
14066:             $zone = '(?:' . $num_zone . '|' . $character_zone . ')';
14067:             $pcre = '/(?:' . $optional_fws . $day_name . $optional_fws . ',)?' . $optional_fws . $day . $fws . $month . $fws . $year . $fws . $hour . $optional_fws . ':' . $optional_fws . $minute . '(?:' . $optional_fws . ':' . $optional_fws . $second . ')?' . $fws . $zone . '/i';
14068:         }
14069:         if (preg_match($pcre, $this->remove_rfc2822_comments($date), $match))
14070:         {
14071:             /*
14072:             Capturing subpatterns:
14073:             1: Day name
14074:             2: Day
14075:             3: Month
14076:             4: Year
14077:             5: Hour
14078:             6: Minute
14079:             7: Second
14080:             8: Timezone ±
14081:             9: Timezone hours
14082:             10: Timezone minutes
14083:             11: Alphabetic timezone
14084:             */
14085: 
14086:             // Find the month number
14087:             $month = $this->month[strtolower($match[3])];
14088: 
14089:             // Numeric timezone
14090:             if ($match[8] !== '')
14091:             {
14092:                 $timezone = $match[9] * 3600;
14093:                 $timezone += $match[10] * 60;
14094:                 if ($match[8] === '-')
14095:                 {
14096:                     $timezone = 0 - $timezone;
14097:                 }
14098:             }
14099:             // Character timezone
14100:             elseif (isset($this->timezone[strtoupper($match[11])]))
14101:             {
14102:                 $timezone = $this->timezone[strtoupper($match[11])];
14103:             }
14104:             // Assume everything else to be -0000
14105:             else
14106:             {
14107:                 $timezone = 0;
14108:             }
14109: 
14110:             // Deal with 2/3 digit years
14111:             if ($match[4] < 50)
14112:             {
14113:                 $match[4] += 2000;
14114:             }
14115:             elseif ($match[4] < 1000)
14116:             {
14117:                 $match[4] += 1900;
14118:             }
14119: 
14120:             // Second is optional, if it is empty set it to zero
14121:             if ($match[7] !== '')
14122:             {
14123:                 $second = $match[7];
14124:             }
14125:             else
14126:             {
14127:                 $second = 0;
14128:             }
14129: 
14130:             return gmmktime($match[5], $match[6], $second, $month, $match[2], $match[4]) - $timezone;
14131:         }
14132:         else
14133:         {
14134:             return false;
14135:         }
14136:     }
14137: 
14138:     /**
14139:      * Parse RFC850's date format
14140:      *
14141:      * @access protected
14142:      * @return int Timestamp
14143:      */
14144:     public function date_rfc850($date)
14145:     {
14146:         static $pcre;
14147:         if (!$pcre)
14148:         {
14149:             $space = '[\x09\x20]+';
14150:             $day_name = $this->day_pcre;
14151:             $month = $this->month_pcre;
14152:             $day = '([0-9]{1,2})';
14153:             $year = $hour = $minute = $second = '([0-9]{2})';
14154:             $zone = '([A-Z]{1,5})';
14155:             $pcre = '/^' . $day_name . ',' . $space . $day . '-' . $month . '-' . $year . $space . $hour . ':' . $minute . ':' . $second . $space . $zone . '$/i';
14156:         }
14157:         if (preg_match($pcre, $date, $match))
14158:         {
14159:             /*
14160:             Capturing subpatterns:
14161:             1: Day name
14162:             2: Day
14163:             3: Month
14164:             4: Year
14165:             5: Hour
14166:             6: Minute
14167:             7: Second
14168:             8: Timezone
14169:             */
14170: 
14171:             // Month
14172:             $month = $this->month[strtolower($match[3])];
14173: 
14174:             // Character timezone
14175:             if (isset($this->timezone[strtoupper($match[8])]))
14176:             {
14177:                 $timezone = $this->timezone[strtoupper($match[8])];
14178:             }
14179:             // Assume everything else to be -0000
14180:             else
14181:             {
14182:                 $timezone = 0;
14183:             }
14184: 
14185:             // Deal with 2 digit year
14186:             if ($match[4] < 50)
14187:             {
14188:                 $match[4] += 2000;
14189:             }
14190:             else
14191:             {
14192:                 $match[4] += 1900;
14193:             }
14194: 
14195:             return gmmktime($match[5], $match[6], $match[7], $month, $match[2], $match[4]) - $timezone;
14196:         }
14197:         else
14198:         {
14199:             return false;
14200:         }
14201:     }
14202: 
14203:     /**
14204:      * Parse C99's asctime()'s date format
14205:      *
14206:      * @access protected
14207:      * @return int Timestamp
14208:      */
14209:     public function date_asctime($date)
14210:     {
14211:         static $pcre;
14212:         if (!$pcre)
14213:         {
14214:             $space = '[\x09\x20]+';
14215:             $wday_name = $this->day_pcre;
14216:             $mon_name = $this->month_pcre;
14217:             $day = '([0-9]{1,2})';
14218:             $hour = $sec = $min = '([0-9]{2})';
14219:             $year = '([0-9]{4})';
14220:             $terminator = '\x0A?\x00?';
14221:             $pcre = '/^' . $wday_name . $space . $mon_name . $space . $day . $space . $hour . ':' . $min . ':' . $sec . $space . $year . $terminator . '$/i';
14222:         }
14223:         if (preg_match($pcre, $date, $match))
14224:         {
14225:             /*
14226:             Capturing subpatterns:
14227:             1: Day name
14228:             2: Month
14229:             3: Day
14230:             4: Hour
14231:             5: Minute
14232:             6: Second
14233:             7: Year
14234:             */
14235: 
14236:             $month = $this->month[strtolower($match[2])];
14237:             return gmmktime($match[4], $match[5], $match[6], $month, $match[3], $match[7]);
14238:         }
14239:         else
14240:         {
14241:             return false;
14242:         }
14243:     }
14244: 
14245:     /**
14246:      * Parse dates using strtotime()
14247:      *
14248:      * @access protected
14249:      * @return int Timestamp
14250:      */
14251:     public function date_strtotime($date)
14252:     {
14253:         $strtotime = strtotime($date);
14254:         if ($strtotime === -1 || $strtotime === false)
14255:         {
14256:             return false;
14257:         }
14258:         else
14259:         {
14260:             return $strtotime;
14261:         }
14262:     }
14263: }
14264: 
14265: /**
14266:  * Parses XML into something sane
14267:  *
14268:  *
14269:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_parser_class()}
14270:  *
14271:  * @package SimplePie
14272:  */
14273: class SimplePie_Parser
14274: {
14275:     var $error_code;
14276:     var $error_string;
14277:     var $current_line;
14278:     var $current_column;
14279:     var $current_byte;
14280:     var $separator = ' ';
14281:     var $namespace = array('');
14282:     var $element = array('');
14283:     var $xml_base = array('');
14284:     var $xml_base_explicit = array(false);
14285:     var $xml_lang = array('');
14286:     var $data = array();
14287:     var $datas = array(array());
14288:     var $current_xhtml_construct = -1;
14289:     var $encoding;
14290:     protected $registry;
14291: 
14292:     public function set_registry(SimplePie_Registry &$registry)
14293:     {
14294:         $this->registry = &$registry;
14295:     }
14296: 
14297:     public function parse(&$data, $encoding)
14298:     {
14299:         // Use UTF-8 if we get passed US-ASCII, as every US-ASCII character is a UTF-8 character
14300:         if (strtoupper($encoding) === 'US-ASCII')
14301:         {
14302:             $this->encoding = 'UTF-8';
14303:         }
14304:         else
14305:         {
14306:             $this->encoding = $encoding;
14307:         }
14308: 
14309:         // Strip BOM:
14310:         // UTF-32 Big Endian BOM
14311:         if (substr($data, 0, 4) === "\x00\x00\xFE\xFF")
14312:         {
14313:             $data = substr($data, 4);
14314:         }
14315:         // UTF-32 Little Endian BOM
14316:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 4) === "\xFF\xFE\x00\x00")
14317:         {
14318:             $data = substr($data, 4);
14319:         }
14320:         // UTF-16 Big Endian BOM
14321:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 2) === "\xFE\xFF")
14322:         {
14323:             $data = substr($data, 2);
14324:         }
14325:         // UTF-16 Little Endian BOM
14326:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 2) === "\xFF\xFE")
14327:         {
14328:             $data = substr($data, 2);
14329:         }
14330:         // UTF-8 BOM
14331:         elseif (substr($data, 0, 3) === "\xEF\xBB\xBF")
14332:         {
14333:             $data = substr($data, 3);
14334:         }
14335: 
14336:         if (substr($data, 0, 5) === '<?xml' && strspn(substr($data, 5, 1), "\x09\x0A\x0D\x20") && ($pos = strpos($data, '?>')) !== false)
14337:         {
14338:             $declaration = $this->registry->create('XML_Declaration_Parser', array(substr($data, 5, $pos - 5)));
14339:             if ($declaration->parse())
14340:             {
14341:                 $data = substr($data, $pos + 2);
14342:                 $data = '<?xml version="' . $declaration->version . '" encoding="' . $encoding . '" standalone="' . (($declaration->standalone) ? 'yes' : 'no') . '"?>' . $data;
14343:             }
14344:             else
14345:             {
14346:                 $this->error_string = 'SimplePie bug! Please report this!';
14347:                 return false;
14348:             }
14349:         }
14350: 
14351:         $return = true;
14352: 
14353:         static $xml_is_sane = null;
14354:         if ($xml_is_sane === null)
14355:         {
14356:             $parser_check = xml_parser_create();
14357:             xml_parse_into_struct($parser_check, '<foo>&amp;</foo>', $values);
14358:             xml_parser_free($parser_check);
14359:             $xml_is_sane = isset($values[0]['value']);
14360:         }
14361: 
14362:         // Create the parser
14363:         if ($xml_is_sane)
14364:         {
14365:             $xml = xml_parser_create_ns($this->encoding, $this->separator);
14366:             xml_parser_set_option($xml, XML_OPTION_SKIP_WHITE, 1);
14367:             xml_parser_set_option($xml, XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING, 0);
14368:             xml_set_object($xml, $this);
14369:             xml_set_character_data_handler($xml, 'cdata');
14370:             xml_set_element_handler($xml, 'tag_open', 'tag_close');
14371: 
14372:             // Parse!
14373:             if (!xml_parse($xml, $data, true))
14374:             {
14375:                 $this->error_code = xml_get_error_code($xml);
14376:                 $this->error_string = xml_error_string($this->error_code);
14377:                 $return = false;
14378:             }
14379:             $this->current_line = xml_get_current_line_number($xml);
14380:             $this->current_column = xml_get_current_column_number($xml);
14381:             $this->current_byte = xml_get_current_byte_index($xml);
14382:             xml_parser_free($xml);
14383:             return $return;
14384:         }
14385:         else
14386:         {
14387:             libxml_clear_errors();
14388:             $xml = new XMLReader();
14389:             $xml->xml($data);
14390:             while (@$xml->read())
14391:             {
14392:                 switch ($xml->nodeType)
14393:                 {
14394: 
14395:                     case constant('XMLReader::END_ELEMENT'):
14396:                         if ($xml->namespaceURI !== '')
14397:                         {
14398:                             $tagName = $xml->namespaceURI . $this->separator . $xml->localName;
14399:                         }
14400:                         else
14401:                         {
14402:                             $tagName = $xml->localName;
14403:                         }
14404:                         $this->tag_close(null, $tagName);
14405:                         break;
14406:                     case constant('XMLReader::ELEMENT'):
14407:                         $empty = $xml->isEmptyElement;
14408:                         if ($xml->namespaceURI !== '')
14409:                         {
14410:                             $tagName = $xml->namespaceURI . $this->separator . $xml->localName;
14411:                         }
14412:                         else
14413:                         {
14414:                             $tagName = $xml->localName;
14415:                         }
14416:                         $attributes = array();
14417:                         while ($xml->moveToNextAttribute())
14418:                         {
14419:                             if ($xml->namespaceURI !== '')
14420:                             {
14421:                                 $attrName = $xml->namespaceURI . $this->separator . $xml->localName;
14422:                             }
14423:                             else
14424:                             {
14425:                                 $attrName = $xml->localName;
14426:                             }
14427:                             $attributes[$attrName] = $xml->value;
14428:                         }
14429:                         $this->tag_open(null, $tagName, $attributes);
14430:                         if ($empty)
14431:                         {
14432:                             $this->tag_close(null, $tagName);
14433:                         }
14434:                         break;
14435:                     case constant('XMLReader::TEXT'):
14436: 
14437:                     case constant('XMLReader::CDATA'):
14438:                         $this->cdata(null, $xml->value);
14439:                         break;
14440:                 }
14441:             }
14442:             if ($error = libxml_get_last_error())
14443:             {
14444:                 $this->error_code = $error->code;
14445:                 $this->error_string = $error->message;
14446:                 $this->current_line = $error->line;
14447:                 $this->current_column = $error->column;
14448:                 return false;
14449:             }
14450:             else
14451:             {
14452:                 return true;
14453:             }
14454:         }
14455:     }
14456: 
14457:     public function get_error_code()
14458:     {
14459:         return $this->error_code;
14460:     }
14461: 
14462:     public function get_error_string()
14463:     {
14464:         return $this->error_string;
14465:     }
14466: 
14467:     public function get_current_line()
14468:     {
14469:         return $this->current_line;
14470:     }
14471: 
14472:     public function get_current_column()
14473:     {
14474:         return $this->current_column;
14475:     }
14476: 
14477:     public function get_current_byte()
14478:     {
14479:         return $this->current_byte;
14480:     }
14481: 
14482:     public function get_data()
14483:     {
14484:         return $this->data;
14485:     }
14486: 
14487:     public function tag_open($parser, $tag, $attributes)
14488:     {
14489:         list($this->namespace[], $this->element[]) = $this->split_ns($tag);
14490: 
14491:         $attribs = array();
14492:         foreach ($attributes as $name => $value)
14493:         {
14494:             list($attrib_namespace, $attribute) = $this->split_ns($name);
14495:             $attribs[$attrib_namespace][$attribute] = $value;
14496:         }
14497: 
14498:         if (isset($attribs[SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XML]['base']))
14499:         {
14500:             $this->xml_base[] = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array($attribs[SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XML]['base'], end($this->xml_base)));
14501:             $this->xml_base_explicit[] = true;
14502:         }
14503:         else
14504:         {
14505:             $this->xml_base[] = end($this->xml_base);
14506:             $this->xml_base_explicit[] = end($this->xml_base_explicit);
14507:         }
14508: 
14509:         if (isset($attribs[SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XML]['lang']))
14510:         {
14511:             $this->xml_lang[] = $attribs[SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XML]['lang'];
14512:         }
14513:         else
14514:         {
14515:             $this->xml_lang[] = end($this->xml_lang);
14516:         }
14517: 
14518:         if ($this->current_xhtml_construct >= 0)
14519:         {
14520:             $this->current_xhtml_construct++;
14521:             if (end($this->namespace) === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XHTML)
14522:             {
14523:                 $this->data['data'] .= '<' . end($this->element);
14524:                 if (isset($attribs['']))
14525:                 {
14526:                     foreach ($attribs[''] as $name => $value)
14527:                     {
14528:                         $this->data['data'] .= ' ' . $name . '="' . htmlspecialchars($value, ENT_COMPAT, $this->encoding) . '"';
14529:                     }
14530:                 }
14531:                 $this->data['data'] .= '>';
14532:             }
14533:         }
14534:         else
14535:         {
14536:             $this->datas[] =& $this->data;
14537:             $this->data =& $this->data['child'][end($this->namespace)][end($this->element)][];
14538:             $this->data = array('data' => '', 'attribs' => $attribs, 'xml_base' => end($this->xml_base), 'xml_base_explicit' => end($this->xml_base_explicit), 'xml_lang' => end($this->xml_lang));
14539:             if ((end($this->namespace) === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03 && in_array(end($this->element), array('title', 'tagline', 'copyright', 'info', 'summary', 'content')) && isset($attribs['']['mode']) && $attribs['']['mode'] === 'xml')
14540:             || (end($this->namespace) === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10 && in_array(end($this->element), array('rights', 'subtitle', 'summary', 'info', 'title', 'content')) && isset($attribs['']['type']) && $attribs['']['type'] === 'xhtml'))
14541:             {
14542:                 $this->current_xhtml_construct = 0;
14543:             }
14544:         }
14545:     }
14546: 
14547:     public function cdata($parser, $cdata)
14548:     {
14549:         if ($this->current_xhtml_construct >= 0)
14550:         {
14551:             $this->data['data'] .= htmlspecialchars($cdata, ENT_QUOTES, $this->encoding);
14552:         }
14553:         else
14554:         {
14555:             $this->data['data'] .= $cdata;
14556:         }
14557:     }
14558: 
14559:     public function tag_close($parser, $tag)
14560:     {
14561:         if ($this->current_xhtml_construct >= 0)
14562:         {
14563:             $this->current_xhtml_construct--;
14564:             if (end($this->namespace) === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_XHTML && !in_array(end($this->element), array('area', 'base', 'basefont', 'br', 'col', 'frame', 'hr', 'img', 'input', 'isindex', 'link', 'meta', 'param')))
14565:             {
14566:                 $this->data['data'] .= '</' . end($this->element) . '>';
14567:             }
14568:         }
14569:         if ($this->current_xhtml_construct === -1)
14570:         {
14571:             $this->data =& $this->datas[count($this->datas) - 1];
14572:             array_pop($this->datas);
14573:         }
14574: 
14575:         array_pop($this->element);
14576:         array_pop($this->namespace);
14577:         array_pop($this->xml_base);
14578:         array_pop($this->xml_base_explicit);
14579:         array_pop($this->xml_lang);
14580:     }
14581: 
14582:     public function split_ns($string)
14583:     {
14584:         static $cache = array();
14585:         if (!isset($cache[$string]))
14586:         {
14587:             if ($pos = strpos($string, $this->separator))
14588:             {
14589:                 static $separator_length;
14590:                 if (!$separator_length)
14591:                 {
14592:                     $separator_length = strlen($this->separator);
14593:                 }
14594:                 $namespace = substr($string, 0, $pos);
14595:                 $local_name = substr($string, $pos + $separator_length);
14596:                 if (strtolower($namespace) === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES)
14597:                 {
14598:                     $namespace = SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES;
14599:                 }
14600: 
14601:                 // Normalize the Media RSS namespaces
14602:                 if ($namespace === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG ||
14603:                     $namespace === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG2 ||
14604:                     $namespace === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG3 ||
14605:                     $namespace === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG4 ||
14606:                     $namespace === SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG5 )
14607:                 {
14608:                     $namespace = SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS;
14609:                 }
14610:                 $cache[$string] = array($namespace, $local_name);
14611:             }
14612:             else
14613:             {
14614:                 $cache[$string] = array('', $string);
14615:             }
14616:         }
14617:         return $cache[$string];
14618:     }
14619: }
14620: 
14621: /**
14622:  * Handles `<media:rating>` or `<itunes:explicit>` tags as defined in Media RSS and iTunes RSS respectively
14623:  *
14624:  * Used by {@see SimplePie_Enclosure::get_rating()} and {@see SimplePie_Enclosure::get_ratings()}
14625:  *
14626:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_rating_class()}
14627:  *
14628:  * @package SimplePie
14629:  */
14630: class SimplePie_Rating
14631: {
14632:     /**
14633:      * Rating scheme
14634:      *
14635:      * @var string
14636:      * @see get_scheme()
14637:      */
14638:     var $scheme;
14639: 
14640:     /**
14641:      * Rating value
14642:      *
14643:      * @var string
14644:      * @see get_value()
14645:      */
14646:     var $value;
14647: 
14648:     /**
14649:      * Constructor, used to input the data
14650:      *
14651:      * For documentation on all the parameters, see the corresponding
14652:      * properties and their accessors
14653:      */
14654:     public function __construct($scheme = null, $value = null)
14655:     {
14656:         $this->scheme = $scheme;
14657:         $this->value = $value;
14658:     }
14659: 
14660:     /**
14661:      * String-ified version
14662:      *
14663:      * @return string
14664:      */
14665:     public function __toString()
14666:     {
14667:         // There is no $this->data here
14668:         return md5(serialize($this));
14669:     }
14670: 
14671:     /**
14672:      * Get the organizational scheme for the rating
14673:      *
14674:      * @return string|null
14675:      */
14676:     public function get_scheme()
14677:     {
14678:         if ($this->scheme !== null)
14679:         {
14680:             return $this->scheme;
14681:         }
14682:         else
14683:         {
14684:             return null;
14685:         }
14686:     }
14687: 
14688:     /**
14689:      * Get the value of the rating
14690:      *
14691:      * @return string|null
14692:      */
14693:     public function get_value()
14694:     {
14695:         if ($this->value !== null)
14696:         {
14697:             return $this->value;
14698:         }
14699:         else
14700:         {
14701:             return null;
14702:         }
14703:     }
14704: }
14705: 
14706: /**
14707:  * Handles creating objects and calling methods
14708:  *
14709:  * Access this via {@see SimplePie::get_registry()}
14710:  *
14711:  * @package SimplePie
14712:  */
14713: class SimplePie_Registry
14714: {
14715:     /**
14716:      * Default class mapping
14717:      *
14718:      * Overriding classes *must* subclass these.
14719:      *
14720:      * @var array
14721:      */
14722:     protected $default = array(
14723:         'Cache' => 'SimplePie_Cache',
14724:         'Locator' => 'SimplePie_Locator',
14725:         'Parser' => 'SimplePie_Parser',
14726:         'File' => 'SimplePie_File',
14727:         'Sanitize' => 'SimplePie_Sanitize',
14728:         'Item' => 'SimplePie_Item',
14729:         'Author' => 'SimplePie_Author',
14730:         'Category' => 'SimplePie_Category',
14731:         'Enclosure' => 'SimplePie_Enclosure',
14732:         'Caption' => 'SimplePie_Caption',
14733:         'Copyright' => 'SimplePie_Copyright',
14734:         'Credit' => 'SimplePie_Credit',
14735:         'Rating' => 'SimplePie_Rating',
14736:         'Restriction' => 'SimplePie_Restriction',
14737:         'Content_Type_Sniffer' => 'SimplePie_Content_Type_Sniffer',
14738:         'Source' => 'SimplePie_Source',
14739:         'Misc' => 'SimplePie_Misc',
14740:         'XML_Declaration_Parser' => 'SimplePie_XML_Declaration_Parser',
14741:         'Parse_Date' => 'SimplePie_Parse_Date',
14742:     );
14743: 
14744:     /**
14745:      * Class mapping
14746:      *
14747:      * @see register()
14748:      * @var array
14749:      */
14750:     protected $classes = array();
14751: 
14752:     /**
14753:      * Legacy classes
14754:      *
14755:      * @see register()
14756:      * @var array
14757:      */
14758:     protected $legacy = array();
14759: 
14760:     /**
14761:      * Constructor
14762:      *
14763:      * No-op
14764:      */
14765:     public function __construct() { }
14766: 
14767:     /**
14768:      * Register a class
14769:      *
14770:      * @param string $type See {@see $default} for names
14771:      * @param string $class Class name, must subclass the corresponding default
14772:      * @param bool $legacy Whether to enable legacy support for this class
14773:      * @return bool Successfulness
14774:      */
14775:     public function register($type, $class, $legacy = false)
14776:     {
14777:         if (!$this->call('Misc', 'is_subclass_of', array($class, $this->default[$type])))
14778:         {
14779:             return false;
14780:         }
14781: 
14782:         $this->classes[$type] = $class;
14783: 
14784:         if ($legacy)
14785:         {
14786:             $this->legacy[] = $class;
14787:         }
14788: 
14789:         return true;
14790:     }
14791: 
14792:     /**
14793:      * Get the class registered for a type
14794:      *
14795:      * Where possible, use {@see create()} or {@see call()} instead
14796:      *
14797:      * @param string $type
14798:      * @return string|null
14799:      */
14800:     public function get_class($type)
14801:     {
14802:         if (!empty($this->classes[$type]))
14803:         {
14804:             return $this->classes[$type];
14805:         }
14806:         if (!empty($this->default[$type]))
14807:         {
14808:             return $this->default[$type];
14809:         }
14810: 
14811:         return null;
14812:     }
14813: 
14814:     /**
14815:      * Create a new instance of a given type
14816:      *
14817:      * @param string $type
14818:      * @param array $parameters Parameters to pass to the constructor
14819:      * @return object Instance of class
14820:      */
14821:     public function &create($type, $parameters = array())
14822:     {
14823:         $class = $this->get_class($type);
14824: 
14825:         if (in_array($class, $this->legacy))
14826:         {
14827:             switch ($type)
14828:             {
14829:                 case 'locator':
14830:                     // Legacy: file, timeout, useragent, file_class, max_checked_feeds, content_type_sniffer_class
14831:                     // Specified: file, timeout, useragent, max_checked_feeds
14832:                     $replacement = array($this->get_class('file'), $parameters[3], $this->get_class('content_type_sniffer'));
14833:                     array_splice($parameters, 3, 1, $replacement);
14834:                     break;
14835:             }
14836:         }
14837: 
14838:         if (!method_exists($class, '__construct'))
14839:         {
14840:             $instance = new $class;
14841:         }
14842:         else
14843:         {
14844:             $reflector = new ReflectionClass($class);
14845:             $instance = $reflector->newInstanceArgs($parameters);
14846:         }
14847: 
14848:         if (method_exists($instance, 'set_registry'))
14849:         {
14850:             $instance->set_registry($this);
14851:         }
14852:         return $instance;
14853:     }
14854: 
14855:     /**
14856:      * Call a static method for a type
14857:      *
14858:      * @param string $type
14859:      * @param string $method
14860:      * @param array $parameters
14861:      * @return mixed
14862:      */
14863:     public function &call($type, $method, $parameters = array())
14864:     {
14865:         $class = $this->get_class($type);
14866: 
14867:         $result = call_user_func_array(array($class, $method), $parameters);
14868:         return $result;
14869:     }
14870: }
14871: 
14872: /**
14873:  * Handles `<media:restriction>` as defined in Media RSS
14874:  *
14875:  * Used by {@see SimplePie_Enclosure::get_restriction()} and {@see SimplePie_Enclosure::get_restrictions()}
14876:  *
14877:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_restriction_class()}
14878:  *
14879:  * @package SimplePie
14880:  */
14881: class SimplePie_Restriction
14882: {
14883:     /**
14884:      * Relationship ('allow'/'deny')
14885:      *
14886:      * @var string
14887:      * @see get_relationship()
14888:      */
14889:     var $relationship;
14890: 
14891:     /**
14892:      * Type of restriction
14893:      *
14894:      * @var string
14895:      * @see get_type()
14896:      */
14897:     var $type;
14898: 
14899:     /**
14900:      * Restricted values
14901:      *
14902:      * @var string
14903:      * @see get_value()
14904:      */
14905:     var $value;
14906: 
14907:     /**
14908:      * Constructor, used to input the data
14909:      *
14910:      * For documentation on all the parameters, see the corresponding
14911:      * properties and their accessors
14912:      */
14913:     public function __construct($relationship = null, $type = null, $value = null)
14914:     {
14915:         $this->relationship = $relationship;
14916:         $this->type = $type;
14917:         $this->value = $value;
14918:     }
14919: 
14920:     /**
14921:      * String-ified version
14922:      *
14923:      * @return string
14924:      */
14925:     public function __toString()
14926:     {
14927:         // There is no $this->data here
14928:         return md5(serialize($this));
14929:     }
14930: 
14931:     /**
14932:      * Get the relationship
14933:      *
14934:      * @return string|null Either 'allow' or 'deny'
14935:      */
14936:     public function get_relationship()
14937:     {
14938:         if ($this->relationship !== null)
14939:         {
14940:             return $this->relationship;
14941:         }
14942:         else
14943:         {
14944:             return null;
14945:         }
14946:     }
14947: 
14948:     /**
14949:      * Get the type
14950:      *
14951:      * @return string|null
14952:      */
14953:     public function get_type()
14954:     {
14955:         if ($this->type !== null)
14956:         {
14957:             return $this->type;
14958:         }
14959:         else
14960:         {
14961:             return null;
14962:         }
14963:     }
14964: 
14965:     /**
14966:      * Get the list of restricted things
14967:      *
14968:      * @return string|null
14969:      */
14970:     public function get_value()
14971:     {
14972:         if ($this->value !== null)
14973:         {
14974:             return $this->value;
14975:         }
14976:         else
14977:         {
14978:             return null;
14979:         }
14980:     }
14981: }
14982: 
14983: /**
14984:  * Used for data cleanup and post-processing
14985:  *
14986:  *
14987:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_sanitize_class()}
14988:  *
14989:  * @package SimplePie
14990:  * @todo Move to using an actual HTML parser (this will allow tags to be properly stripped, and to switch between HTML and XHTML), this will also make it easier to shorten a string while preserving HTML tags
14991:  */
14992: class SimplePie_Sanitize
14993: {
14994:     // Private vars
14995:     var $base;
14996: 
14997:     // Options
14998:     var $remove_div = true;
14999:     var $image_handler = '';
15000:     var $strip_htmltags = array('base', 'blink', 'body', 'doctype', 'embed', 'font', 'form', 'frame', 'frameset', 'html', 'iframe', 'input', 'marquee', 'meta', 'noscript', 'object', 'param', 'script', 'style');
15001:     var $encode_instead_of_strip = false;
15002:     var $strip_attributes = array('bgsound', 'class', 'expr', 'id', 'style', 'onclick', 'onerror', 'onfinish', 'onmouseover', 'onmouseout', 'onfocus', 'onblur', 'lowsrc', 'dynsrc');
15003:     var $strip_comments = false;
15004:     var $output_encoding = 'UTF-8';
15005:     var $enable_cache = true;
15006:     var $cache_location = './cache';
15007:     var $cache_name_function = 'md5';
15008:     var $timeout = 10;
15009:     var $useragent = '';
15010:     var $force_fsockopen = false;
15011:
