15012:     var $replace_url_attributes = array(
15013:         'a' => 'href',
15014:         'area' => 'href',
15015:         'blockquote' => 'cite',
15016:         'del' => 'cite',
15017:         'form' => 'action',
15018:         'img' => array('longdesc', 'src'),
15019:         'input' => 'src',
15020:         'ins' => 'cite',
15021:         'q' => 'cite'
15022:     );
15023: 
15024:     public function remove_div($enable = true)
15025:     {
15026:         $this->remove_div = (bool) $enable;
15027:     }
15028: 
15029:     public function set_image_handler($page = false)
15030:     {
15031:         if ($page)
15032:         {
15033:             $this->image_handler = (string) $page;
15034:         }
15035:         else
15036:         {
15037:             $this->image_handler = false;
15038:         }
15039:     }
15040: 
15041:     public function set_registry(SimplePie_Registry &$registry)
15042:     {
15043:         $this->registry = $registry;
15044:     }
15045: 
15046:     public function pass_cache_data($enable_cache = true, $cache_location = './cache', $cache_name_function = 'md5', $cache_class = 'SimplePie_Cache')
15047:     {
15048:         if (isset($enable_cache))
15049:         {
15050:             $this->enable_cache = (bool) $enable_cache;
15051:         }
15052: 
15053:         if ($cache_location)
15054:         {
15055:             $this->cache_location = (string) $cache_location;
15056:         }
15057: 
15058:         if ($cache_name_function)
15059:         {
15060:             $this->cache_name_function = (string) $cache_name_function;
15061:         }
15062:     }
15063: 
15064:     public function pass_file_data($file_class = 'SimplePie_File', $timeout = 10, $useragent = '', $force_fsockopen = false)
15065:     {
15066:         if ($timeout)
15067:         {
15068:             $this->timeout = (string) $timeout;
15069:         }
15070: 
15071:         if ($useragent)
15072:         {
15073:             $this->useragent = (string) $useragent;
15074:         }
15075: 
15076:         if ($force_fsockopen)
15077:         {
15078:             $this->force_fsockopen = (string) $force_fsockopen;
15079:         }
15080:     }
15081: 
15082:     public function strip_htmltags($tags = array('base', 'blink', 'body', 'doctype', 'embed', 'font', 'form', 'frame', 'frameset', 'html', 'iframe', 'input', 'marquee', 'meta', 'noscript', 'object', 'param', 'script', 'style'))
15083:     {
15084:         if ($tags)
15085:         {
15086:             if (is_array($tags))
15087:             {
15088:                 $this->strip_htmltags = $tags;
15089:             }
15090:             else
15091:             {
15092:                 $this->strip_htmltags = explode(',', $tags);
15093:             }
15094:         }
15095:         else
15096:         {
15097:             $this->strip_htmltags = false;
15098:         }
15099:     }
15100: 
15101:     public function encode_instead_of_strip($encode = false)
15102:     {
15103:         $this->encode_instead_of_strip = (bool) $encode;
15104:     }
15105: 
15106:     public function strip_attributes($attribs = array('bgsound', 'class', 'expr', 'id', 'style', 'onclick', 'onerror', 'onfinish', 'onmouseover', 'onmouseout', 'onfocus', 'onblur', 'lowsrc', 'dynsrc'))
15107:     {
15108:         if ($attribs)
15109:         {
15110:             if (is_array($attribs))
15111:             {
15112:                 $this->strip_attributes = $attribs;
15113:             }
15114:             else
15115:             {
15116:                 $this->strip_attributes = explode(',', $attribs);
15117:             }
15118:         }
15119:         else
15120:         {
15121:             $this->strip_attributes = false;
15122:         }
15123:     }
15124: 
15125:     public function strip_comments($strip = false)
15126:     {
15127:         $this->strip_comments = (bool) $strip;
15128:     }
15129: 
15130:     public function set_output_encoding($encoding = 'UTF-8')
15131:     {
15132:         $this->output_encoding = (string) $encoding;
15133:     }
15134: 
15135:     /**
15136:      * Set element/attribute key/value pairs of HTML attributes
15137:      * containing URLs that need to be resolved relative to the feed
15138:      *
15139:      * @access public
15140:      * @since 1.0
15141:      * @param array $element_attribute Element/attribute key/value pairs
15142:      */
15143:     public function set_url_replacements($element_attribute = array('a' => 'href', 'area' => 'href', 'blockquote' => 'cite', 'del' => 'cite', 'form' => 'action', 'img' => array('longdesc', 'src'), 'input' => 'src', 'ins' => 'cite', 'q' => 'cite'))
15144:     {
15145:         $this->replace_url_attributes = (array) $element_attribute;
15146:     }
15147: 
15148:     public function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
15149:     {
15150:         $data = trim($data);
15151:         if ($data !== '' || $type & SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI)
15152:         {
15153:             if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML)
15154:             {
15155:                 if (preg_match('/(&(#(x[0-9a-fA-F]+|[0-9]+)|[a-zA-Z0-9]+)|<\/[A-Za-z][^\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\x2F\x3E]*' . SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_HTML_ATTRIBUTE . '>)/', $data))
15156:                 {
15157:                     $type |= SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML;
15158:                 }
15159:                 else
15160:                 {
15161:                     $type |= SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT;
15162:                 }
15163:             }
15164: 
15165:             if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_BASE64)
15166:             {
15167:                 $data = base64_decode($data);
15168:             }
15169: 
15170:             if ($type & (SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML | SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML))
15171:             {
15172: 
15173:                 $document = new DOMDocument();
15174:                 $document->encoding = 'UTF-8';
15175:                 $data = $this->preprocess($data, $type);
15176: 
15177:                 set_error_handler(array('SimplePie_Misc', 'silence_errors'));
15178:                 $document->loadHTML($data);
15179:                 restore_error_handler();
15180: 
15181:                 // Strip comments
15182:                 if ($this->strip_comments)
15183:                 {
15184:                     $xpath = new DOMXPath($document);
15185:                     $comments = $xpath->query('//comment()');
15186: 
15187:                     foreach ($comments as $comment)
15188:                     {
15189:                         $comment->parentNode->removeChild($comment);
15190:                     }
15191:                 }
15192: 
15193:                 // Strip out HTML tags and attributes that might cause various security problems.
15194:                 // Based on recommendations by Mark Pilgrim at:
15195:                 // http://diveintomark.org/archives/2003/06/12/how_to_consume_rss_safely
15196:                 if ($this->strip_htmltags)
15197:                 {
15198:                     foreach ($this->strip_htmltags as $tag)
15199:                     {
15200:                         $this->strip_tag($tag, $document, $type);
15201:                     }
15202:                 }
15203: 
15204:                 if ($this->strip_attributes)
15205:                 {
15206:                     foreach ($this->strip_attributes as $attrib)
15207:                     {
15208:                         $this->strip_attr($attrib, $document);
15209:                     }
15210:                 }
15211: 
15212:                 // Replace relative URLs
15213:                 $this->base = $base;
15214:                 foreach ($this->replace_url_attributes as $element => $attributes)
15215:                 {
15216:                     $this->replace_urls($document, $element, $attributes);
15217:                 }
15218: 
15219:                 // If image handling (caching, etc.) is enabled, cache and rewrite all the image tags.
15220:                 if (isset($this->image_handler) && ((string) $this->image_handler) !== '' && $this->enable_cache)
15221:                 {
15222:                     $images = $document->getElementsByTagName('img');
15223:                     foreach ($images as $img)
15224:                     {
15225:                         if ($img->hasAttribute('src'))
15226:                         {
15227:                             $image_url = call_user_func($this->cache_name_function, $img->getAttribute('src'));
15228:                             $cache = $this->registry->call('Cache', 'create', array($this->cache_location, $image_url, 'spi'));
15229: 
15230:                             if ($cache->load())
15231:                             {
15232:                                 $img->setAttribute('src', $this->image_handler . $image_url);
15233:                             }
15234:                             else
15235:                             {
15236:                                 $file = $this->registry->create('File', array($img['attribs']['src']['data'], $this->timeout, 5, array('X-FORWARDED-FOR' => $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']), $this->useragent, $this->force_fsockopen));
15237:                                 $headers = $file->headers;
15238: 
15239:                                 if ($file->success && ($file->method & SIMPLEPIE_FILE_SOURCE_REMOTE === 0 || ($file->status_code === 200 || $file->status_code > 206 && $file->status_code < 300)))
15240:                                 {
15241:                                     if ($cache->save(array('headers' => $file->headers, 'body' => $file->body)))
15242:                                     {
15243:                                         $img->setAttribute('src', $this->image_handler . $image_url);
15244:                                     }
15245:                                     else
15246:                                     {
15247:                                         trigger_error("$this->cache_location is not writeable. Make sure you've set the correct relative or absolute path, and that the location is server-writable.", E_USER_WARNING);
15248:                                     }
15249:                                 }
15250:                             }
15251:                         }
15252:                     }
15253:                 }
15254: 
15255:                 // Remove the DOCTYPE
15256:                 // Seems to cause segfaulting if we don't do this
15257:                 if ($document->firstChild instanceof DOMDocumentType)
15258:                 {
15259:                     $document->removeChild($document->firstChild);
15260:                 }
15261: 
15262:                 // Move everything from the body to the root
15263:                 $real_body = $document->getElementsByTagName('body')->item(0)->childNodes->item(0);
15264:                 $document->replaceChild($real_body, $document->firstChild);
15265: 
15266:                 // Finally, convert to a HTML string
15267:                 $data = trim($document->saveHTML());
15268: 
15269:                 if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML)
15270:                 {
15271:                     if ($this->remove_div)
15272:                     {
15273:                         $data = preg_replace('/^<div' . SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_XML_ATTRIBUTE . '>/', '', $data);
15274:                         $data = preg_replace('/<\/div>$/', '', $data);
15275:                     }
15276:                     else
15277:                     {
15278:                         $data = preg_replace('/^<div' . SIMPLEPIE_PCRE_XML_ATTRIBUTE . '>/', '<div>', $data);
15279:                     }
15280:                 }
15281:             }
15282: 
15283:             if ($type & SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI)
15284:             {
15285:                 $data = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array($data, $base));
15286:             }
15287: 
15288:             if ($type & (SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT | SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI))
15289:             {
15290:                 $data = htmlspecialchars($data, ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
15291:             }
15292: 
15293:             if ($this->output_encoding !== 'UTF-8')
15294:             {
15295:                 $data = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'change_encoding', array($data, 'UTF-8', $this->output_encoding));
15296:             }
15297:         }
15298:         return $data;
15299:     }
15300: 
15301:     protected function preprocess($html, $type)
15302:     {
15303:         $ret = '';
15304:         if ($type & ~SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML)
15305:         {
15306:             // Atom XHTML constructs are wrapped with a div by default
15307:             // Note: No protection if $html contains a stray </div>!
15308:             $html = '<div>' . $html . '</div>';
15309:             $ret .= '<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">';
15310:             $content_type = 'application/xhtml+xml';
15311:         }
15312:         else
15313:         {
15314:             $ret .= '<!DOCTYPE html>';
15315:             $content_type = 'text/html';
15316:         }
15317: 
15318:         $ret .= '<html><head>';
15319:         $ret .= '<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="' . $content_type . '; charset=utf-8" />';
15320:         $ret .= '</head><body>' . $html . '</body></html>';
15321:         return $ret;
15322:     }
15323: 
15324:     public function replace_urls(&$document, $tag, $attributes)
15325:     {
15326:         if (!is_array($attributes))
15327:         {
15328:             $attributes = array($attributes);
15329:         }
15330: 
15331:         if (!is_array($this->strip_htmltags) || !in_array($tag, $this->strip_htmltags))
15332:         {
15333:             $elements = $document->getElementsByTagName($tag);
15334:             foreach ($elements as $element)
15335:             {
15336:                 foreach ($attributes as $attribute)
15337:                 {
15338:                     if ($element->hasAttribute($attribute))
15339:                     {
15340:                         $value = $this->registry->call('Misc', 'absolutize_url', array($element->getAttribute($attribute), $this->base));
15341:                         $element->setAttribute($attribute, $value);
15342:                     }
15343:                 }
15344:             }
15345:         }
15346:     }
15347: 
15348:     public function do_strip_htmltags($match)
15349:     {
15350:         if ($this->encode_instead_of_strip)
15351:         {
15352:             if (isset($match[4]) && !in_array(strtolower($match[1]), array('script', 'style')))
15353:             {
15354:                 $match[1] = htmlspecialchars($match[1], ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
15355:                 $match[2] = htmlspecialchars($match[2], ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
15356:                 return "&lt;$match[1]$match[2]&gt;$match[3]&lt;/$match[1]&gt;";
15357:             }
15358:             else
15359:             {
15360:                 return htmlspecialchars($match[0], ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8');
15361:             }
15362:         }
15363:         elseif (isset($match[4]) && !in_array(strtolower($match[1]), array('script', 'style')))
15364:         {
15365:             return $match[4];
15366:         }
15367:         else
15368:         {
15369:             return '';
15370:         }
15371:     }
15372: 
15373:     protected function strip_tag($tag, &$document, $type)
15374:     {
15375:         $xpath = new DOMXPath($document);
15376:         $elements = $xpath->query('body//' . $tag);
15377:         if ($this->encode_instead_of_strip)
15378:         {
15379:             foreach ($elements as $element)
15380:             {
15381:                 $fragment = $document->createDocumentFragment();
15382: 
15383:                 // For elements which aren't script or style, include the tag itself
15384:                 if (!in_array($tag, array('script', 'style')))
15385:                 {
15386:                     $text = '<' . $tag;
15387:                     if ($element->hasAttributes())
15388:                     {
15389:                         $attrs = array();
15390:                         foreach ($element->attributes as $name => $attr)
15391:                         {
15392:                             $value = $attr->value;
15393: 
15394:                             // In XHTML, empty values should never exist, so we repeat the value
15395:                             if (empty($value) && ($type & SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_XHTML))
15396:                             {
15397:                                 $value = $name;
15398:                             }
15399:                             // For HTML, empty is fine
15400:                             elseif (empty($value) && ($type & SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML))
15401:                             {
15402:                                 $attrs[] = $name;
15403:                                 continue;
15404:                             }
15405: 
15406:                             // Standard attribute text
15407:                             $attrs[] = $name . '="' . $attr->value . '"';
15408:                         }
15409:                         $text .= ' ' . implode(' ', $attrs);
15410:                     }
15411:                     $text .= '>';
15412:                     $fragment->appendChild(new DOMText($text));
15413:                 }
15414:                 foreach ($element->childNodes as $child)
15415:                 {
15416:                     $fragment->appendChild($child);
15417:                 }
15418:                 if (!in_array($tag, array('script', 'style')))
15419:                 {
15420:                     $fragment->appendChild(new DOMText('</' . $tag . '>'));
15421:                 }
15422: 
15423:                 $element->parentNode->replaceChild($fragment, $element);
15424:             }
15425: 
15426:             return;
15427:         }
15428:         elseif (in_array($tag, array('script', 'style')))
15429:         {
15430:             foreach ($elements as $element)
15431:             {
15432:                 $element->parentNode->removeChild($element);
15433:             }
15434: 
15435:             return;
15436:         }
15437:         else
15438:         {
15439:             foreach ($elements as $element)
15440:             {
15441:                 $fragment = $document->createDocumentFragment();
15442:                 foreach ($element->childNodes as $child)
15443:                 {
15444:                     $fragment->appendChild($child);
15445:                 }
15446: 
15447:                 $element->parentNode->replaceChild($fragment, $element);
15448:             }
15449:         }
15450:     }
15451: 
15452:     protected function strip_attr($attrib, &$document)
15453:     {
15454:         $xpath = new DOMXPath($document);
15455:         $elements = $xpath->query('//*[@' . $attrib . ']');
15456: 
15457:         foreach ($elements as $element)
15458:         {
15459:             $element->removeAttribute($attrib);
15460:         }
15461:     }
15462: }
15463: 
15464: /**
15465:  * Handles `<atom:source>`
15466:  *
15467:  * Used by {@see SimplePie_Item::get_source()}
15468:  *
15469:  * This class can be overloaded with {@see SimplePie::set_source_class()}
15470:  *
15471:  * @package SimplePie
15472:  */
15473: class SimplePie_Source
15474: {
15475:     var $item;
15476:     var $data = array();
15477:     protected $registry;
15478: 
15479:     public function __construct($item, $data)
15480:     {
15481:         $this->item = $item;
15482:         $this->data = $data;
15483:     }
15484: 
15485:     public function set_registry(SimplePie_Registry &$registry)
15486:     {
15487:         $this->registry = &$registry;
15488:     }
15489: 
15490:     public function __toString()
15491:     {
15492:         return md5(serialize($this->data));
15493:     }
15494: 
15495:     public function get_source_tags($namespace, $tag)
15496:     {
15497:         if (isset($this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag]))
15498:         {
15499:             return $this->data['child'][$namespace][$tag];
15500:         }
15501:         else
15502:         {
15503:             return null;
15504:         }
15505:     }
15506: 
15507:     public function get_base($element = array())
15508:     {
15509:         return $this->item->get_base($element);
15510:     }
15511: 
15512:     public function sanitize($data, $type, $base = '')
15513:     {
15514:         return $this->item->sanitize($data, $type, $base);
15515:     }
15516: 
15517:     public function get_item()
15518:     {
15519:         return $this->item;
15520:     }
15521: 
15522:     public function get_title()
15523:     {
15524:         if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'title'))
15525:         {
15526:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
15527:         }
15528:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'title'))
15529:         {
15530:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
15531:         }
15532:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'title'))
15533:         {
15534:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15535:         }
15536:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'title'))
15537:         {
15538:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15539:         }
15540:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'title'))
15541:         {
15542:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15543:         }
15544:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'title'))
15545:         {
15546:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15547:         }
15548:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'title'))
15549:         {
15550:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15551:         }
15552:         else
15553:         {
15554:             return null;
15555:         }
15556:     }
15557: 
15558:     public function get_category($key = 0)
15559:     {
15560:         $categories = $this->get_categories();
15561:         if (isset($categories[$key]))
15562:         {
15563:             return $categories[$key];
15564:         }
15565:         else
15566:         {
15567:             return null;
15568:         }
15569:     }
15570: 
15571:     public function get_categories()
15572:     {
15573:         $categories = array();
15574: 
15575:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'category') as $category)
15576:         {
15577:             $term = null;
15578:             $scheme = null;
15579:             $label = null;
15580:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['term']))
15581:             {
15582:                 $term = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['term'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15583:             }
15584:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['scheme']))
15585:             {
15586:                 $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['scheme'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15587:             }
15588:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['label']))
15589:             {
15590:                 $label = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['label'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15591:             }
15592:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, $label));
15593:         }
15594:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'category') as $category)
15595:         {
15596:             // This is really the label, but keep this as the term also for BC.
15597:             // Label will also work on retrieving because that falls back to term.
15598:             $term = $this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15599:             if (isset($category['attribs']['']['domain']))
15600:             {
15601:                 $scheme = $this->sanitize($category['attribs']['']['domain'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15602:             }
15603:             else
15604:             {
15605:                 $scheme = null;
15606:             }
15607:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($term, $scheme, null));
15608:         }
15609:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'subject') as $category)
15610:         {
15611:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
15612:         }
15613:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'subject') as $category)
15614:         {
15615:             $categories[] = $this->registry->create('Category', array($this->sanitize($category['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
15616:         }
15617: 
15618:         if (!empty($categories))
15619:         {
15620:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($categories));
15621:         }
15622:         else
15623:         {
15624:             return null;
15625:         }
15626:     }
15627: 
15628:     public function get_author($key = 0)
15629:     {
15630:         $authors = $this->get_authors();
15631:         if (isset($authors[$key]))
15632:         {
15633:             return $authors[$key];
15634:         }
15635:         else
15636:         {
15637:             return null;
15638:         }
15639:     }
15640: 
15641:     public function get_authors()
15642:     {
15643:         $authors = array();
15644:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'author') as $author)
15645:         {
15646:             $name = null;
15647:             $uri = null;
15648:             $email = null;
15649:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
15650:             {
15651:                 $name = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15652:             }
15653:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
15654:             {
15655:                 $uri = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
15656:             }
15657:             if (isset($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
15658:             {
15659:                 $email = $this->sanitize($author['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15660:             }
15661:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
15662:             {
15663:                 $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $uri, $email));
15664:             }
15665:         }
15666:         if ($author = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'author'))
15667:         {
15668:             $name = null;
15669:             $url = null;
15670:             $email = null;
15671:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
15672:             {
15673:                 $name = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15674:             }
15675:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
15676:             {
15677:                 $url = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
15678:             }
15679:             if (isset($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
15680:             {
15681:                 $email = $this->sanitize($author[0]['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15682:             }
15683:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
15684:             {
15685:                 $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $url, $email));
15686:             }
15687:         }
15688:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'creator') as $author)
15689:         {
15690:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
15691:         }
15692:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'creator') as $author)
15693:         {
15694:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
15695:         }
15696:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'author') as $author)
15697:         {
15698:             $authors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($this->sanitize($author['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT), null, null));
15699:         }
15700: 
15701:         if (!empty($authors))
15702:         {
15703:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($authors));
15704:         }
15705:         else
15706:         {
15707:             return null;
15708:         }
15709:     }
15710: 
15711:     public function get_contributor($key = 0)
15712:     {
15713:         $contributors = $this->get_contributors();
15714:         if (isset($contributors[$key]))
15715:         {
15716:             return $contributors[$key];
15717:         }
15718:         else
15719:         {
15720:             return null;
15721:         }
15722:     }
15723: 
15724:     public function get_contributors()
15725:     {
15726:         $contributors = array();
15727:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'contributor') as $contributor)
15728:         {
15729:             $name = null;
15730:             $uri = null;
15731:             $email = null;
15732:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data']))
15733:             {
15734:                 $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15735:             }
15736:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data']))
15737:             {
15738:                 $uri = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['uri'][0]));
15739:             }
15740:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data']))
15741:             {
15742:                 $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15743:             }
15744:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $uri !== null)
15745:             {
15746:                 $contributors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $uri, $email));
15747:             }
15748:         }
15749:         foreach ((array) $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'contributor') as $contributor)
15750:         {
15751:             $name = null;
15752:             $url = null;
15753:             $email = null;
15754:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data']))
15755:             {
15756:                 $name = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['name'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15757:             }
15758:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data']))
15759:             {
15760:                 $url = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['url'][0]));
15761:             }
15762:             if (isset($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data']))
15763:             {
15764:                 $email = $this->sanitize($contributor['child'][SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03]['email'][0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15765:             }
15766:             if ($name !== null || $email !== null || $url !== null)
15767:             {
15768:                 $contributors[] = $this->registry->create('Author', array($name, $url, $email));
15769:             }
15770:         }
15771: 
15772:         if (!empty($contributors))
15773:         {
15774:             return $this->registry->call('Misc', 'array_unique', array($contributors));
15775:         }
15776:         else
15777:         {
15778:             return null;
15779:         }
15780:     }
15781: 
15782:     public function get_link($key = 0, $rel = 'alternate')
15783:     {
15784:         $links = $this->get_links($rel);
15785:         if (isset($links[$key]))
15786:         {
15787:             return $links[$key];
15788:         }
15789:         else
15790:         {
15791:             return null;
15792:         }
15793:     }
15794: 
15795:     /**
15796:      * Added for parity between the parent-level and the item/entry-level.
15797:      */
15798:     public function get_permalink()
15799:     {
15800:         return $this->get_link(0);
15801:     }
15802: 
15803:     public function get_links($rel = 'alternate')
15804:     {
15805:         if (!isset($this->data['links']))
15806:         {
15807:             $this->data['links'] = array();
15808:             if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'link'))
15809:             {
15810:                 foreach ($links as $link)
15811:                 {
15812:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
15813:                     {
15814:                         $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
15815:                         $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
15816:                     }
15817:                 }
15818:             }
15819:             if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'link'))
15820:             {
15821:                 foreach ($links as $link)
15822:                 {
15823:                     if (isset($link['attribs']['']['href']))
15824:                     {
15825:                         $link_rel = (isset($link['attribs']['']['rel'])) ? $link['attribs']['']['rel'] : 'alternate';
15826:                         $this->data['links'][$link_rel][] = $this->sanitize($link['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($link));
15827: 
15828:                     }
15829:                 }
15830:             }
15831:             if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'link'))
15832:             {
15833:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
15834:             }
15835:             if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'link'))
15836:             {
15837:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
15838:             }
15839:             if ($links = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'link'))
15840:             {
15841:                 $this->data['links']['alternate'][] = $this->sanitize($links[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($links[0]));
15842:             }
15843: 
15844:             $keys = array_keys($this->data['links']);
15845:             foreach ($keys as $key)
15846:             {
15847:                 if ($this->registry->call('Misc', 'is_isegment_nz_nc', array($key)))
15848:                 {
15849:                     if (isset($this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]))
15850:                     {
15851:                         $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] = array_merge($this->data['links'][$key], $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key]);
15852:                         $this->data['links'][$key] =& $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key];
15853:                     }
15854:                     else
15855:                     {
15856:                         $this->data['links'][SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY . $key] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
15857:                     }
15858:                 }
15859:                 elseif (substr($key, 0, 41) === SIMPLEPIE_IANA_LINK_RELATIONS_REGISTRY)
15860:                 {
15861:                     $this->data['links'][substr($key, 41)] =& $this->data['links'][$key];
15862:                 }
15863:                 $this->data['links'][$key] = array_unique($this->data['links'][$key]);
15864:             }
15865:         }
15866: 
15867:         if (isset($this->data['links'][$rel]))
15868:         {
15869:             return $this->data['links'][$rel];
15870:         }
15871:         else
15872:         {
15873:             return null;
15874:         }
15875:     }
15876: 
15877:     public function get_description()
15878:     {
15879:         if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'subtitle'))
15880:         {
15881:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
15882:         }
15883:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'tagline'))
15884:         {
15885:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
15886:         }
15887:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_10, 'description'))
15888:         {
15889:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15890:         }
15891:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_090, 'description'))
15892:         {
15893:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15894:         }
15895:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'description'))
15896:         {
15897:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15898:         }
15899:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'description'))
15900:         {
15901:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15902:         }
15903:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'description'))
15904:         {
15905:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15906:         }
15907:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'summary'))
15908:         {
15909:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15910:         }
15911:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'subtitle'))
15912:         {
15913:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_HTML, $this->get_base($return[0]));
15914:         }
15915:         else
15916:         {
15917:             return null;
15918:         }
15919:     }
15920: 
15921:     public function get_copyright()
15922:     {
15923:         if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'rights'))
15924:         {
15925:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_10_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
15926:         }
15927:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_03, 'copyright'))
15928:         {
15929:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], $this->registry->call('Misc', 'atom_03_construct_type', array($return[0]['attribs'])), $this->get_base($return[0]));
15930:         }
15931:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'copyright'))
15932:         {
15933:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15934:         }
15935:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'rights'))
15936:         {
15937:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15938:         }
15939:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'rights'))
15940:         {
15941:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15942:         }
15943:         else
15944:         {
15945:             return null;
15946:         }
15947:     }
15948: 
15949:     public function get_language()
15950:     {
15951:         if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20, 'language'))
15952:         {
15953:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15954:         }
15955:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_11, 'language'))
15956:         {
15957:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15958:         }
15959:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_DC_10, 'language'))
15960:         {
15961:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15962:         }
15963:         elseif (isset($this->data['xml_lang']))
15964:         {
15965:             return $this->sanitize($this->data['xml_lang'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_TEXT);
15966:         }
15967:         else
15968:         {
15969:             return null;
15970:         }
15971:     }
15972: 
15973:     public function get_latitude()
15974:     {
15975:         if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lat'))
15976:         {
15977:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
15978:         }
15979:         elseif (($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
15980:         {
15981:             return (float) $match[1];
15982:         }
15983:         else
15984:         {
15985:             return null;
15986:         }
15987:     }
15988: 
15989:     public function get_longitude()
15990:     {
15991:         if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'long'))
15992:         {
15993:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
15994:         }
15995:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO, 'lon'))
15996:         {
15997:             return (float) $return[0]['data'];
15998:         }
15999:         elseif (($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_GEORSS, 'point')) && preg_match('/^((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)) ((?:-)?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+))$/', trim($return[0]['data']), $match))
16000:         {
16001:             return (float) $match[2];
16002:         }
16003:         else
16004:         {
16005:             return null;
16006:         }
16007:     }
16008: 
16009:     public function get_image_url()
16010:     {
16011:         if ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ITUNES, 'image'))
16012:         {
16013:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['attribs']['']['href'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI);
16014:         }
16015:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'logo'))
16016:         {
16017:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
16018:         }
16019:         elseif ($return = $this->get_source_tags(SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_ATOM_10, 'icon'))
16020:         {
16021:             return $this->sanitize($return[0]['data'], SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_IRI, $this->get_base($return[0]));
16022:         }
16023:         else
16024:         {
16025:             return null;
16026:         }
16027:     }
16028: }
16029: 
16030: /**
16031:  * Parses the XML Declaration
16032:  *
16033:  * @package SimplePie
16034:  */
16035: class SimplePie_XML_Declaration_Parser
16036: {
16037:     /**
16038:      * XML Version
16039:      *
16040:      * @access public
16041:      * @var string
16042:      */
16043:     var $version = '1.0';
16044: 
16045:     /**
16046:      * Encoding
16047:      *
16048:      * @access public
16049:      * @var string
16050:      */
16051:     var $encoding = 'UTF-8';
16052: 
16053:     /**
16054:      * Standalone
16055:      *
16056:      * @access public
16057:      * @var bool
16058:      */
16059:     var $standalone = false;
16060: 
16061:     /**
16062:      * Current state of the state machine
16063:      *
16064:      * @access private
16065:      * @var string
16066:      */
16067:     var $state = 'before_version_name';
16068: 
16069:     /**
16070:      * Input data
16071:      *
16072:      * @access private
16073:      * @var string
16074:      */
16075:     var $data = '';
16076: 
16077:     /**
16078:      * Input data length (to avoid calling strlen() everytime this is needed)
16079:      *
16080:      * @access private
16081:      * @var int
16082:      */
16083:     var $data_length = 0;
16084: 
16085:     /**
16086:      * Current position of the pointer
16087:      *
16088:      * @var int
16089:      * @access private
16090:      */
16091:     var $position = 0;
16092: 
16093:     /**
16094:      * Create an instance of the class with the input data
16095:      *
16096:      * @access public
16097:      * @param string $data Input data
16098:      */
16099:     public function __construct($data)
16100:     {
16101:         $this->data = $data;
16102:         $this->data_length = strlen($this->data);
16103:     }
16104: 
16105:     /**
16106:      * Parse the input data
16107:      *
16108:      * @access public
16109:      * @return bool true on success, false on failure
16110:      */
16111:     public function parse()
16112:     {
16113:         while ($this->state && $this->state !== 'emit' && $this->has_data())
16114:         {
16115:             $state = $this->state;
16116:             $this->$state();
16117:         }
16118:         $this->data = '';
16119:         if ($this->state === 'emit')
16120:         {
16121:             return true;
16122:         }
16123:         else
16124:         {
16125:             $this->version = '';
16126:             $this->encoding = '';
16127:             $this->standalone = '';
16128:             return false;
16129:         }
16130:     }
16131: 
16132:     /**
16133:      * Check whether there is data beyond the pointer
16134:      *
16135:      * @access private
16136:      * @return bool true if there is further data, false if not
16137:      */
16138:     public function has_data()
16139:     {
16140:         return (bool) ($this->position < $this->data_length);
16141:     }
16142: 
16143:     /**
16144:      * Advance past any whitespace
16145:      *
16146:      * @return int Number of whitespace characters passed
16147:      */
16148:     public function skip_whitespace()
16149:     {
16150:         $whitespace = strspn($this->data, "\x09\x0A\x0D\x20", $this->position);
16151:         $this->position += $whitespace;
16152:         return $whitespace;
16153:     }
16154: 
16155:     /**
16156:      * Read value
16157:      */
16158:     public function get_value()
16159:     {
16160:         $quote = substr($this->data, $this->position, 1);
16161:         if ($quote === '"' || $quote === "'")
16162:         {
16163:             $this->position++;
16164:             $len = strcspn($this->data, $quote, $this->position);
16165:             if ($this->has_data())
16166:             {
16167:                 $value = substr($this->data, $this->position, $len);
16168:                 $this->position += $len + 1;
16169:                 return $value;
16170:             }
16171:         }
16172:         return false;
16173:     }
16174: 
16175:     public function before_version_name()
16176:     {
16177:         if ($this->skip_whitespace())
16178:         {
16179:             $this->state = 'version_name';
16180:         }
16181:         else
16182:         {
16183:             $this->state = false;
16184:         }
16185:     }
16186: 
16187:     public function version_name()
16188:     {
16189:         if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 7) === 'version')
16190:         {
16191:             $this->position += 7;
16192:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16193:             $this->state = 'version_equals';
16194:         }
16195:         else
16196:         {
16197:             $this->state = false;
16198:         }
16199:     }
16200: 
16201:     public function version_equals()
16202:     {
16203:         if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 1) === '=')
16204:         {
16205:             $this->position++;
16206:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16207:             $this->state = 'version_value';
16208:         }
16209:         else
16210:         {
16211:             $this->state = false;
16212:         }
16213:     }
16214: 
16215:     public function version_value()
16216:     {
16217:         if ($this->version = $this->get_value())
16218:         {
16219:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16220:             if ($this->has_data())
16221:             {
16222:                 $this->state = 'encoding_name';
16223:             }
16224:             else
16225:             {
16226:                 $this->state = 'emit';
16227:             }
16228:         }
16229:         else
16230:         {
16231:             $this->state = false;
16232:         }
16233:     }
16234: 
16235:     public function encoding_name()
16236:     {
16237:         if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 8) === 'encoding')
16238:         {
16239:             $this->position += 8;
16240:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16241:             $this->state = 'encoding_equals';
16242:         }
16243:         else
16244:         {
16245:             $this->state = 'standalone_name';
16246:         }
16247:     }
16248: 
16249:     public function encoding_equals()
16250:     {
16251:         if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 1) === '=')
16252:         {
16253:             $this->position++;
16254:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16255:             $this->state = 'encoding_value';
16256:         }
16257:         else
16258:         {
16259:             $this->state = false;
16260:         }
16261:     }
16262: 
16263:     public function encoding_value()
16264:     {
16265:         if ($this->encoding = $this->get_value())
16266:         {
16267:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16268:             if ($this->has_data())
16269:             {
16270:                 $this->state = 'standalone_name';
16271:             }
16272:             else
16273:             {
16274:                 $this->state = 'emit';
16275:             }
16276:         }
16277:         else
16278:         {
16279:             $this->state = false;
16280:         }
16281:     }
16282: 
16283:     public function standalone_name()
16284:     {
16285:         if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 10) === 'standalone')
16286:         {
16287:             $this->position += 10;
16288:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16289:             $this->state = 'standalone_equals';
16290:         }
16291:         else
16292:         {
16293:             $this->state = false;
16294:         }
16295:     }
16296: 
16297:     public function standalone_equals()
16298:     {
16299:         if (substr($this->data, $this->position, 1) === '=')
16300:         {
16301:             $this->position++;
16302:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16303:             $this->state = 'standalone_value';
16304:         }
16305:         else
16306:         {
16307:             $this->state = false;
16308:         }
16309:     }
16310: 
16311:     public function standalone_value()
16312:     {
16313:         if ($standalone = $this->get_value())
16314:         {
16315:             switch ($standalone)
16316:             {
16317:                 case 'yes':
16318:                     $this->standalone = true;
16319:                     break;
16320: 
16321:                 case 'no':
16322:                     $this->standalone = false;
16323:                     break;
16324: 
16325:                 default:
16326:                     $this->state = false;
16327:                     return;
16328:             }
16329: 
16330:             $this->skip_whitespace();
16331:             if ($this->has_data())
16332:             {
16333:                 $this->state = false;
16334:             }
16335:             else
16336:             {
16337:                 $this->state = 'emit';
16338:             }
16339:         }
16340:         else
16341:         {
16342:             $this->state = false;
16343:         }
16344:     }
16345: }
16346: 
16347:
